review:
So far, this app has proven to be reliable. I‚Äôve started a new job and my second paycheck was still 5 days away when I realized that my bills would barely be out of reach. I saw an ad on tv for Dave and thought it might be a good fit for me. When asking for an advance, I saw that it could take up to 8 hours to transfer, which inclined me to do it sooner than later just in case I would find myself needing the money and not having the time to wait. Next, Dave told me I could pay it back on my next payday, but when choosing an option they only allowed me to select one of the next 2 days. Dave could tell from my transaction history that my next payday wouldn‚Äôt be for another 4 days and I had a hard time finding out what penalties I would accrue for being late. But, my phone battery was dying, and internet would be shut off if I hadn‚Äôt gone through with it, so I picked the latest possible day and moved on. Without knowing my outcome of this experience, I‚Äôd have to say that so far the app has been straightforward, honest, and very handy for personal bookkeeping. I would just like to know more about my payback options and how I can avoid making a bigger hole than I started with, or else I would give 5 stars.

**update**
I was not charged an extra penalty for taking a little longer to pay back my advance. This was my only concern, but now I feel like Dave has shaken my concerns and fulfills my expectations. Would recommend
title: *Updated* Great app, allowed time to pay!

review: I found Dave via Facebook and read a lot of comments from people making fun of the service, making it sound like people who need it don‚Äôt manage their money very well. I was curious to see what it was about and why others feel the need to make fun of people who use it, so I downloaded the app (not expecting to use it, but to just see what it was). As circumstances presented themselves, being a single mom with zero help from the other parent, and trying to provide for my kids (I work full time and go to school full time so I can put myself in a better place, but until then things are pretty tight) - I found myself facing an overdrawn check fee (I wrote a check to register my daughter for school and had something else clear my checking account that wasn‚Äôt supposed to go through, which means I didn‚Äôt have enough funds for the check I wrote). I remembered I‚Äôd installed the Dave app a couple of weeks ago and within a few minutes, I was approved for a small loan and because I paid the extra $4.99 expedite fee, the money was deposited into my bank account within the hour. Dave only charges a $1.00 fee to loan you the money plus any tip you‚Äôre willing to donate, but is not required. When your paycheck is due to deposit, Dave takes the loan and fee back out of your bank account and that‚Äôs all there is to it! It‚Äôs very easy and painless and definitely worth the $1.00 fee to not have to pay an overdraft/insufficient funds fee to your bank.
title: Truly Awesome
developerResponse: {'id': 5527605, 'body': "Hi krzylkafox, we're so glad to hear about your experience! Happy to have helped you out of a tight spot. Thanks for the awesome review!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:24:55Z'}

review:
I am a natural skeptic when it comes to apps such as these, but just today I had a real-world experience that Dave helped me out with. The deets:
This morning, I had an out-patient procedure at a hospital in downtown Philly. I was supposed to take my wife‚Äôs ATM card and use that for parking. I‚Äôm my haste, not only do I forget her card, but I also left my main ATM card at home, leaving me only with my phone, Apple Watch, backup ATM card and 20 bucks. After my procedure I return to the lot to discover that parking was $26 - $6 more than I had on me. Wife works 40 minutes away and no way she could text me the money through iMessage, since the lot is not ApplePay-ready. Stranded, I was, staring at my car in this lot. Then it dawned on me that on a whim, I previously downloaded this Dave app. I was very skeptical about providing my bank info, but since that is the only way to realistically obtain an advance, I submitted my banking info, verified my identity and email address, and miraculously Dave fronted me 20 bucks, on the spot. I was able to immediately withdraw it and pay for parking and drive off the lot. Without this service, instead of writing this review I would still be downtown, trying to figure out how to get my car off the lot!!
I don‚Äôt foresee using this app much, but I wanted to share with you all a real-world example of this app being s lifesaver. I never knew I‚Äôd need it - until I needed it!
title: Real-world, real-time lifesaver!
developerResponse: {'id': 5677727, 'body': "We're so happy to hear that it helped you out of this parking jam! Thank you for taking the time to review, speedy recovery wishes from the team to you :)", 'modified': '2018-10-26T19:53:42Z'}

review:
Hello! So my boyfriend was my resource for finding out about these apps out there that will help you with money until payday! He goes thru the app called ‚ÄúEarnin‚Äù which was the one I was initially going to go threw but because of all the info they needed and how long it would take I chose ‚ÄúThe Dave‚Äù app! Now the thing that doesn‚Äôt make any sense and really makes me mad, is Earnin app borrows my boyfriend as much as he needs from his upcoming check! Which is  what I was expecting and needing from Dave app! This app only gives me $20 dollars! Honestly that is just an insult and not even helpful! What is 20 bucks going to do to help me out, especially in today‚Äôs world and with 4 kids that need to be fed and a vehicle that needs gas to allow me to get to work? It is not enough money to help a family or even a single person! You need to make it available to borrow what the customer wants and or needs! They are the ones who pay it back and it‚Äôs there decision and or problem what they chose to borrow from there next check! You guys take the money right out our accounts automatically so I don‚Äôt see the issue with not allowing your customers really get the help they need. That would also make you guys more money because we as customers would tip you way more better. Please explain why it‚Äôs only 20 dollars I can borrow for 5 days until I get paid :( ? 
Thanks much, Kaitlyn Ralph
title: Reviewing the Dave App!

review:
usually never do reviews but i HAD too for dave. i been using dave for a while and it has been helping me keep with gas and food until my next paycheck. i love the fact that it sends the money asap if you ask for it early enough. they start you off with a $75 limit which mines has just increased to $100 because i use it so much and have it auto drafted back out to pay. also as soon as you do pay it back you can request more
next day which is helpful especially if that money you had to pay back is something you may have needed for something else. so it literally helps keep money in your pocket if you have a job. these are all great things about dave but the reason i wrote this review is because of the way dave handles getting their money back. i just moved to another state and got some money from dave to help with that. i just found a job in the new state but i haven't been gettin paid yet so i am behind on my pack-back to dave. I JUST WANNA PRAISE DAVE ON NOT TRYING TO TAKE MONEY OUT OF MY ACCOUNT WHEN ITS NOT THERE. they check 1st which is so nice cause alot of us using the app are already not very financially stable or literate and we need all the money we can get and getting this overdraft or ach fees really hurt us more than you know. I hope you read this developers cause i just wanna say THANK YOU. THANK YOU. THANK YOU. and i start my job soon and im not in debit THANK YOU!!!
title: APP WORKS GREAT

review: Since they were able to validate my account they were able to give me the $75 loan without any tricks. They took it out as soon as my direct deposit came in so if I needed to get another advance the next morning I could do it around 3-5am before the day starts so you don‚Äôt have to go half the day waiting for it to give you the green light to put in for another advance! I have no issues navigating site. The only issue I have is after you agree and swipe ok to get the advance the next screen it goes to is the Dave Bear with hands up and a green bar at bottom saying thank you and if you don‚Äôt pay attention you will press the Thank You Bar thinking it‚Äôs just the final page like a second swipe to make sure you meant to agree to it, but it‚Äôs really an effort by them to get a tip out of you which I got caught on it and now I am into it for an additional 10 Dollars which I would never have agreed upon!! If the times are tough enough to need an advance I am not in position to be giving out a 10 tip on top of the $4,99 charge to put it in account right away for no charge you can wait I think 3-4 days for it to go into account so I am now paying 90 dollars for the 75 which I definitely will never ever give a tip again!!! Fool me once ok that‚Äôs on me but to me it‚Äôs kind of messed up to get people while they are down with no way to reverse it!

review:
I‚Äôve had Dave for months now, and I get paid every week EARLY! Not only is THAT a great incentive, but I expected this app to be like many others, (where they lie, basically) lol. But DAVE actually gives you $200 advances. (You can advance anywhere from $100-$200) You just hit the ‚Äúadvance‚Äù tab and select your advance amount. You have it deducted immediately when your next ACH direct deposit check that clears in your Dave Spending Account, or, you can pay it back early with another form of payment. 
NOTE: a potential advance DOES REQUIRE proof that you can pay Dave back. It‚Äôs not just free money. You have to build a rapport. You start out at $25 advances when you open the account, and then as you get ACH direct deposits, keep money in your account, and advance and pay him back regularly from YOUR money, you can then advance $100, $150, or $200. Once your advance is paid back, there‚Äôs a ‚Äúcool off‚Äù period, which is a few days where you can‚Äôt advance, and then you can advance again after that. I LOVE THIS FEATURE. Sometimes I have to say, I spend my money frivolously, (not proud of it) and I need a little bit extra to get through the week. So it works out perfectly with timing with the ‚Äúcool off‚Äù period, too! It allows me to budget better AND monitor my spending. 

Thank you to DAVE!!!! üêªüß∏üêª THE BEST BEAR AROUND! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
title: Great app! $200 advances are üî• and consistent if you are too! üêªüí∞

review:
I loved this app when it first came out. When they added the banking option I joined the waitlist and decided to deposit a certain amount of my paycheck into Dave Banking.... FIRST; Never received the correct debit card. I was sent 5 cards and tried to activate all of them and kept getting an error. When I called Evolve Bank who handles everything I was transferred to another 3rd party company.... tried to use my acct over July 4th weekend and I wasn‚Äôt able to access any of my money. Called in and kept getting hung up on and no one will contact me by email or by phone... this is horror when you have pills and payments bouncing. I really regret trusting this app with my money.... wish i had real person to talk to instead of a rep who sounds like they just woke up and keeps hanging up

Update: I was able to get in contact with someone this morning through the chat app. It‚Äôs a know issue currently with not being able to process transactions through 3rd Larry such as Venmo, Cash App and etc. No current eta as of this afternoon and I had to reorder my card because the one I received was tied to a previously closed Dave Banking account.

2021 Update: Since my initial review I have not had any more issues. I‚Äôve actually received a Dave card and it is fully operational and I still get my check a day early from then my other bank accounts

review: So I really do enjoy this ‚Äúapp,‚Äù if that‚Äôs what it should be called, but I have a few opinions about it. Dave definitely helps organize finances by giving advances when needed. However, the terms of when you can take an advance, and how much you can ask for, are very unorganized. I have taken out advanced, and I have paid them all back, in full and on time, but there are stipulations that users aren‚Äôt made privy to until the ‚Äúapp‚Äù drops that bomb on them. For someone who is not over drafted in their own bank account, OR in the Dave app, and someone who makes their payments in full and on time, there shouldn‚Äôt be a limit on how much they can ask for, or when they can ask for it. If these limitations are there to make it easier for the user to handle their finances responsibly, there should be more leniency towards those that are in good financial standing with Dave. If I have ‚Äúborrowed‚Äù money, multiple times, and paid it back in FULL, MULTIPLE times, EVERY time, the limitations should not occur. I understand the app is new, and the kinks are still being worked out, so me being as detailed as possible should benefit those working on making Dave the best it can be. Thank you for your time, and as I will continue to use Dave, I hope to see improvements that cater to users that are responsible with their usage. Place limits where they are needed, but offer opportunities to those who meet or exceed expectations.
title: Review?

review: Earlier I gave a bad review although I did get my money two days early what I‚Äôm trying to say is they mean two days early it doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs a holiday or not if you get paid on Sunday you‚Äôll get paid on memorial day Christmas day it doesn‚Äôt matter to days early means two days early which is fine it‚Äôs still two days or any right guys but when I am saying is that when you call customer service to talk about your banking issues and they say they don‚Äôt have any access to detailed information they refer you to the live chat Avenue go to the live chat app and then a live chat app says we don‚Äôt have that information you‚Äôre gonna have to call customer service and you play a game of back-and-forth with no answers you could literally spend half your day with customer service and still not get thatI don‚Äôt know why this is but they need to really upgrade the customer service they just have these basic answers they give you and if you don‚Äôt believe me call them and I could repeat the answers are going to say it‚Äôs already pre-done I think they just look at the pages real quick off we‚Äôre gonna get that answer and that‚Äôs what they give it‚Äôs very sad although the app itself it‚Äôs pretty good I never had no money missing or anything like that I have been getting my advances paying it back although that part is good customer service will bring a perfect score down to just average or below average and that‚Äôs why you got this reading
title: Not bad

review:

title: DAVE IS GREAT & THE BEST OF 11 APPS IN THIS CLASS

review:
Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this app is great! I‚Äôve been using it for almost a couple weeks now and I love it, I downloaded it during work because my girlfriend recommended it because I got an unexpected overdraft fee and I was negative, so I had to dispute my charges from the snowball effect, but nonetheless I wanted it to help prevent and better manage my money, I‚Äôm 18 years old and I recently moved into my first apartment with bills to pay now with my girlfriend so the Dave app really helps both of us out, and this building credit feature-I can‚Äôt wait to try out, it sounds amazing! Build credit by paying rent, unbelievable. I had to pay a big deposit because of no rental history or credit. Dave is amazing, but recently, I‚Äôve been experiencing minor technical difficulties. The app seems to be showing expenses that need to be payed before payday or I might ‚Äúoverdraft‚Äù but then I look below, and it appears there are no expenses to remove or edit; and it‚Äôs a pretty large sum to be notified about. I‚Äôve tried a lot of troubleshooting, but nothing seems to help, and I don‚Äôt want to be notified of false alerts & notifications. Don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs a way to fix this or not, but I still love the app. I just wish I could use it to its fullest potential-with the alert system & billing information.
-Isaac L.
title: Bugs in the app

review: Initially I was skeptical to install and use an app requiring entry of my banking account info, but after reading dozens of mostly-positive reviews I decided to give it a try. Entering my bank account info and inputting my paycheck schedule was quick and easy, and not long after the verification was completed I requested and received a $75 cash advance. Over the course of a couple months I requested and received three $75 advances, each of which was paid from my checking account on the scheduled date. However, this week I attempted another advance but the app reflected it did not register my most recent paycheck, thereby limiting to $20 the amount I could advance. Upon trying to update the paycheck schedule (which has NOT changed, mind you), the app informed me it could not offer advances based on manual paycheck entry. This issue was something I read in many reviews, but I opted to continue with the installation and use of the app. Now, due to the frustrating glitch in the app‚Äôs ability to record my always-on-time paychecks and other, static monthly deposits, there really is no point in keeping the app on my phone. Currently I am evaluating the use of other, similar apps, as I see no need to maintain the Dave app because it no longer properly records my paycheck information. I‚Äôm glad I waited to write a review because it allowed me to experience both its pros and cons.
title: Great at First, But Eventually Experiences Issues

review:
Dave is usually great, I‚Äôve been using this app for a long time now. And whenever I‚Äôm in a bind I can count on Dave to lend me up to $75 until my next paycheck. Well due to the recent changes with the virus spreading, I‚Äôve been working remotely which is still providing a paycheck, though it is for much less hours. My usual main source of income is nonexistent right now, as I‚Äôm an artist and vendor who makes money at events. 

This month, money was tight. It is tight. I thought I could count on Dave to get my $75 advance, but I ended up overdrafting three dollars. So I was -3 dollars. Usually that‚Äôs not an issue when requesting an advance from Dave, but this time, it was. I was told the highest amount I was eligible for because my account was negative, due to coronavirus circumstances, was $20. So that‚Äôs where I‚Äôm at. I don‚Äôt have enough money to make it until next Thursday when I get my steady paycheck, and I‚Äôm struggling. If I had known that I wouldn‚Äôt be able to get an event at the moment I went negative on my account, I would‚Äôve set an alert so that I couldn‚Äôt go negative and I would‚Äôve requested the money sooner.

I‚Äôm super grateful Dave exists, but I had come to rely on it, and now I‚Äôm seeing that I can‚Äôt even rely on Dave.
title: Dave is usually great.. but right now I need the help the most and it‚Äôs not available to me.

review: I‚Äôve had Dave for a long time and every time I‚Äôve borrowed money I‚Äôve always been perfect about paying it back. Even left them MULTIPLE good reviews! Due to my job now my paychecks are every other week. I changed it on the app, borrowed $75, mustve not paid attention to the payback day, and then the next day realized I messed it up and emailed the customer support team and told them I would not have money on Friday and that my paycheck would be the following Friday, they responded and said it can‚Äôt be extended but not to stress, Dave wouldn‚Äôt charge me late fees or anything, they would just take a partial pay or wait until the funds are available. I emailed again. Told them that a partial pay or anything is going to put me in negative because I do have money in my account but that it was just the money I was given for rent by my roomates, and that if it was taking out Friday I would not be able to pay rent because I haven‚Äôt gotten a paycheck yet. Again, they email me back and tell me not to stress about it. Dave won‚Äôt take the money if you can‚Äôt afford it. FRIDAY HITS AND IM NEGATIVE SIX DOLLARS IN MY BANK ACCOUNT. CANT GET IT BACK. CANT PAY RENT. DEFINITELY CANT AFFORD THE OVER DRAFT FEE. So happy I was told ‚Äúdon‚Äôt stress about it‚Äù just to be completely blind sided when my rent payment is declined!!! Crying because of Dave. üëåüèªüò≠üò°ü§¨
title: So upset
developerResponse: {'id': 4898168, 'body': "We're so sorry to hear this and would like to take a look at your case specifically. \nSince we're unable to identify you via this review, please reach out to ashley@dave.com so that we can help.", 'modified': '2018-09-01T15:42:42Z'}

review:
So my wife had seen Dave on fb and she and I knew this last week was going to be tight. I work full-time but with two young children we can‚Äôt always make it to my next paycheck. I‚Äôve found myself sometimes asking friends and family for small loans (that I always pay back) but I hate doing it! I always feel ashamed and even though they always tell me it‚Äôs ok because I‚Äôve never missed paying them back on time, I still find it kind of depressing to do. Enter the Dave app. I was skeptical at first. A $75 payday loan with NO INTEREST?? Sounds kinda fishy right? Well I researched this app, downloaded it, and within a few minutes I had $75 in my account! I did pay the extra fee in order to expedite the process but that was the ONLY FEE I paid and that was optional! Then when I was paid this past Friday they automatically took the money back and that was it! I can‚Äôt express how satisfying it is to not have to go to my friends or parents with my tail between my legs for a few bucks anymore! Thank you so much to the developers! All of this is made possible by paying $1 a month! This app is a dream come true for hard working people who find themselves in a tight spot from time to time!

P.S. I am real. I‚Äôm not some shill writing a positive review for a reward. Dave is 100% legit!
title: The best app ever!

review: Get pay day advances instantly for only $5! No hassle, no joke or gimmick. Immediate online approval process and same day advances in most cases. Cash is electronically deposited to your account in just minutes. All you need is a current steady income. It‚Äôs so unbelievably quick and easy! Just download the app and follow the prompts to connect to your bank. If you have regular, recurring direct deposits from a viable source of income your bank and income are verified immediately. Only thing is you can‚Äôt get more than $75 each advance initially and the loan repayment is electronically debited on your next pay day no matter how soon that may be. The app also has a few bugs to work out. You may get error messages and have to repeat steps or start over a few times during the process of connecting to your bank and/or verifying your income. Depending on your financial institution and source of income, verification may not be immediate. It seems to take longer or be somewhat trickier to verify some banks and direct deposit pay. And it can take up to 8 hours for your advance to be deposited once it‚Äôs approved but all in all  it‚Äôs still THE BEST EXPERIENCE I‚Äôve ever had getting a pay day or online loan. It‚Äôs generally guaranteed... in no longer than a few hours if not instantly. I would give it 5 stars if not for the bugs
title: Great banking app

review:
I have used this app pretty much every two weeks for a little help with gas money. For the first 2-3 months I had no problem. Then I started receiving error messages stating that my pay check hadn‚Äôt come in, but when I would go to edit my income it displayed my last check from 5 days prior. I deleted the app and reinstalled, which solved the problem. Two weeks later I had the exact same issue, but deleting/reinstalling didn‚Äôt help. I wrote into customer service and they responded within 6 hours apologizing and stating the issue had been resolved. I was able to go in and borrow right away. That was two weeks ago. Im not really in a position where I need extra funds right now, but I wanted to see if the problem would persist. Sure enough, I‚Äôm getting a message stating my last check hasn‚Äôt come in yet, but then it displays my last check from June 8th and shows my next pay date is June 22nd. There has been no change to my income or pay schedule, so I really have no idea why there have been problems in the last few weeks. 

This used to be a 5 star app, but with consistent issues I‚Äôm rating it as a 2.

Update 11/30....issues were resolved and I‚Äôve been able to use Dave a few more times to help out in a pinch.
title: Used to be great. Now, not so much...

We make sure to reach out back to our customers within 24hrs or less!", 'modified': '2018-06-28T21:45:51Z'}

review:
I don‚Äôt usually like leaving reviews but I felt that it was more than necessary for me to do a review of Dave. First of all, the setup process after I downloaded the app was SO fast and SO simple. They walked me through the setup very easily, and they even had some budgeted items already preset for me after they analyzed my bank account. That was a pretty cool feature. But the BEST PART OF ALL is that they let me borrow money from my upcoming paycheck on the SAME DAY that I downloaded the app. There was absolutely no waiting period or trial period before I was approved to borrow. I was honestly amazed by that. Most apps that offer payday type of loans will make you wait up to 30 days before you can borrow but not Dave! I had downloaded the app, set up my account, borrowed money, and had the money in my account all within less than 30 MINUTES!! That‚Äôs unheard of! And once I confirmed the amount I wanted to borrow, the money was literally in my account instantaneously. Literally. So if you‚Äôre on the fence about this app, just go ahead and take the leap and download Dave. You won‚Äôt regret it. ALSO- no fees. They do NOT make you tip them if you don‚Äôt want to. 

Side note- I am a completely real reviewer. I was not paid or compensated for this review. This is my honest opinion. No BS. Happy borrowing!
title: Awesome, awesome, awesome!
developerResponse: {'id': 5649971, 'body': 'Hey there, thank you so much for the review! Glad you enjoy the app. Have an awesome day!', 'modified': '2018-10-24T19:43:39Z'}

review: Let‚Äôs start by saying the when I first started using this app it was working fine, now I have been trying to use it for a while now and it was stuck on the screen that said a verification for the bank account was needed and it should take two days, I‚Äôm wondering how you guys count your days because it was displaying the same message for over a month, I tried to do the process again and after I linked my bank account for the second time it took me to a screen that requires me to verify all my information again including bank account and routing numbers, once y put my information says my bank account number it‚Äôs not correct and I know what you are going to say you probably did it wrong try again, well surprise it was done multiple times and by different people now one out of two everyone it‚Äôs making the same mistake or your app has bugs, I think it‚Äôs safe to say the second option seems like the right one, I know you will give an answer saying you are really sorry and that you will look into it, save the time and use it to improve the app and please add a phone number to contact your customer service if you don‚Äôt have a card other wise it won‚Äôt let you do anything because all the options that you have online are useless or at least don‚Äôt solve my problem specially since my screen it‚Äôs stuck on the part asking for my bank information after I linked it electronically. By the way I uninstalled the application. So keep it up.
title: Going backwards

review: To be honest, I heard of them through Facebook and I always skipped the video ad. One day, I needed money for transit and I didn‚Äôt have enough in my account. I called a couple friends and no one had it so I was stuck at the airport trying to figure out a way home. My friend told me to download this app. I didn‚Äôt think much about it before because I use Earnin App. But I had just gotten off 2 weeks vacation so Earnin wouldn‚Äôt let me borrow until my next paycheck. With no other options,  I download this app. It was very user friendly and didn‚Äôt take up too much time to set up. I didn‚Äôt have to wait 1-3 business days or anything. I literally signed up put my information in, told them when I‚Äôd pay it back, and within a few minutes (depending on ur bank it takes longer, but USAA Bank is instant) the money transferred and I got home safely. The tips you leave give a percentage to charity which is really great. Also Earnin app only lets u use true bank u get paid from and has a whole verification process which is annoying but understandable I guess. But this app lets u pick which bank u need the money to transfer to and I like this option much better. I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews but this deserved one for sure.
title: Quick & User Friendly

review:
When I heard about the Dave app I though yeah right a app that will lend you money if you are in a jam with 0% interest??? To good to be true, so I downloaded it and looked at the app, read everything I could read on the app. And IT WAS TRUE! The only thing you pay back is what you borrowed and a small tip which you can pick the amount if you wanted to tip .75 cents instead of the suggest amount you could, and all for $1.00 a month that‚Äôs it.
    But than I was never able to borrow money for some reason every time I would try it would give some message. So finally one day I was going to delete the app, when I was asked why I told them and they said give them some time to look at it and I got 2 months free. Next I know I received a email saying I was able to borrow from Dave. So the customer service is pretty good as far as I could tell.
     The only thing I don‚Äôt like about the app is once you borrow and they take it from your pay, you have to wait 11 days from your next pay to borrow again. Sometimes the money may be needed before that. 
      All in all the app is pretty good I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is in a jam, needs help with there bank account. The Dave app has definitely saved me from accidentally over-drafting a few times. I‚Äôm glad I downloaded the app.
title: Dave is helpfull

review: I often times live paycheck to paycheck and in need of borrowing a few bucks from friends or coworkers just to get by and have enough gas to get to/from work. After being bombarded with ads for this app while on other apps, I finally took it into consideration and did a little research to make sure I wasn‚Äôt getting myself into a big mess. After deciding to download it, I linked my bank account and asked to borrow $25 (you have the option of $25, 50 or 75). You can wait 1-2 business days or pay an extra $3.98 for it to be in your bank acct within 8 hrs. I chose to pay the few extra dollars to have it fast and once I opened up my banking app, it was already there. From the time I downloaded Dave, to the time I logged out, it was less than 10 mins and I had the $25 in my account. That fast!! I will definitely be keeping this app on hand so I can bypass the embarrassment of asking to borrow money again. And another awesome thing? No enormous interest rates like traditional loans, and can do it all from home...no need to speak to anyone and no need to physically go into a bank. I‚Äôm beyond satisfied and I hope that satisfaction continues. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs some additional help to get by until payday.
title: Dave is a lifesaver!
developerResponse: {'id': 5527629, 'body': "We're so happy to hear that you're beyond satisfied with the app! Thanks for the great review!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:28:34Z'}

review: Iv been going through a lot but a lot of people go through a lot so I can‚Äôt complain at where I am at in life and I know how to get where I‚Äôm needed. I haven‚Äôt grown up in an easy life and I wouldn‚Äôt change a thing about my life. Iv had 3 women who tried to be a mother. One passed away, one sent us across the street and took everything and the mother that has always been there is still with me. Iv had cancer 2 and been run over by my own car after a driver hit my truck going 90 and I was in front of it. I have both hips replace and a knee replacement and getting the other knee done (from being a cancer survivor). I wouldn‚Äôt change a moment because it made who I am. Sometimes we struggle and I was and still am there but this app has provided me with knowing I can get to work and make the money needed (Have no car have to lyft or Uber). Sometime it‚Äôs a struggle and makes you worry that you don‚Äôt have enough to make it to the next paycheck. No work no money even if I can‚Äôt get there. This app have been a comfort for me knowing I have someone to go to when I need the help. Thank you to those that created this app and I always recommended even if your not struggling use the app. You never know when something can come up.
title: Life saver
developerResponse: {'id': 5527641, 'body': "Hi there, we're so happy to hear that the app has helped you through some tough times. Thanks for the review!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:30:16Z'}

review: Only annoying thing is that it says you can get $75 but only let me get $20 at the most.. better than nothing I guess. (First time I used it) Now that I got my paycheck and paid Dave back, I now have the option to cash out up to $75. Super cool app. I always choose the fast cash out for a percentage of the money their giving me ( it was $2 for the $20, and it was $5 for the $75) it says it will arrive in your account within 8 hours, and I always get it instantly. Thanks Dave. I‚Äôm in between full time jobs so I only have a part time job and drive uber. It helps so much especially when I don‚Äôt feel like driving uber or if uber is slow. This is amazing. Better than Earn-in. They keep asking for a copy of my paystub even though I get direct deposit & I currently don‚Äôt have access to my online paystub. But there‚Äôs none of that bs with Dave. Dave is smart and can clearly see my check depositing every two weeks. I‚Äôm sure earn in is good once it‚Äôs all set up, just annoying that its doing that to me right now. So thanks Dave creators for making such a cool, smart app. They also plant a tree for every tip you give them. ( I gave .75 cents and they are planting 1 tree. Really cool)
title: Works better than earn in
developerResponse: {'id': 9159666, 'body': "Hi Loooorita! The amount we can lend is based off a number of factors. If you think you should be able to borrow more, contact our customer support at support.dave.com and we'll help you sort it out!", 'modified': '2019-06-14T01:23:57Z'}

review: I use Dave quite often. Honestly have nothing bad to say about it when you‚Äôre tight with money and can‚Äôt get through the week without gas money or even just to eat Dave was always there to help. If you‚Äôre job offers direct deposit then it‚Äôs easy to set up. Based on what you‚Äôre income is they will let you take out $100 or $75. When you get an advancement it usually takes 3 days but if you need it ASAP they will charge you $5 on top of what you‚Äôre taking out for the advancement. You can set up the day you can pay the advancement back the best thing is when they are ready to get paid back they automatically do it for you. If the money doesn‚Äôt hit yet they take a little bit out of you‚Äôre account so your bank balance doesn‚Äôt go to a negative that right there is really awesome. They care about making sure your account doesn‚Äôt go negative even though you owe them money they will wait until you have money in your account before they take it out. Other than that it‚Äôs really convenient to have. I personally haven‚Äôt had any issues other than waiting for payments to process or loans to come through that‚Äôs the only thing that takes a while. I honestly recommend it if you just need extra cash to get by
title: Can‚Äôt complain

review: I downloaded Dave several months ago but my bank wasn‚Äôt listed to use soI requested they add it. It took a few months but I kept checking back and soon my bank had been added. Due to unexpected family medical emergency I needed help so I did the cash advance with Dave. The process was very easy and my money was deposited into my account at the end of the day even though it said it would take eight hours. They don‚Äôt charge interest or a fee for the advance, except for the five dollars if you need the cash fast, but you can include a tip which I was happy to do. Unlike the Earnin app, which tracks the hours you work at a physical address before it will advance your money, Dave looks at your income history and then determines how much it‚Äôs able to allow you to request. The max available is $75 but if you‚Äôre approved for that amount it gives you the option to take $50 or $25 instead which I liked. I think this is a great app especially because the end of the month is hard for a lot of people and in times of emergency it comes in handy. The only issue I saw is that you can only borrow within 10 days of your next payday. But overall it‚Äôs a great app!
title: Great App!

review: Love Dave living on. A fixed income the end of the month gets tuff and Dave is like a good friend always there to help me out !! üòÅüòÅTHANKS DAVE. But I do have one issue I can‚Äôt get through the app to talk to a rep about my account.   I moved an I was getting internet installed an I couldn‚Äôt get my phone to load it so the rep from their company was adjusting my phone so he canceled the internet and reloaded it well when this was done it reset a lot of my apps an Dave was one    Now the app acts ne all the time if I lost my job or changed my bank well nothing on my part has changed except my internet company. But joe I have to start all over I got a reduction in my loan from 75$ to 20$   WHY???? My account is the same an nothing is wrong so why ???? An what my real problem is getting through to talk to someone for help I‚Äôm always told I would get a text to figure this all out but still nothing so I guess I‚Äôm just out of luck     But this is wrong an I mean wrong so now maybe someone will find the time to text me so we can work things out.   Wit everything I‚Äôm dealing with family an this virus I could have really used the 75 to help with their meds. DAVE PLEASE HELP !!!!!!!
title: Debi  White

review: Well I‚Äôve used this service 3 times and the first two times I‚Äôve gotten my money right away by paying the three dollars. But on my third time using it I paid the three dollars and it said it was deposited in my account I confirmed it and then the next morning it was gone and they still said it was going to be paid back on my next payday but yet I had no money from them and it put my account in the negative. Later on the second day I received a message saying it was sent and should be there soon and asking for a review but yet I still don‚Äôt have what I asked for they say it was sent the bank can find no records for it. Needless to say I‚Äôm not happy. Also the way they kinda trick you into adding a tip is kinda shady they should put a close button on the screen if you do not want to include a tip. And the default is 15% if you don‚Äôt pay attention you will pay back plus the 15%. Now for me if I‚Äôm hurting for money and need to borrow some this is an awesome service but 15% is kinda high if a person is strapped for cash. In the end I still have not received the money in my account and I paid for the quick deposit. If it does not show up by the day before I get paid I‚Äôll lock my account so they cannot take money out in case they try.
title: Handy
developerResponse: {'id': 19225163, 'body': "Hi there! Thanks for the review. Tipping is always optional.  Let's get you in touch with our customer support team. Please reach out to Dave's team at davecares@dave.com and we can help you out!", 'modified': '2020-11-19T17:36:37Z'}

review: It took me 3 months of back and forth with their customer support to finally be able to get an advance of $15. The loan was paid back on my payday, plus fees. The next was dropped to $5 available loan. That was paid back, as well. The following was still at $5 availability. I spent 3 days back and forth, trying to find out why. They corrected it and allowed me to do up to $75, but I only needed $50. Again, that was paid back, plus fees, on time. I checked it again, and loan amount had dropped back down to  $5. Once again, I have spent another 3 days back and forth with their customer support, to find out why. This time, I was told have only received 1 direct deposit check from my employer. Hmm...didn't make sense that I've received advances previously....one of them recently and paid back on time. I reinformed them I have received regular direct deposit from my employer and gotten advances before from  this app. I was then told that, because I received a direct deposit from another source, (because I have bonuses and employee benefits hit my account every 6 months) in between my pay days, I would have to wait to show that their are more direct deposits coming from my employer. So, essentially, what they are telling me, is that, you are not allowed receive money from anyone other than your employer and by payroll only, if you want to use their app. What a crock!
title: Ridiculous

We'd love to work with you to improve your experience with the app. Please email friends@dave.com for additional assistance!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:37:55Z'}

review: Probably the worst mistake I‚Äôve made ever going with Dave Banking. The customer service is no different than a robot, they have lines and a script they go by.  They do not help resolve any banking issues whatsoever.  I use cash app to transfer funds between myself and fianc√©. I‚Äôve always used them no problem. My fianc√© sent me a large sum of funds through cash app. I transferred those funds to my Dave banking account.  They haven‚Äôt been deposited to my account because Dave claims they don‚Äôt support the cash out option. That‚Äôs a complete lie because I‚Äôve used cash app with my Dave no problem.  They told me the funds will be deposited to my account within 3-5 days because they never showed in my account. After the fifth day a woman told me she sees the funds and they will be deposited that day. I waited till the next morning. Still no funds. I called again. They claim it couldn‚Äôt be deposited cause the source couldn‚Äôt be determined and they say they sent it back to the creditor. Cash app has done great helping me track my funds and told me Dave never sent anything back.  I called Dave and told them that but still tell me they sent it back. I asked for proof of that, and they could not provide anything to set my mind at ease. DAVE BANKING HAS STOLEN MY FUNDS AND WILL NOT RETURN THEM OR GIVE ANY HELPFUL ANSWERS.  If it can‚Äôt be resolved I plan on  contacting BBB and also my attorney to proceed with an investigation.
title: Missing funds

review:
I read about this app yesterday and decided to install today. I also installed Earnin, but that was going to take 1-3 business days JUST to verify my info. Dave verified my info almost instantly, and after inputting my paycheck info that is set to deposit tomorrow, I selected my advance amount. I went through all the applicable screens which includes selecting a tip and confirming the transaction. I checked my bank app literally one second later AND ALREADY HAD MY ADVANCE! I‚Äôm rating the app 4 stars for now because my check deposits into my account mid-morning and I‚Äôm wondering how quickly my advance (plus expedite fee and tip) will be deducted out. Even if it creates a negative balance for a couple hours, I won‚Äôt lower my rating, but if it waits until after my check deposits then I‚Äôll update to 5 stars!

Update: I‚Äôve used Dave several times now and it appears that the service makes sure not to overdraft you! It will wait until it can take back the total amount you borrowed, or will use more than one withdrawal if you don‚Äôt yet have the complete amount due on the day of/before your direct deposit hits.
title: 4 Stars for now...Updated to 5!

review: I wrote a review on here on Monday, I‚Äôve been using Dave for awhile now and never had a problem. I got an advance last week and paid it Friday. Come Monday Dave just takes out another $75, so I‚Äôm in the negative and with late notice and not being able to go put cash in the atm, as it was night. I have to take ANOTHER $75 with the express fee, $4.99. So that‚Äôs close to $80, next day I get charged the $35 insufficient fee because Dave took the $75 and made me negative and I didn‚Äôt make the cutoff time. So I‚Äôm out $118 this week because of Dave, I emailed them and they said on their part they see they only took $75 out once. I checked my Dave app and my bank statement for the two transactions and they are still there. I‚Äôm not sure if they are just checking one date as I said Friday and Monday, I sent them screenshots of both saying they took $75 out. Fingers cross they can actually investigate and not send me these short emails that do not even clear up or explain why they took out $75 twice. Also I emailed them Monday, they messaged me yesterday night. I would not download this app. It‚Äôs such a hassle trying to get your money back if they mess up on their part. All you can do is email them, it takes them days to email back. They have people that help you that don‚Äôt even see to really care about the problem or issue. I‚Äôm removing my app.

review:
I‚Äôll admit I was skeptical at first about this app. But I found myself in a pinch and needed some gas money. My paycheck was two days away. I tried this app, and let me tell you it was super easy! One dollar fee a month. I‚Äôll take it. I was able to input my info and link my bank account and within minutes I had a personal budget, which really made me review my spending habits. Verify your info and your deposit/ job earnings and your done! Then you can request an advance from your future check! You borrow from yourself, with absolutely no interest! You can express send your money for a $3 fee (which you do not have to pay; you pay it back with the amount your borrowed from your future paycheck)  and you have it within a few hours (I got mine almost instantaneously!) Verify your repayment date or next job deposit and they will automatically take it out of your check. The best part is; it will not take it out of your check if it will make you go negative. You can make a payment your next check. 
This has been a lifesaver. Instead of trying to bum $20 for gas I can borrow against myself. It‚Äôs been a great easy process for me!
title: Lifesaver!
developerResponse: {'id': 5527688, 'body': 'Hi KpopG1! Glad to hear the app has helped you get up and go! Thanks for the review!', 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:35:52Z'}

review: When I first saw advertisements for Dave on TV and Facebook, I thought they were lying. I thought it was a scam. I thought ‚Äúthere‚Äôs no way they won‚Äôt charge me interest or check my credit.‚Äù But it‚Äôs true! This app is true to its description and is extremely useful. It was easy to set up and connect to my bank account. The app evaluates your bank history to determine when you‚Äôll get paid, and your regular expenses. You can adjust some bills if they are irregular or even add a new bill. I have only needed to advance on 2 separate occasions so far. I was issued $100 and then on my next pay day, they automatically withdrew the $100 plus the amount of the tip (if you choose to tip). They also automatically withdraw $1 per month which is an amazing subscription cost. Not only has it helped me get through until my next pay day, it also taught me how to budget my money better so that I don‚Äôt have to rely on an advance of money from Dave all the time! This app is wonderful for people who live paycheck to paycheck and just need a little boost to cover them for a week or so before pay day!
title: Honest & Dependable

review:
I‚Äôm fond of this app as it‚Äôs helped me in certain situations however as I write this review I can‚Äôt help but compare it to its competitors. The backend system cannot account for split direct deposits, If you receive a split direct deposit between checking and savings account in this $800 and $900. The system will only recognize your payroll as $800 thus potentially impacting your borrowing ability. Dave also is not capable of understanding update to date balances, so if your account WAS negative even for a day and now has a balance of $500. It would take days before allowing you to borrow funds, simply because ‚Äúyour account is too low to bring to positive‚Äù. Finally there‚Äôs is no real time support like Earnin App, where you can chat and get questions answered immediately. I‚Äôve sent in a ticket to Dave 8 hours ago and haven‚Äôt heard back and while one may say they need more time and one must bear personal financial responsibility, times are tough, meaning time is crucial. 

Positive feedback I hope you can take away from this, I love the idea and the app, however like the title says in comparison to your competitors which I do not work or have any interest in are better in terms of convenience. 

Thanks Guys!
title: Good App, just a step behind the competition.

review: Recently got my main bank account hacked which resulted in me having to wait to get my money back after the claim was finalized. I needed some cash and needed it pretty bad. Single mom of one and work full time but I'm paycheck to paycheck at the moment and what little cash I did have in my account was wiped out..which put me in a hard place. I remember trying to sign up for Dave before but my bank wasn't accepted. Fast forward to now..six months or so later and I tried again. Low amd behold it actually worked. I could only request 20 bucks but that's all I needed before I got paid the next day to get my son and I some food along with catfood. The microdeposit they do first to make sure a deposit would work took 3 days though to go thru before I was able to actually get the 20 dollars. When I did request it after getting the email stating I could request an advance, it was sent automatically into my account, which was nice.  So you have to get thru a few loopholes before getting your money..it's not automatic. So all in all, it works
title: Actually does work

review:
This was a useful and helpful app for hard times when I needed extra cash a few days in advance. When I recently found myself in that situation again, I tried to access my account but had forgotten the password. My account is linked to an old email address and when I reached out to Dave in order to get some help on how to transfer everything to my updated email address I was sent a ticket # and told that someone would be in touch. After 4 days, I reached back out to ask what was going on and have yet to receive an answer back. This is the second time in about 3 months that I have tried to have this resolved. What awful customer service. I do notice that they have no problem reaching into my bank account though to charge me for their ‚Äúservice.‚Äù I better get some sort of resolution or I will be reporting them to the BBB.

UPDATE ****

You people think you‚Äôre slick by putting a generic response on here so it looks like you‚Äôre engaging with each complaint. Someone‚Äôs gonna reach out to me huh? When? You sent that response 3 days ago. Haven‚Äôt heard a word. I‚Äôm now reporting you to the Better Business Bureau and taking necessary action so that you can‚Äôt keep robbing me of money for a service you are no longer providing. What a bunch of crooks! STAY AWAY FROM THE DAVE APP!!!!!!!
title: No one ever gets back to you
developerResponse: {'id': 12450772, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for letting us know! We'll check in with customer support and make sure they get back to you.", 'modified': '2019-12-17T18:27:42Z'}

review: Okay so I am big on not borrowing because like the Word says, ‚Äúthe borrower is the slave to the lender.‚Äù Proverbs 22:7 but I needed this and also I will be giving it back in a couple of days. So for now this is something as a try out, not for future reference. But it is cool. Just a tip for all who come across and read. Keep working, get your money and stack up. Don‚Äôt spend like all the broke people you know that go out every weekend and celebrate being broke. You youngsters out there that have on jeans that cost more than what you have in your wallet, be humble and spend less. For right now you are young and stack up. Later you don‚Äôt want to be that 30 year old struggling to learn how to save when all you have been doing is being impulsive with your money. ‚ÄúDo not spend more than what you make, go out less, make a meal at home which is way cheaper, also healthier, and Always thank God for the opportunity to manage the money that was given to you to deal with.‚Äù And remember how much you get paid is up to you, not the economy. There is always something better.
title: It‚Äôs alright

review: This was my first time using the app I was a little bit skeptical of putting my bank account information in the app once I finish putting in the information I had to wait two weeks for them to be able to advance me money they have to make sure that the company is legit which was fine with me now this is my third month using them and I love it they can advance you money really fast and it will be in your bank account the same day or three business days The only Con I have is that when you work for another business they will not advance you the whole money you have a choice of 10 15 $20 until you get your second paycheck from a new company which was fine with me but I also noticed that once they notice you‚Äôre getting the same check from the same business it takes them a minute to process on the app you can have your check on Friday has cleared but I noticed sometimes when I go to the app it still says it‚Äôs pending unfortunately you won‚Äôt be able to get  Advance  money but overall I like the app so far üòäüòâ
title: I love the app

review: I don‚Äôt quite understand why one time it will take the repayment from my paycheck and another, it takes it from my husbands?? His paycheck really has nothing to do with my account so I‚Äôm not sure how it got involved. Matter a fact, my husband tried to sign up as a client but it says only one person per bank account. Yet it uses BOTH paydays for paybacks?? I don‚Äôt understand why 2 different people with 2 entirely different jobs, pay, paychecks and paydays cannot both sign up. But if not, it does t seem fair, Dave to USE both our paydays to get paid back sooner. I hope what I‚Äôm saying makes sense. If I was single, the payback would only come out of MY paycheck. But depending on when I borrow, whoever‚Äôs payday is next, it makes me agree to that date in order to move forward. In all fairness, we should be able to have our OWN separate accounts considering we both make over $50,000 a year. Ok enough with that complaint , other than that, I HIGHLY recommend this app. Of all I‚Äôve checked, they are by far the fastest, easiest and COOLEST...I mean they save trees! How awesome is that?! Lol üòçüòçüòç Thanks Dave. But let my husband set up his own acct and this app will be a PERFECT 5 stars!! üòÅ
title: Easy, peasy app BUT....

And now you‚Äôre telling me you can only give me 20 when I was expecting to get the normal 75 I always get. You‚Äôve just screwed me and my family out of money for the rest of the week. We were expecting the advance and you just screwed us. I‚Äôve paid you 80 dollars every single time you advance me so you‚Äôve made quite a bit of money off of me and now you‚Äôre gonna tell me this? I don‚Äôt keep money in my account because you take 80 every single time I get paid. I have other bills I need to pay. review:
UPDATE:  The first time I used Dave, it actually took a little longer than the 3 days it was supposed to, but it did work and they withdrew the payment on the due date without a problem.  Dave does work for a small fee and you can decide the tip amount.  The first time worked, so this time I put in for the option that is supposed to pay out an advance in less than 8 hours for an extra fee of $2.99.  I don‚Äôt yet qualify for more than the $20 advance, but every little bit helps when money is tight.

UPDATE:  I requested an advance for $20 and have waited the 3 days it said I would have to wait before the advance went through.  Now it is 5 days until I am supposed to pay back the advance and I haven‚Äôt received anything at all.  I checked all my info and everything on my end is correct.  What‚Äôs the deal?

I am trying to rebuild my credit after my ex screwed it up with several fraudulent purchases.  I just requested my first advance of $20.  Planning to update after the whole process goes through.
title: A little slow, but works.

review:
You can only borrow up to $75 but there‚Äôs no interest and no fees; you can choose to pay a tip to support the app (and help plant some trees) but it‚Äôs not required. There are other apps that let you borrow more money but the ones I‚Äôve seen have secondary costs that I‚Äôm not willing to pay. For example if you want to use Earnin you have to let them track your location 24/7 to ‚Äúverify your employment‚Äù - this is after they‚Äôve already verified your employment by looking through your bank account for direct deposits and they wait until after you‚Äôve already signed up to spring this requirement on you but I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôre not doing anything shady with all that data üòí

The only negative point I can think of is you can only get approved if you get paid via direct deposit so a lot of the people that need these types of loans the most won‚Äôt qualify for them; that being said I don‚Äôt know how else they would be able to verify your income while still operating on optional tips and $1/month per user ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
title: Works great if you need a bit of extra cash before pay day

review: I signed up to get info when they offered a bank and so far it seems legit, I have added the digital card to my Apple wallet and will soon set up direct deposit to it once I land another better paying job. I don‚Äôt carry cash on me often and shop online most of the time so switching from a bank that charges fees for just about everything and demand you keep a certain amount to avoid fees for not having a $500 balance. Working part time and going back to school for a better career, keeping a job hasn‚Äôt been the easiest for me when I need to focus on school. Thank you for creating the app, it‚Äôs easy to use and understand and I can‚Äôt wait to get my new bank card in the mail, excited for the new chapter that awaits me! Plus also getting cash advances when I need them is brilliant, the dollar fee and the advancement fee plus tip are not much of a bother when you really need the money and they don‚Äôt let you forget to pay them back plus they put a limit on how much you should borrow which makes paying back a breeze. Thank you!! üôè
title: Switching Banks

review: I ran across many small loan apps like a payday loan without all the high interest rates and decided to go with Dave. I filled out all my information and linked my bank account which was a fast and simple process. After I got paid I decided to wait until I was 11 days from payday to tryout Dave since I was short on cash anyways. I chose the $75 wait a few days for deposit and it came into my account pretty quickly over a day I believe. After this one was paid back I took out another $75 with Dave and used the Option where you pay a fee like $4.95 or $5 to get it deposited into your account within 8 hours and guess what, it was in there almost instantaneously!! I haven‚Äôt had any glitches with this app and would like to start donating as well when I can as I am greatful for this app and his honest services offered to people who may live paycheck to paycheck or just short on cash and don‚Äôt need a lot and don‚Äôt want to be charged an arm and a leg. Thank you Dave I appreciate your service for us people in need! Will update review if needed.
title: Legit and works like a charm!

review:
I think like everyone else once learning about this app, your first thought is of safety. I debated whether or not I could trust it or if it was truly a scam. However, after researching the company it is quite credible and is on the Forbes list of startup businesses. 
It‚Äôs pretty simple, you DO have to give all your information but keep in mind that even businesses like banks and online shopping websites have the ability to be hacked so this is no different. 
After verifying your information, without much else, you‚Äôre prompted to give employer pay information and asked what amount would you like to apply for $25,$50,$75 (Those are the only options) with the guarantee you‚Äôll pay back on the next payday. The money is instantly deposited and that‚Äôs it. Pretty simple. 
If In need of a few dollars until pay day this is as good as it gets. You‚Äôre borrowing the money from yourself basically with a monthly $1 fee. 
‚ÄîBe advised EVERY business has their faults ESPECIALLY with customer service however I haven‚Äôt picked up on any that are alarming.
title: Hopefully an insightful review.
developerResponse: {'id': 5527716, 'body': 'Hi there, glad you had a great experience! Thanks for the kind words and review :)', 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:40:09Z'}

review: I am still in the process of canceling my Dave account. First reason being that since I have opened the account 3 months ago, the constant message of " I will let you know when you are approved". Seeing as it has been three months I would have believed that Dave would have been able to verify this information or have at least called or emailed me in regards to why. Second reason I canceled my Dave account is because this is a overdraft help app. I downloaded it just in case of emergency's, unfortunately since Dave has charged me for two months in a row of $1 dollar, I have received two months worth of account overdraft charges. Seeing as I removed all my money from that account the first month after the first overcharge not to get into another overdraft for the upcoming month, only to find out that indeed I had yet another overdraft charge from Dave. I find this frustrating as this is an app to help prevent overdrafts and not only have I not been verified after two months, but now have gotten two overdrafts from this company. Dave is designed to prevent overdraft fees, yet all I have gotten since being with Dave is overdraft fees. I am completely outraged and disappointed in this app and will encourage friends and family not to use this company.
title: Months of overdraft fees and Non Communication

review: When I first downloaded Dave I was looking for an instant payout. Once I seen that it was actually tracking my expenses so it didn‚Äôt allow for that because I wasn‚Äôt showing no income. That‚Äôs cuz I really didn‚Äôt have a job but I needed help. I loveeee love loveee the fact that it prevents you from digging your self in a bigger financial hole. I like that you have the option to get money within minutes at NO CHARGE to you. Couple technical difficulties the app had is how it tracks a paycheck. I get paid every Friday and it‚Äôs soo much evidence to show that but it says I don‚Äôt. So when I open my app I‚Äôm always in the negative because it says I have upcoming expenses and not enough money. What‚Äôs so cool tho is the fact they let you get money even tho DAVE thinks you will be in the weeds. Last bad thing is how long it takes b4 u actually can pull the maximum amount out. I feel DAVE should trust I will pay him back because dude your wired straight to my bank account. But other than that I‚Äôve had the app for about 3 months and I‚Äôm able to get dadvances whenever I need them. And it really is a lifesaver.
title: This should of been out a long time ago :)

review: Hey Dave. Yes I always get the advances that you send me and I highly appreciate it thank you. I have a Chase account as well which I‚Äôm gonna switch and put my account on my Chase card. Is there anything I can do as far as paying back the advance today and I don‚Äôt get a negative balance? Because I wanted to take another advance out but my Varo card isn‚Äôt working. I tried to put my Chase bank on there but it said that I have to pay the advance back first before I can switch. I guess just let me know if there‚Äôs anything you can do so I don‚Äôt get a negative balance and to where I can still take out another advance. Thank you Dave.
title: Advance Payback

review: Ever since I found Dave, I have not had to worry about anything as far as being short on money or overdraft fees. Dave saves me by advancing money automatically if there is a payment that‚Äôs about to come out of my account, and instead of being charged $35 for overdraft fee, Dave only charges $5 for an immediate advance to my account to cover bills/expenses. You can barrow up to $75 for free with no strings attached if you request it and are willing to wait 2-3 days for it to hit your account. Dave is absolutely amazing, and I would recommend it to anyone over other cash advance apps or companies. To be a member is only $1 a month, so for $12 a year Dave saves you in the background from any overdraft fees and provides you with a very easy to read layout of how much you can spend before your next payday with your bills covered. Give Dave a try, and don‚Äôt be skeptical about anything, I wouldn‚Äôt be writing such a long review of how great Dave is, if I personally didn‚Äôt believe strongly in this company. Thank you Dave for helping me anytime I need it.
title: I love Dave

review: When I first saw an ad for Dave I thought this would be great a app that lets you borrow your own money. Then when I saw they were going to be an online bank I applied for a Dave card. The advances have helped me but just recently I sent some money from my cash app to my Dave card. I have sent small sums of money to my Dave spending account for a while now. On April 3rd my friend sent me a couple thousand & it‚Äôs going to take 2 weeks to get the money sent back to my cash app account. On April 3rd I called both cash app support & Dave support I sent emails & even on the Dave live support in app. I was told from April 3rd-April 7th. That they did not see my transfer. On April 8th I tried not to think about it but I checked my Dave spending account & the money was there but wasn‚Äôt available I checked the list of transactions & saw a merchant hold on the money. I spoke to Dave live support & was told ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt support the ‚Äúcash out‚Äù feature to our products.‚Äù I explained to them I‚Äôm in the middle of a global pandemic due to the coronavirus-19 & I have to wait 2 weeks for my money & my bills were due on April 1st. I am definitely canceling my membership as soon as I change my direct deposit information‚ÄºÔ∏è
title: DO NOT recommend I am canceling my membership & never using Dave app again.

review: It seems like I continually have an issue with this app. One month everything is fine and then another there‚Äôs some bug. I‚Äôve used it for years but there‚Äôs continually an issue verifying my identity or pay date or something when nothing has changed in my work or personal life. I submitted a ticket last week about yet again identity verification for advances (apparently being a user for years and receiving advances in the past is wasted info in their system) and got zero help just a useless Zendesk assist who claimed they‚Äôd ‚Äúescalate‚Äù it. Never heard back within 24 hrs so I tried again, no help and same runaround. I opened a trouble ticket myself and emailed them on the 22nd and got a snarky ‚ÄúWell notify you when we have an update‚Äù on the 23rd. It‚Äôs now the one hour from being the 28th and no response. For customer service that‚Äôs abysmal. This shouldn‚Äôt be an issue to begin with yet here I am. I realize they may be busy but I‚Äôm nearing ten days without any solution or contact made other than me making it myself. That coupled with the fact Dave Banking was hacked and my personal information along with untold numbers of other people now at risk is reason enough to one star review. They clearly don‚Äôt put their customers first.

review: First time using Dave Card and I will say that it‚Äôs definitely my last with no recommendations to it as far as their card service. I logged in to check my balance all was there, however when I went to withdrawal some of my funds it was declined. Now I‚Äôll admit at first I couldn‚Äôt remember my pin, so after a couple of attempts it did lock. Because it seemed suspicious on their end.  no problem! I actually liked that feature. I was able to research how to reset the pin within the app, which stated to make sure you have the updated version, which I didn‚Äôt, so I got the updated version  and wala I was able to reset it. I then tried a different location just to make sure that‚Äôs all it was - me using the incorrect pin. But Nope, completely declined. Again and again. I made sure I was using the right pin. Then I see my available balance nothing but a pending .35 charge. I contact support through chat. The representative was nice and understood, and escalated it to try and get it resolved nonetheless this to me as a first time customer shouldn‚Äôt happen. First impression are everything. And I‚Äôm not impressed. I couldn‚Äôt recommend this card service knowing that this could happen to someone else.

review: It good. It does what it say it does. Only reason I am giving a three star because it is suppose to take out your repayment when you get paid on that certain day. And I know it knows when you get paid and what time but for some reason this last Wednesday it did not do that and it put me in a bad bind. I just enough money to cover my car insurance that was suppose to come out Wednesday morning. I do not get paid until Wednesday afternoon so I had saved this money for this day. Dave took that money from me so quick!!! Knowing I haven‚Äôt had a deposit of any money. I know they see that üëÄüëÄ! With my car insurance if the auto payment is declined then you have to pay a 15$ fee when I really can‚Äôt afford. So my savior ‚ÄúDave‚Äù became my heart ache üòñ.  I wrote them and all the did is send a screenshot of thing I signed stated Dave was gonna take it Wednesday. Like wow thanks for the help.... I had to advance one more time because of this but after I pay it next paycheck making sure no extra money in bank account first!!! I am not using Dave again. title: It‚Äôs good it whatever...
developerResponse: {'id': 9159640, 'body': "Hi lilmo2k12! Thanks for letting us know you're having this issue - let's get you in touch with our customer support team via the contact link at support.dave.com and we'll sort it out!", 'modified': '2019-06-14T01:21:22Z'}

review: I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the ease Dave has brought to my life. As someone who lives from paycheck to paycheck, sometimes it‚Äôs hard to keep up with the finances. Dave has helped me avoid overdraft fees to make the week a little easier with having some extra money to make sure I stay in the positive in between paychecks. The only thing I would say is be careful with your first request. The tip is automatically set and if you don‚Äôt pay attention to that you may be getting more taken out of your check come pay day! I completely missed that and now will have 90 instead of 80 coming out of my paycheck. May not seem like a lot, but for someone that lives on such a tight budget 10 makes a huge difference. Way better than those overdraft fees I would‚Äôve gotten so I‚Äôll take it! Not something I‚Äôd recommend to use over and over again, and definitely don‚Äôt take advantage! but I believe with all the other stuff this app has to offer, Dave will help me organize my finances and put me on track. Thanks, Dave!
title: Thanks, Dave!

review:
I‚Äôve only had this app for a couple days now and I absolutely love it! I wish that reviews told a bit more about what to expect in using these apps for the first time so no one is signing up in high hopes. So, I‚Äôm gonna do that here: First, it takes about 2 or 3 days to verify your next pay date, so if you are just starting out on this app, don‚Äôt count on getting the full $75 the same day you sign up! I was only able to be advanced $5, due to the pay date verification thing. Which was okay; I literally had no money at the time and had just completed my first week at a new job, so $5 was better than nothing. And since I was advanced that $5, I can‚Äôt request more until I pay that back. That‚Äôs very fair. 
Dave will withdraw the $5 plus interest (I think that is what that fee is?) plus a 15% tip that I chose to add. So, in total, on my next pay day, Dave will take $7.74 as a repayment of my loan. I am just keeping Dave on hand should I really need it again, in the future. It‚Äôs a nice lil app to have, definitely try it out!
title: Came in handy

review: Dave is a great app for anyone and everyone who not only needs a bit of cash early before payday but also for tracking expenses, watching for potential overdraft on your account and so on.  Easy to use, easy to connect your bank account to and just overall user friendly.  The only thing I wish they did was to offer to front a little more cash than they offer to do.  I switched banks and had an easy time changing them over on the app but my previous advance max was $75 and now it‚Äôs only a max of $20 which I don‚Äôt understand b/c my direct deposit of my paycheck is the same.  I hope they increase the advance amount as $20 doesn‚Äôt make much of a difference ($75 doesn‚Äôt make a huge splash either but at least its a grocery trip).  Some other apps I have used offer upwards of $250 - $350 advance amounts as long as you have the linked bank account with your verified direct deposit of your paycheck.  That obviously makes a much larger impact in getting that level of cash earlier than payday.  Otherwise, great app for anyone looking for a few extra bucks before payday.
title: Great app!

review: I thought I‚Äôd give this a try just to see if it would work in a pinch! I was able to connect to my bank and after a day or two I was advanced a small amount! It worked! I thought it was great for when I may need it in a pinch! But when came time to pay back the small amount it kept kicking me off my connection with my bank over n over ! Days of calling and trying to get resolved they withdrew the amount owed (nearly a week later) I was panicking of course cause it was nothing on my end! Spoke to my bank and was told it was the app itself that was the issue, but because of all this they lowered my borrow amount to $5 why would I borrow $5 and pay that fee??? Then got charged the $1 monthly fee, fine ! But two days later was charged $1 again! I can‚Äôt get any response to my inquiries! I want to cancel this app and NOT be charged $1 every other day! The $5 borrowing isn‚Äôt worth the fee , especially when my amount was lowered for something I had nothing to do with! I find it very sneaky that it kept disconnecting from my bank then finally connects after a week and makes more charges then should be! Wish customer service would help!
title: Loved the idea, but to many issues

review:
I 1st want to Thank you for loaning me the funds I needed to get to my Cancer Doctor Appt. on Monday I was really concerned I would not be able to get the gas to do so. 
But have to say was disappointed when you gave me no choice but to add a tip. I would like to have that option due to the fact that maybe I couldn‚Äôt afford a tip for that advancement, not to say I wouldn‚Äôt have in the future. Something you may want to think about for future. Again Thank you for Helping in a time of need.
Well this Morning I woke up to being in the red for 2 purchases that I made yesterday AFTER you had deposited the funds into my bank account. I am trying to reach out to my bank to clear Their error. I have all proof to verify when the money was deposited, and when the purchases were made. I paid extra to you to have it immediately deposited. I do not feel this is a error on your part or mine, but will get to bottom of it. This makes the 2nd time in a month that my bank has done this to me. Just wanted to make you aware of this situation if you see RED on my account.
title: Review on advance payday loan

review:
Dave had popped up on my Snapchat as an ad. While watching it I was definitely thinking that this concept is a very smart one. However it looked like just another budgeting app. Which are useful but in today‚Äôs world I feel like you do need those notifications to remind you of events or things you need to do. So I downloaded Dave, signing up was much easier than I thought it‚Äôd be, very secure how they go about the registering process. Selected the $75 advance now option, which for the money to be immediately deposited there is a $4.99 express fee but that‚Äôs 100% reasonable. They say it can take up to 8 hours for the money to appear in your account, mine showed up in less than 5 minutes!! What a convenience! You can also make an optional donation for nature conservation which I think is a nice touch. 
The app also graphs what your spending will look like until your next check, link all your purchases from your card connected to the bank account you use, etc. this is a wonderful app! Give it a try!
title: Convenient as can be!

review: While this app does deliver (one of) it‚Äôs promised claims of providing payday advances, it also takes money when it shouldn‚Äôt. I‚Äôve used it twice for cash advances twice, and it has delivered that money, but it took ‚Äútip‚Äù money when I specifically set the tip amount to zero. I‚Äôve repeatedly set that parameter, and it ALWAYS resets itself to $10, no matter how many times I adjust it. This is pretty scammy as far as I‚Äôm concerned, there is no excuse for it, and there is absolutely NO customer service available to fix this problem. The ‚Äútip‚Äù supposedly goes towards planting trees somewhere, and this is something I refuse to contribute to, as I already allocate my own money towards charity causes, and I‚Äôm obviously using this cash advance function because I‚Äôm very low on money and I can‚Äôt afford to spend it on such things at the moment; plus, the amount of money I‚Äôm paying for the advance is plenty high enough (6.7%) without paying an additional ‚Äútip‚Äù. I‚Äôve sent feedback through the app, and got no response whatsoever, thus I have no choice but to come here and give their app a bad review in order to get their attention this way. My advice: shop around for different apps before downloading this one.
title: Scammy
