review: My husband needed a little extra cash for an unexpected expense. He downloaded a similar app to Dave. The app was going to charge him a monthly fee of $10 and the earliest he could receive the money via direct deposit, was the next day. Half way through the next day, he still had not received the money in his account. So my husband was at work and trying to help him out, I figured I‚Äôd try other options. I had seen Ads for Dave and have also read good reviews about it. I downloaded Dave and set up an account for my husband and went through all the steps to receive a cash advance within about 10 minutes or less. Dave also only charges a monthly fee of $1 and I opted to pay the $3.99 fee to have the money deposited within 1 - 8 hours. To my surprise, the money I requested was in my husband‚Äôs account in less than 5 minutes!! So in total, from the minute I downloaded Dave to the minute the money was deposited in the account was less than 15 minutes! It‚Äôs a great choice if you need a little cash fast!

review: So I have quite a few auto-pay bills that come out of my account so you don‚Äôt have to worry about them. We knew we paid never had an issue paying but they couldn‚Äôt find the money order. We were told we had to pay our rent again since there was no record!!! I was In such a panic because paying rent AGAIN WOULD TAKE ME OVER AND LEAVE ME WITH NOTHING FOR A WEEK!! I remembered seeing an add for this app. I downloaded Dave and In 5 minutes I had $75 in my account!! There is a fee for a direct cash transfer for same day but it is applied to your total and will be paid when you pay the loan back. I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll ever need this app again but I have told EVERYONE I know about it. (P.s) leasing office finds money order for rent after we find and bring our receipt a few days later. title: I‚Äôm tired of begging

review:
Dave has been a pretty easy and very much helpful app to use when found I am stuck the last day or two before pay day for something that can not wait to be paid for (ie. food, gas, etc) Especially if some other unexpected charge occurs that week, like car issue or something alone those lines. The one largest downfall in my opinion is the charge of $5.99 to be able to use the money right away, on top of a tip that is required also.
 
There are other apps where the money is instantly moved into you account which makes the most sense in my opinion since the whole idea behind using Dave is to have the money that day, rather than 3 business days it takes if you chose to not pay the extra charge. I completely understand the concept of a charge for an instant transfer but a percentage of the amount of $ being moved seems more than sufficient to me.  Other than this I have not had any other issues this far.
title: Useful and easy app to use when in a pinch

The only ‚Äúinterest‚Äù is an optional tip that‚Äôs used to plant trees. My ONLY gripe with this app is this bug where it doesn‚Äôt get my pay period dates correctly and I call it a bug because my friends have the same thing happen to them. It recognizes all your direct deposits one day earlier than they actually are going to deposit . review: I am a new user with this app, but it has already helped me so much. I make a good income, but have racked up a lot of credit card debt & student loans that I am working on paying off. Because of this, some pay periods can be very tight for me if I don‚Äôt properly budget to the dollar. Occasionally I overdraft my checking account during these difficult pay periods, and I might still be several days away from getting paid. Dave truly saved me this week by loaning me $75 to avoid another overdraft fee, which I will pay back on payday. I didn‚Äôt have to ask a family member to borrow money, and best of all, it only costs a $1 fee per month membership fee. It was super easy to use, and I was able to pay an extra $5 (not due until later) to get the money delivered to my account in less than 8 hours (it actually only took 1 hour!). Truly grateful for this service and I would recommend it to anyone who finds themselves in a similar situation.
title: Dave is a life saver!! Incredibly easy to use

review: At first, I was a bit skeptical about the legitimacy of this app; but I really needed the money. Once I downloaded it, it asks for basic information first (i.e. name, date of birth, banking info, SSID) then takes you on to set up your payment schedule. Once that's processed you can go on to request your first loan. It gave me the option of choosing from my banking institution, which gave up to $75, or through Dave banking, which gave up to $100. I chose my bank and the next page gave amount options starting with $25, $50 and $75. After you choose the amount you have two delivery options; standard delivery which would be processed within 3 business days or express delivery would be delivered within 8 hours for a $4.99 fee. I chose the latter and the funds were in my account immediately. There's an option after to tip Dave any amount you choose. It's extremely user friendly and everything is self explanatory really so I appreciated the ease of use. So far, I am loving the Dave app!
title: Five Stars

So now I asking them can they overnight my check since it was a mistake on their part not to my surprise they don‚Äôt have that option. review: I‚Äôve tried several of the apps like Dave and I can say without a doubt it‚Äôs hands down the best app for cash advances and many other useful tools to help you navigate the financial world. Dave is a straight forward with no hidden requirements. If you sign up for Dave and meet the simple criteria that are clearly stated it makes getting a cash advance so easy a five year old could do it. Very flexible and straight forward. If you keep up your end of the repayments he rewards you with the option of a larger advance the next time. No complicated points system, no uncertainty and no constant connection problems like many of the other wanna be apps. This brings back the simpler times when you keep up your end and Dave is there to help the next time it‚Äôs needed. Can‚Äôt say enough good things about this app. It brings back a personal feel to a system in which you are just a social security number or a credit score. Highly recommend giving him a try!
title: Much more than I expected

It links to your bank an customer service says they can‚Äôt unlink it only option is to change banks by adding another card. That‚Äôs the only complaint I have. title: Real

review:
Then I went a month or two where I didn‚Äôt need help and when I did *they* wanted to choose how much they thought I needed. Last month I went in hoping to borrow the $70 it allowed me to in the first two months but they claimed I only needed $20. 

Last night was the best yet. I get s notification that me balance might be in the negative. So I log into the bank and I had 4 overdraft charges, at the time I didn‚Äôt know it was a bank error so I went into Dave to see what they‚Äôd let me borrow and they said they couldn‚Äôt help at this time! However, within the hour the bank refunded all the charges because their transfer system was down (I initiated a transfer last week that should have cleared in time for yesterday and they owned up to their error)

However, what we have here is another useless ‚Äúbank‚Äù that claim to help when needed but only pushes you to use their banking services. I‚Äôll be closing this account. I‚Äôm in the process of moving from a local credit union to the Navy FCU. I have $500 overdraft protection with them. For as much as I hate federal banks, these smaller banks can‚Äôt offer the technology or the protection larger banks can.

title: Really saved us

review: At first I was wondering what the hype was about and you know things were a bit rough for me for a few weeks. Dave basically checks your income and provides you borrowed money depending on the income etc it‚Äôll be a different amount. Nothing crazy for me it‚Äôs like 75$ so it‚Äôs basically an advance on you next check Incase you don‚Äôt have it now for whatever reason. App is so user friendly and looks amazing( the developer deserves appraise) so easy to use once you set up everything. Takes 3 business days to receive want toward your bank account. title: Honestly an awesome app. I believe in Dave lol

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for months. And it was fantastic. Fast, and reliable. But now In this past month I‚Äôve had issue after issue. I reached out for help from the Dave support team when for 3 days straight it said couldn‚Äôt connect to bank account. That was on September 17 I didn‚Äôt get a response until September 25 after I had fixed the issue myself. I was able to get an advance. And everything was fine. Now the app won‚Äôt update my transaction history. I got paid 4 days ago and the app is saying it can‚Äôt give me an advance because I missed a paycheck. I try to manually add in the paycheck it won‚Äôt allow me. There‚Äôs no way to send in a screenshot of my bank account transaction history to manually update the transaction history on the app. However  It was able to take the money from my account to pay back the prior advance.  I try to refresh the app, redownload the app, logout and log back in. Nothing is working. The app is pretty much not worth having at this point. Why have an app that‚Äôs suppose to help you out in a pinch. If you can‚Äôt actually use it.
title: This app is either amazing. Or gets all buggy and doesn‚Äôt work at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 11003967, 'body': "Oh no! üò± Thank you for letting us know you're having this issue. Please get in touch with our customer support team at davecares@dave.com (please include your full name, email, phone number and the subject of this review), and we'll sort it out!", 'modified': '2019-10-01T18:08:51Z'}

review: I would like to start off by saying the app advertises that it will send you money instantly, and almost all you have to do is download the app - well, that‚Äôs not the case. You will have to download the app for free, but then you will have to connect your bank information and possibly wait a couple of days for Dave to verify your bank info and make sure he can make deposits for you.  After that‚Äôs done, sometimes you won‚Äôt be approved for the full 75$ - it might start out as $10, or $15, so just be aware of that.  The more often you lend from Dave, the higher amounts he will begin to lend you, and you can choose to leave a tip for Dave to support the app or not. But it is truly a great way to help you out when you do need gas or groceries or might be about to overdraft in your bank account!  It‚Äôs an amazing thing, and not a lot of apps these days are actually willing to help and be positive financially, so thank you Dave for being that for your customers.
title: Lifesaver... or... bill saver
developerResponse: {'id': 5527784, 'body': "Hi Shelby, really glad to hear you've had a good experience! Thanks for the review :)", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:49:58Z'}

review: So I was in a situation, I had paid my electric bill from their over the phone service, it hadn‚Äôt been taken out of my acct due to the holiday over the weekend. My husband then came home and told me he purchased contacts, a year supply, which will end up overdrawing our acct! In his defense he didn‚Äôt know I was paying on the electric earlier than expected. In my defense I didn‚Äôt budget for a year supply of contacts. Anxiously awaiting for the bill to be withdrawn or my check to deposit, not knowing which will clear first. Well, I have 18 pending transactions and after my electric clears I‚Äôll be over drawn $20 and my pending transactions give me $30 fee each! Fast forward to the end of the holiday weekend it‚Äôs 6 am and I see I am overdrawn. Downloaded this app in a frenzy and immediately got an advance!! Are you kidding me? Not only am I in a pinch but dude, there is tons of helpful budgeting tips on this app. Okay I‚Äôm sold, thanks Dave!!!!!!
title: Saved me from over 600 fees!! From one overdraft but 18 pending!

review:
The app automatically updated my next pay date to the 3rd of July and since I was paid on the 7th I‚Äôve had issues ever since . I have used this app to advance $50 about 4 times on the past 2 months and paid back and tipped every time . However, now I cannot get an advance because the app says it‚Äôs still looking for a missed paycheck from the 3rd of July. The app recognizes I was paid on the 7th and 21st of July but when I request funds it says missing paycheck . 

I have deleted and reinstalled app and tried changing the dates for main paycheck but nothing works . I‚Äôve emailed support 4 days ago and no reply so far, they did say it was a lot of volume so I‚Äôm guessing this might be a bug for others . 

Update: I changed and updated main  paycheck and now I‚Äôm only able to borrow $20 because income is too low, first time the app gave me this message in the 3 months I‚Äôve been using it now . Still waiting for support. In halfway satisfied and that‚Äôs cause the app really helped me in the past, but this is the first time it let me down
title: Sometimes it works, sometimes it lets you down
developerResponse: {'id': 10021614, 'body': "Hi Stoned Hokage, thank you for letting us know! We'll check in with customer support and make sure they get back to you.", 'modified': '2019-08-06T00:36:44Z'}

review:
When I first started using Dave, I wasn‚Äôt able to request money due to me losing my job and not having any way to pay Dave back by the time I needed to so I was curved. 
Finally, I landed a new job and redownloaded this app and I could finally request some money. I requested 25 dollars the first time and it came through within three days (literally got it in the account the next day after I requested it) and the next time I requested 75 dollars. They sent it immediately! Of course I used the express pay which is pretty cheap and totally worth it! I really enjoy this app and find it easy to use. I especially love that Dave provides an option to find odd jobs around your area to make extra cash! I haven‚Äôt gotten too deep into the app yet, but the money is sure and the payback date is the perfect amount of time to receive money from your job or whatever your income is coming in from, and pay it all back when it‚Äôs needed. Dave, you are amazing !!
title: Great APP

review:
So, I was a long time user of the app Earnin but when they stopped working with my bank I could no longer use the app. My friend has told me to download Dave but I was skeptic at first. But after putting two and two together, I realized the $9.99 a month usage fee was basically the same thing as me ‚Äútipping‚Äù on the Earnin app. So, I went ahead and downloaded Dave. Sign up was very simple and easy and I was able to request cash right away. Probably my ONLY two issues is that you‚Äôre only able to take out $75. However, on Earnin I was approved for $600 max because of my income. Also, Dave can only advance you one time before a paycheck. So if I take out $75 on one day - I cannot be advanced anymore until my next payday when I pay Dave back. 

Overall, it‚Äôs helpful for when I need a little bit of extra cash when I‚Äôm running low but not as helpful for getting me through a longer stretch between paychecks. Will keep using the app for now and look forward to any new updates and improvements!
title: Helpful but could do more!

review: Guys I‚Äôm seriously shook. I am a 20 year old college student who constantly finds herself broke by the upcoming pay period. I had $2.34 in my bank account and I was downloading every ‚Äúquick money making‚Äù app there was. I signed up to be a Uber driver and surveys and everything. I just needed $20 to put gas in my car so I can make it to next paycheck! This app, WITHIN SECONDS, let me borrow up to $75 after connecting my bank. The app analyzes your transactions and finds your most reoccurring paychecks and let‚Äôs you borrow based off your income. Whenever your next pay period is, the app automatically takes out that amount you borrowed. SO YOU GET CREDIT AS WELL!!! I don‚Äôt need to worry about forgetting to pay Dave back because they do it automatically. This is amazing I think for college students struggling to make it to next paycheck and trying to build credit. NOT A SCAM. YOU GET REAL MONEY. BUT - it is YOUR OWN MONEY in advance to your payroll. So this is not FREE money, but REAL, FAST, HELPFUL money.
title: SHOOK

review: I‚Äôm sure I speak for everyone when I say I was super skeptical about this working. However, I found myself in a little pinch and needed some extra cash. I downloaded the app yesterday, signed up yesterday, added my bank yesterday and had $75 within 20 min. I had to pay an extra $4.99 but that comes out when you pay it back. It‚Äôll come directly out of my account so I don‚Äôt even have to remember. I‚Äôm SUPER happy!!!!!! I haven‚Äôt figured out how to change the amounts yet as it did have my biweekly check amount incorrect and a few bill amounts incorrect but I‚Äôm sure after playing around with it, I should be able to figure it out! Sorry if this review seems rushed that‚Äôs just how excited i am that this actually worked. No scams, nothing. I pray it always works for whenever I need it. Oh and it does cost $1/month but $1 is a lot cheaper than some of these other apps charging $10-$20 bucks/month to budget your account and send you money.
title: Amazing!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 6029741, 'body': "We're so happy you love the app! We definitely recommend checking out support.dave.com for assistance with your questions. Thank you so much for taking the time to review!", 'modified': '2018-11-20T19:08:39Z'}

review: They‚Äôll allow you to borrow and schedule a payback date on your normal pay date from your employer, but when your pay period is approaching they‚Äôll take the money out days before you get paid inconveniencing you. Whatever money you have in your account they‚Äôll snatch it on a day you didn‚Äôt schedule. They don‚Äôt respond to emails. They truly don‚Äôt care if they took your last when they weren‚Äôt suppose to. I literally had $30 to my name that I borrowed to get gas and food for myself and my son and they snatched it without responding to any of my emails. But wait there‚Äôs more I borrowed from a friend again and they took that $37 out of my account that I was going to get food with, but couldn‚Äôt. I went to bed starving, pregnant and have yet to hear back from ‚ÄúDAVE‚Äù there‚Äôs so many more apps better and convenient this is why I stick with Earnin because they‚Äôre organized and only take from me when I get paid which I‚Äôm okay with. OH AND EARNIN HAS GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE SKILLS THE COMMUNICATION IS UNMATCHED. Don‚Äôt waste your time with Dave they‚Äôll rob you and you won‚Äôt hear a peep and won‚Äôt let you borrow after they‚Äôve taken money on an unauthorized date until it‚Äôs convenient for them.
title: Don‚Äôt Waste Your Time
developerResponse: {'id': 17939361, 'body': "Hey there! So sorry to hear this. Your payback should align with your payday. If it‚Äôs showing an incorrect payback day when confirming your advance, your income may not be set up correctly. Please reach out to Dave's team at davecares@dave.com and mention App Review in the title of your email and we'll help figure this out and try to make it right.", 'modified': '2020-09-17T17:50:06Z'}

review: I don‚Äôt ever write reviews. Ever. But this app and whomever runs it (I secretly pray it‚Äôs a glasses wearing bear named Dave) has or does everything he claims and has come to my rescue more than once. The realness is in the fact that it‚Äôs not a scam and I believe this app actually wants to help people make ends meet and that‚Äôs rare in this world. Dave is like that non-self interested person you meet but don‚Äôt know if is fake or not because they‚Äôre so genuine and honest and generous there‚Äôs no way this person could be real. Dave is not fake. Dave ‚Äòthe bear wearing glasses‚Äô that I pray is the real entity who designed and runs the app even though I know it‚Äôs a human or several rather, has helped me countless times and I don‚Äôt even notice or remember I pay so little in return - only what gets lent to me and a very small like a dollar or maybe as many as five - I can‚Äôt recall but that‚Äôs it that‚Äôs the end of it. It almost makes me believe in humanity again that Dave exists so thanks Dave! big hugs
title: Dave is Real

review:
Just to give a bit of background info, I‚Äôm a junior in college who has a very expensive degree and lives 100% paycheck to paycheck. I can usually budget quite well, but this month I was over budget by a bit, and found myself needing to fill up with gas a couple days before payday. As per usual, that close to payday I had no money, so I downloaded Dave after seeing ads for it all over the internet. The app is so simple to set up, and everything gets verified very quickly. I chose the expedited delivery option, which costs extra, but the money was deposited seriously within seconds. They don‚Äôt charge you for the quick deposit until you get paid, which is also great. With no money in your account, Dave is a lifesaver. And it pulls the money out right when you get paid, no hassle at all. 
If you‚Äôre a college student who needs some extra money from next paycheck for this weeks gas or groceries; Dave is the app for you. 
10 stars!
title: Awesome.

review: First for a few days it was not letting me get an advance because it says that I wasn‚Äôt showing enough proof of direct deposits, even though I get 2 direct deposits a month from my second job, and I deposit cash 4 days a week because I‚Äôm a stripper. There is more than enough money in there to prove that I can pay it back. Then when it was giving me the option to apply for an advance, I tried to get a $75 advance and it brought me to a section to put my debit card info in. Which made no sense because I thought it was supposed to go to my connected checking account. I put in my card info and since it expires next month it would not accept it. I really need this $75 advance because after my most recent bills clear I will only have $9 left and I don‚Äôt get my direct deposit until Friday, so I wanted to borrow $75 so my $9 wouldn‚Äôt get over drafted. It said that my card needs to have at least 3 months left on it, and I don‚Äôt have my new card yet. I tried multiple times and it wouldn‚Äôt work. What is the point of connecting your bank account if they can‚Äôt send money to your bank? This makes me really mad. I just don‚Äôt see the point in downloading this app.
title: Doesn‚Äôt work
developerResponse: {'id': 5527805, 'body': "Hi TabbyDarling, we're so sorry to hear you've been having difficulties with the app. Your experience is incredibly important to us and we'd love to help you get through those tough times. If you can email friends@dave.com we'd be happy to assist you.", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:51:50Z'}

review:
I downloaded this on a whim. Even though it hasn‚Äôt happened to me yet, I‚Äôm always worried that my autopay bills will cause an overdraft fee one day. It‚Äôs better to be safe than sorry, I guess! I‚Äôve used the advance feature twice now, and it couldn‚Äôt be easier. I‚Äôm happy to pay a few dollars extra as a tip because I like supporting the developers. 

The one thing I wish this app supported would be more options for an atypical pay schedule. For example, I typically get paid three times a month: every other Friday, and then another paycheck on the last Friday of the month. They‚Äôre all from the same source, so Dave codes it the same way. Sometimes it aligns perfectly, but most months it doesn‚Äôt, so it would be nice to have an option for ‚Äúlast Friday of the month‚Äù or something like that. Or just a way to differentiate between regular paychecks and commission paychecks. 

Anyway, keep it up, this app is great!! Thanks!
title: I love this as a ‚Äújust in case‚Äù app!
developerResponse: {'id': 5527842, 'body': "Hi there, great idea! Thanks for the advice. Your experience is important and we love hearing feedback. If you'd like to submit ideas on how to make the app better, please feel free to email davethebear@dave.com!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:55:28Z'}

review: Very cool app. I don‚Äôt get paid til the end of the week and needed a little extra cash, personally I only got 20 bucks but it seems like depending on how much you make at your job, how often you‚Äôre paid, and based on your banking history they give you an amount that they can spot you. Much better than a pawn shop being as that last time I borrowed from a pawn shop there was more to pay in fees/interest. With Dave there is no fees or interest as advertised , however if you want to be spotted the money quickly there is an optional 2.99 charge that I‚Äôm assuming I‚Äôll pay once I pay back the amount I owe to them this week, otherwise you can wait up to 3 business days for it to appear in your account. The 2.99 isn‚Äôt much and it says to allow  up to 8 hours but personally I got it within 30 minutes. Highly recommend as of now and very excited to see how my experience goes with ‚ÄúDave‚Äù in the future !
title: Very Cool App !

review:
I thought this app was so cool at first. But after 1 month I tried to get a loan and was told no because I needed $115 or more in my account to be approved which I thought was weird because it just defeats the purpose of the app . If everyone has that money in there account why would they need $75 from Dave which a pretty low amount compared to other apps. It shouldn‚Äôt matter how much money you have in your account just as long as when you get your paycheck deposited you are able to pay back the loan which a requirement to even use there app. For a month I had no issues with them because I get paid from my employer every week . Now all of sudden I need to have a certain amount of money in my account. Really Dave ???  

For those looking for a great app go with EARNIN THEY ARE ABSOLUTELY AMAZING . They give you more money and they do not charge at all!!! You do not need to have money in your account to get a loan.  Just a job and a bank account.
title: Warning

We'd love to make sure all of your future engagements with the app go smoothly, please email friends@dave.com for additional assistance!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:53:33Z'}

review: I‚Äôve had the Dave‚Äôs app for about 2-3 months. For the first month they were totally good. I would receive my money early and pay Dave back on the date agreed upon. Now all of sudden the last 2 times I‚Äôve used Dave‚Äôs app, if I receive any form of money before my date before I pay Dave they take some of my money out of my account. Today my friend sent me 25 dollars and Dave decided they would take 15 of it. I‚Äôm not due to pay Dave until next week on Tuesday. I always pay on time so there is no reason why they should be taking money before my due date. Now I‚Äôm short on gas and I don‚Äôt know how I will make it to work before my payday. This is bull. I don‚Äôt appreciate it and now I have to try and borrow cash since Dave‚Äôs app takes money from account ahead of time. This is not fair and greatly unappreciated. Once I pay Dave back this will be the last time I ever use this app. I appreciate the money I was given before but these last two times have left me in a bind. What is the point of signing the agreement that I would pay you back on a certain day when you are gonna take money ahead of time? And not even the full amount.
title: Dave steals from my account
developerResponse: {'id': 9577437, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for alerting us to this. Please contact our customer support at support.dave.com and we'll help you out!", 'modified': '2019-07-09T23:05:45Z'}

review:
When it comes to payday loans and advances I feel the fees are very high and financially not a good look. When I first saw this app I was very unsure and not comfortable I will admit but then I used it more and realized it‚Äôs really a great app.

One of the key features is DAVE will spot you up to $75 and if you pay the $3.99 fee it‚Äôs worth it. You get the money within minutes to your account at least for me it did and I would imagine for most banks it will as well. Now that is a small amount and I wish they would up it to $200 after so many completed pay backs and maybe that is in the works but that would be really nice.

The second feature is called side hustles and in this coronavirus era we all could use a little bit extra money as things are tight. There is plenty of great features in this DAVE app and I highly recommend everyone download. It just makes sense and good to have!  Very safe and secure!
title: Money in quick time in a bind

review:
I‚Äôve never written a review for an app before because nothing ever warranted one, but this app is pretty cool. I wrote a check out and forgot about some auto payments coming out of my account, then randomly saw an ad for this on Facebook. It‚Äôs not a huge loan -$75 may be laughable for some but considering I was only going to overdraft by a few dollars, the overdraft fee for my bank is so massive, and I would be getting my next paycheck a day or two after the overdraft would happen, this was worth it. 

If you‚Äôre just the average joe like me, needing a little cushion until pay day, this app is legitimate. I paid the $4.99 to get the express deposit so I can‚Äôt say how long the standard deposit actually takes? But the express deposit was within minutes. 

Anyways, if you‚Äôre sitting there wondering if it‚Äôs a real app or a scam, it‚Äôs real and very helpful when you‚Äôre in a pinch. Also...pretty cool that the (optional) tip out goes towards planting trees. Set up took maybe 5 minutes, and another 5 minutes passed, and the $75 was in my account. Totally worth it if you are responsible with money management, understand that the payback date/amount is automatically withdrawn from your account, and just need the safety net when you act a fool like I did üòú 

5 Stars - shout out to this app for finally being something real amongst all the scams out there. The help is highly appreciated!
title: Real review, real person - legitimate app

review:
I‚Äôve never had any issues with apps that were able to get me some part of my paycheck sooner than pay day, to give an honest review Dave is the worst. I needed the money at one time, but it made me wait weeks to use the service and took out a dollar, other apps didn‚Äôt make me do that, not only that you have to press like 20 buttons to cancel the service, which Is bad business practice. The cancel service is not even put in plain sight instead it‚Äôs a small text blended to the back ground making it harder for most customers to find where to cancel their membership. 

Keep in mind I never used the service at all, I wasn‚Äôt able to get any form of money from Dave and it still withdrew money from my account, I‚Äôve worked with customer service for billing and cancelling services. If a customer claims to not use the service, I look into it, and if it shows what customer claims, I refund them, even if it‚Äôs as small as a kid accidentally purchasing something, we‚Äôre able to credit the customer what ever purchases that weren‚Äôt authorized. If they refund me the money they withdrew for this ‚Äúmembership‚Äù I might bump this review up to 2 stars.
title: Bad business practice
developerResponse: {'id': 12979654, 'body': 'Hey there! Sorry to hear about the not than stellar experience. We appreciate the feedback! ', 'modified': '2020-01-17T18:07:32Z'}

review: I was desperate to have quick cash for few days before holiday. And it did helped. Because my older son needs black pant that required for his job. Both of his pants ripped. Dave the cash money came through. It made my day to go purchase pants for my son for his job. And also gas to put in my car. Holiday eat up my $ to spends for all gifts for my children and some relatives and some good friends. I think Dave the cash app is good and helpful which it starts in small amount until it paid Back in full at first pay due then next and next, then it will increase the amount to $100 then $200. I‚Äôm starting at $75. It‚Äôs not bad for now. But small fee is $4.99 if u want quick cash ASAP. If not need quickly, then u will not charge for fee and they have 3 business days to get your loan directly deposit in your bank account. I will recommend this for anyone who need quick ASAP OR EMERGENCY for small amount in extra. It‚Äôs fine by me. üòâ
title: Very helpful in need.

review: My family depends a lot on each other during a time in need. Fortunately, this time in need was unique for my family. My mother was moving out of an abusive household and my sister was finally moving to a place that could accommodate her and all of her children. With that, in two months I sent over $1000 to them and during that time my alternator went out and certain personal goals were approaching their deadlines. But it seemed like I could make it check to check until I recently sent my sister money for her deposit. When I had seen I sent her more than I had left to live off of for two weeks, I knew I was in trouble. Then, I finally followed the link to a SC ad and the $75 I got from Dave carries me through the last week. I‚Äôm also using the budgeting tools to help me get ahead in life finally. Some may see it as irresponsible money management, but I see it as a way to help me help my loved ones in emergencies.
title: Helping Me Help Others
developerResponse: {'id': 6029768, 'body': "This was so great to hear. We're really happy that you were able to use the app to help you out. Thanks for being a wonderful support for your family, and thank you for taking the time to review!", 'modified': '2018-11-20T19:14:10Z'}

review: Read lots of reviews before downloading but this app is perfect for me! Had a lot of financial problems & I‚Äôm still getting back on my feet, which takes a bit of work when you‚Äôre low income. I feel like I would get into a trap with the bank because of fees and it is so hard to get ahead of them once they pile up! I‚Äôm happy to pay a service fee + optional tip to keep my account in the black when things are tight, especially when most times it‚Äôs a matter of my small bills being due *just* before payday. ANYWAY. Downloaded the app, got set up, and like some other folks experienced, I was not immediately qualified to borrow. It made sense in that I just got paid, even though all that money immediately went to bills. I shrugged because I‚Äôm used to being broke, and went about my day. But then I got a notification that told me I could be spotted $20! I would say within 24 hours? It was just what I needed too. Thanks, Dave!
title: So far so good!
developerResponse: {'id': 5527830, 'body': "Hi there, glad that the app was helpful! We review accounts regularly and update your advance amount regularly. I'd definitely recommend checking back soon!", 'modified': '2018-10-16T17:54:35Z'}

review:
Dave has saved me a lot of money on overdraft fees. I first used the service a few years ago while still in College and was really pleased with the company so I remained a member. Firstly, it‚Äôs amazing how affordable the service is - $1/ month. Amazing value for all that is included, especially as the company continues to expand exponentially. 

I am excited to see what this company will accomplish in the future because they certainly are investing heavily in their growth with constant updates, new products & services, as well as providing value through research and financial literacy. The app is user friendly and well constructed. And the user experience is top quality. 

 There are other personal finance apps but Dave is unmatched. Their mission is to serve people by helping them take control of their finances, and educate them on how to better manage money. I am so pleased and grateful for this company. Thank you so much, team Dave!
title: Incredibly useful resource!

review: I used to find the Dave app so helpful. Leaky, it‚Äôs been quite the contrary. Although, financially it is helpful for being a bit shirt on cash, the technical issues are over weighing the benefits. Dave wants to stay connected you your bank, which is easy - you just sign in. However, after signing in, and saving the password, the Dave app is consistently trying to sign in with the INCORRECT information which has locked me out of my bank account multiple times a week, causing me to have to call customer service to unlock it. With times like these due to covid-19, call volumes are ridiculous as far as wait time. I waited 2 hours to get a hold of my bank, just for the Dave app to cause my account to lock again the next day. This will be my very last time using this app. It is beyond frustrating. Yes, the Dave app is very helpful when it comes to getting cash when you need it. I would rather not have the money if I have to deal with multiple issues like this a few days during the week. It also takes about a week for a response from support. Do better Dave team.
title: Dave app is annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 14546620, 'body': "Oh no! üôàWe'll check in with Customer Success and make sure they get back to you!", 'modified': '2020-04-08T16:15:03Z'}

review:
I work for myself so I want sure that Dave would work for me since I don't receive regular paychecks. To my surprise, Dave does and does so rather quickly! You get two options for receiving your money: within a few hours or a couple days  the faster option does cost  about $2 but if you need money fast it's not a big deal. I think it would be a neat feature that every time you pay Dave back on time your borrowing amount increases. I also like the idea of how the  "tips" work and the flexibility of choosing an potion that's right for you. All in all, a well done app that definitely has what a consumer needs in mind! Thanks, Dave! 

P.s. If you have a significant other, it'd probably be best to tell them what Dave is before they ask where you magically got money. Then arises the question "Who the hell is Dave and why is he giving you money?!" Haha. My poor boy friend. It all made for a good laugh at least! Thanks again, Dave
title: Dave Rocks!

review: So I downloaded this when I had just gotten a new job and was in the weird period where you only have 1 week of work on your first check and it takes a few checks to balance spending/ income back out. Well I had maxed my only credit card because it was cheaper than payday loans but making payments had me short on other things. The $75 max is perfect, it‚Äôs enough to fill your gas tank or get some groceries and you won‚Äôt go broke again paying it back. It‚Äôs very easy to fall into the loop of getting a loan every paycheck since you have to pay about $80 to pay it back but Dave is a way better option than payday loans. I was stuck in a vicious cycle of payday loans a few years ago and you do not want to go down that road. I‚Äôll use Dave every time if I ever need extra cash. They also say ‚Äúwithin 8 hours‚Äù for the instant pay but in my experience it has never taken longer than an hour

review:
I thought the Dave app was a joke because it sounded too good to be true, but decided to give it a try anyway. I‚Äôve been loving it for the most part ever since downloading the app. My only two complaints are that 1. oftentimes when I click on something to edit it, a different bill pops up instead and 2. I had to delete most of the bills I‚Äôd inputted because it was giving me the wrong balance (didn‚Äôt match my bank balance) and then re-enter them as they came in. I will say that the last part may be due to user error so take that with a grain of salt. However, the main reasons I downloaded the app was due to the fact Dave predicts overdraft fees and also will spot you funds to keep you out of the red.
I recently used this feature with the express delivery option ($4.99) and my money was in my bank account before the 8 hour delivery time was up. I don‚Äôt plan on relying on Dave in order to be financially responsible, but I do love the idea of waiting assistance if I ever get in a pinch.
title: Great App

But I actually gained, not only $50 in advance but so many helpful tips to help me budget my money because I am absolutely terrible when it comes to that. Dave my man you are defiantly a life savor. This is not a fake review, this is an actual person that was in need of a hand, and Dave reached out and got me. Thank you for the help and and fast services Dave. review:
I was skeptical like everyone else about downloading Dave. I was gonna try a different app but they needed time sheets or time clock records before they can give you money. As soon as I linked my bank account Dave found my direct deposits from work. So for $1 a month I can put in my monthly budget, see how much I will have after all of my bills, get notifications (if I want) notifying me I‚Äôm close to overdrafts AND I can borrow money once per pay period if I need it. My first loan I chose $75 with the $4.99 express fee, and left a 10% tip. I got my money INSTANTLY! Not saying everyone will but I have. 

Best part about Dave is he won‚Äôt take your loan payment or monthly charge if you don‚Äôt have enough money! And every percentage of tip plants trees in Africa!

Thanks Dave for helping me out! My boyfriend and I have been fixing our new home and sometimes money is tight. It‚Äôs great to have a backup plan without taking a payday loan or a personal loan.

I emailed them the response had nothing to do with why I emailed them and when I responded to them clarifying my question I still was told ‚ÄúI needed to keep my balance above 105$ to borrow (which is new I guess beats the purpose of needing the loan, however here we are) I have since tried to use Dave twice including today and now I have a balance in my bank account of 106$ and it‚Äôs still saying I need to have 105$ to get the loan and I have hit the update button so many times randomly today with no change 
Completely disappointed in what was the very BEST APP I had used in a long time üòè

So 24 hours go by and nothing, 48 hours go buy still nothing so I thought maybe something happened and my message didn‚Äôt go through so I message them again. Same as before 24 then 48 hours go by and nothing. I tried one last time about 3 days ago to message them and they just will not respond. review:
I had a suspicion that there was some catch or clause with Dave, because I didn‚Äôt imagine that such a useful app would exist without one. However, I can safely say that there is no catch with Dave. 

I downloaded the app a couple of weeks ago, but never ended up setting it up. Last night however I was in need of a couple extra dollars and I thought, hell why not. Went ahead and linked it to my bank account and followed the steps. I asked for a $50 advance on my check which hits on Friday, and was given the option of standard or expedited. Because of the time sensitive nature I went ahead and ordered the expedited for an additional $4, and I had the money in about 2 hours (although the app says it can take up to 8 in certain situations). 

So, on Friday $54 dollars will come off my check with no interest. I essentially borrowed $50 from myself. I have no cons with this app. Five stars.

review: A great tool for when you‚Äôre in a bind and need an advance. I recently had my pay schedule changed from bi weekly to the 15th and 30th and my finances have been a bit out of wack, so getting an advance has helped me during those times where I‚Äôm lower than usual. Beware that it takes two pay checks for them to track your income which is needed to give you a larger advance than $25, this wasn‚Äôt clear so I reached out to ask and they responded quickly and told me, but even that amount was good for me so no complaints. You can choose to get the advance almost immediately which costs a few dollars but the good thing is that you aren‚Äôt charged the fee until you have to pay back the advance. Until they can track your income they will make you pay it back in a week but once they can track it then they make you pay it back the next time you get paid. Highly recommended.

review:
If I could give Dave more than 5 stars, believe me when I say I would! Dave is such an awesome and helpful app to have and use. Do not worry about overdrawn funds from your bank account and having to pay overdraft charges anymore because you can easily request for cash advance and pay it back when you receive your next paycheck. It all depends how much money you make and if you have direct deposit. I am qualified and approved to request up to $75, now; if you want and need cash the same day there is a fee of $4.99. You can also leave a tip in the amount you desire to give. I am more than thankful I came across the Dave app for the fact that it helps me financially when I am running low on funds. Did I mention about not having to pay subscription fee? Yup, that is right! You don‚Äôt have to pay for having the app which is great!! To be honest, Dave is the only app I truly trust!

Thank you, Dave!
title: 5 Stars

review:
I don‚Äôt even know how this app is a thing. Long story short, my spending habits changed because of a parking enforcement issue where I worked. So I went from paying basically nothing to $17 a day for a parking. Thought I was doing well with budgeting until I went to park one day and my card was declined. I don‚Äôt get paid until next Friday. I guess algorithms caught on to my money issue and as I was sipping through Instagram an ad came up for this app.

I read the reviews and was shocked, but still pessimistic. 

Less than 5 mins ago I just got $75 added to my account after verifying some info. I can‚Äôt believe it. So grateful for this app. It‚Äôs like a payday loan except without interest fees, aside for the small fee for an instant deposit. I dont want to make using this app a habit and I‚Äôm definitely going to figure out an alternative for parking now, but this really came in handy when I needed the extra cash.
title: Not a scam

review: I can‚Äôt verify other people‚Äôs experiences although money got a bit tight for me this last weekend. Being a bit short, I figured after seeing these reviews that I would give it a try. I input my checking information and once I did Dave automatically detected my pay roll information. Once i accepted I put in an request for $50 advance and within the 8 hour period on express it was sent to my account hassle free! Can‚Äôt be more happier. Glad this app did what it described and it was very user friendly which was good as well. Would recommend this to anyone who needs a noncredit check advance that isn‚Äôt a loan. It‚Äôs easy to do and set up. Going to try to use this app as a last resort though because it‚Äôs never good to rely on something like this but my experience over all was 100% smooth. Thank you Dave. Y‚Äôall are fantastic. This is a real review y‚Äôall no bs here!
title: An app that actually does what it says

review:
I‚Äôve used this for a couple months now and I do like the app. But I‚Äôll be straight to the point.
Pros: It does actually loan you money once you verify your income. They recently updated to full banking so you can use it just like any other online bank.
Cons: There is a small, completely worth it fee for the loan. The good part is they factor that fee into the loan so it gets paid back with the loan. Since their transition to full banking, I have tried a small trust window and set up my direct deposit for a small specified amount of money each check. However, it now says I have to hold onto at least $105 to get any loan over $5. If I had that much, I wouldn‚Äôt need a loan. Also, it now says my pay date changed when it obviously did not and it still shows my pay records. I have messaged customer support tonight and hope to have a reply sometime tomorrow. If the issues above are handled well, I‚Äôll come back and edit the rating! I hope to stay with them, but I won‚Äôt if the issue goes unresolved.
title: Pros and Cons

review: I downloaded the Dave app a few weeks ago when I was in a pinch and needed some quick cash until payday. I linked my bank account as instructed but due to my direct deposit going into my savings account they wouldn‚Äôt recognize my income. Needless to say, I didn‚Äôt get the money when I needed it, but I decided to switch my direct deposit to my checking account just in case I needed help in the future. I found myself short on funds again this weekend so I logged in thinking that I‚Äôd be good to go but instead it denied my request due to only having 1 direct deposit in my checking account. The one saving grace is that the app advanced me $20 in good faith until I have 3 consecutive deposits in the same account but I still feel like they could‚Äôve recognized my direct deposits to my savings account. Like the title says, extremely helpful when needed but inconvenient sign up process. I could‚Äôve easily sent paystubs showing consistent income and employment for 9 years but that wasn‚Äôt an option.

review:
I have set up my account with Dave and absolutely love the app, but I was extremely jaded by one restriction.  Dave‚Äôs card processors made him require more than 3 months to expiration and are probably charging him a huge amount. 

I was approved for an advance, which I could really use right now as my state is locked down.  I don‚Äôt need a loan, just a little cash to for some groceries.  I hit the button to get 75 dollars and it told me I needed to set up a way to pay it back.   Odd, as I just linked them to my bank account and have no problem writing an ACH request for them to get their money back.  After all, I get paid twice a month and make much more than I am borrowing.   I‚Äôm hoping that I can get a card from my bank soon, because I like Dave‚Äôs app and appreciate that the developer directly addressed the prior one star version I had of this review. 

I see that they only accept debit cards, no worries, I have one with overdraft protection.  

I scan my card and guess what. - ‚ÄúWe need a card. That has more than 3 months to expiration, choose a different card‚Äù  I don‚Äôt have a different card, but I‚Äôm going to stay with Dave until I do or hope that his banking opens up soon and I can actually get on the list. 

Dave gets the five stars, because he‚Äôs honest and has a fantastic business model.   Plus he‚Äôs a bear, so....
title: Valid debit card denied - But Dave is cool
developerResponse: {'id': 14498737, 'body': 'Hey there! For purposes of collection and combating fraud, our processor requires that all linked debit cards be further than three months from expiration. Presently there is no way for me to manually bypass this block. I apologize for any inconvenience.', 'modified': '2020-04-06T20:37:08Z'}

review: I love the app and the idea of it is amazing and the fact that I thought it was fake and I figured out it was real I could believe it. I used the app for about 6 months and I can say it saved me when i needed a little extra cash! I would recommend this app 100% but I had to cancel because I had a glitch I guess in the app, where the Dave app would log out of my bank account every time I would open the app. So I had to do that for 3 more months and now I try to connect my account and the Dave app says log in credentials are correct but there are no accounts open. I couldn‚Äôt believe it because I just got my check into the same bank account that Dave was connected to. And since I can‚Äôt connect my bank account I can‚Äôt get any advances so there was no point in having a membership with a app I don‚Äôt use. So just be aware of that happening.
title: I love the app, But had to cancel my membership

review:
This is a great app for me when I just need a few bucks to get me to payday. These guys make sure you can pay it back before allowing you to take it out. Once they confirm your bank account they look for your paydays. I had to send my stubs as proof but that‚Äôs because my paydays are a little weird so it was harder for the app to find a pattern. You also have to make sure you have about $160 in your account a few days following your paydays before they will send you money. I‚Äôm a cash person so I had to make sure I kept money in my account a few extra days before I got approved. 

There is a few dollar fee for them to send the money and you can pick your tip. The tip is how they make their money. I‚Äôm on my second successful advance and I found this much easier than pawn and payday loans. 

-1 Star because I don‚Äôt know if it was a glitchy app or what but it wouldn‚Äôt let me take $75, let me go through the process of $50, then said I didn‚Äôt have enough in my account. I tried the next day and the $50 went through. Really wish I tired the $75 but 50 will do.

Edit: keeping it at 4 stars... I get the errors ‚Äúmust have $115 in your account following your payday‚Äù I do/and I did. Once this error clears I get another one that it has to be 10 days from my payday (which typically it‚Äôs 4-7 days before that I make the request). The support people are super helpful and can override it but I hate asking it every time.
title: Great App

review: This app charges you without you agreeing to anything! Yes the 1 dollar but nope keeps charging that dollar repeatedly! I get paid weekly and wanted to find the right app to help manage expenses because I forget some bills due to my busy schedule but seriously should just hire someone to help! Yeah don‚Äôt care about the dollar but when it‚Äôs never ending why not pay the same to have someone help! I would like to find the right app to control finances myself! I get paid weekly and have had deposits for over a year but the app keeps saying I don‚Äôt have any deposits! This app is a mess and watch your bank because that dollar turns into many dollars! I sent screen shots and it‚Äôs ignored like nothing but of course because they are making hundreds with accounts because most people don‚Äôt look and realize they are being ripped off! Never again! I will for sure be spreading the word around all social media and word of mouth because this is one big scam to just continue to charge people that dollar over and over and make money! Stay alert! You have been warned! I have contacted my bank for fraud charges!
title: Charges double! Stay away!

I received a letter not to long ago saying that I have to mail or fax for provisional credit because the team needs more information, but with my money taken I can‚Äôt get a ride to buy envelopes and stamps or even to ride across town to fax it‚Ä¶..Why can‚Äôt I just talk to the team over the phone? Why can‚Äôt Dave just rely the information to the team? Not only that I was doing business with a company and received money from them. review: I love that the bank is SO FORGIVING and allows advances. Even when you have been late with them before. I didn‚Äôt pay an advance of almost $100 for over 6 MONTHS and they still allow me advances. Even without direct deposit. They are much smaller, but they still allow it, which is cool! The direct deposit REALLY is 2 days early (if you company has their pay system setup like that-which a lot do) Seriously, when I did have direct deposit set up at my previous employment, they did direct deposit only. EVERYBODY else got theirs on Friday. I ALWAYS had mine on Wednesday. Without a doubt. Not once missed. Came late one night, but that was it. It was still there on Wednesday. But it‚Äôs usually there in the morning! Thank Dave Bank for your great service. I normally never leave reviews, but you deserve it. Thank you! I wish you guys great success, you deserve it!
title: Great bank with great benefits and service!

review: Wanted to test out this app to see how legit it was and I was pleasantly surprised! Super easy and fast transaction into my bank account for an additional $3.99 fee but that seemed worth it for my first time because I wanted to see how quickly the transfer would work for future reference! Was in my account within 2 hours. In the future I‚Äôd probably save the $3.99 and wait the couple of business days. I found another app I wanted to try out first that had the same idea but you needed a Facebook account which I do not have and never will have so Dave came in very handy. I personally like that the options to borrow are in small increments $25-$75 because if I‚Äôm ever in a pinch until my next paycheck typically I need $50 at most to get by. Thanks for a great experience so far! Idk if this will let me update after I pay back the money on my paycheck date but hoping that goes smoothly!
title: Awesome and helpful!

review: I‚Äôve heard of Dave as well as Earnin and regret giving Dave a shot. I gave Dave a shot first to request a pay day advance, entered all of my information in the app. I don‚Äôt remember asking for a debit but it randomly started showing that I am being mailed one... okay. For some reason or another though it could not verify my information despite entering my social and even taking a photo of my valid drivers license. It kept saying try back later and asking me to redo my information but wouldn‚Äôt specify what exactly I needed to redo. After spending maybe an hour or two on the Dave app and realizing I wasn‚Äôt getting anywhere... I decided to try earnin. Very similar process; however, earnin actually worked and I was able to request an advancement within minutes unlike with Dave and didn‚Äôt have to enter everything that Dave was wanting. Now I have to deal with contacting Dave to close my account since I won‚Äôt be using the service. Dave‚Äôs website makes it appear as if you cancel your membership on your end but when trying to do so, you‚Äôre prompted to call customer service. NICEEE.

review: This app really has helped me out a couple times it‚Äôs not a  gimmick at all. I just put my account info in, inserted a COUPLE deductions (bills) like a phone bill car insurance etc. you are asked to prove income via direct deposit and that‚Äôs pretty much it. Only drawback I had is that he couldn‚Äôt do it minutes after I filled everything out, but instead had to wait like 2 weeks for some reason. But one awesome thing is, now when I request an advance I have the option to receive it in seconds if I pay an extra 5 bucks back when I pay him back which is what I do. BUT if I wanted I could wait 3 days or so ( haven‚Äôt tried it that way yet as I have been in the situation where I needed it right then) for free. and there is no interest charged just an optional tip if you desire. Great great app, highly recommend if you are prone to being in tight spots frequently! Thanks Dave!!
title: Money loan from the Dave app

review: Like so many people, I was skeptical. I passed the ad for this app many many times on Facebook. You know how that old saying goes ‚Äúif it sounds too good to be true, then it probably is.‚Äù Well, that is definitely NOT the case with Dave. I read one woman‚Äôs review about how she hit a rough patch and decided to just try it out. I, myself, was in her same situation and I decided what could it hurt. The process from start to finish was very easy, app is awesome to navigate, its self explanatory and most importantly, IT WORKS. I decided to start with $75 to test it out and once I took all the necessary steps, the money was sent to my account within minutes. Dave definitely made me a believer and if I should ever have an issue again, I will turn to Dave first. Its businesses like this that make me feel like not everyone is just out for them selves or getting you to sign up to trick and pay a bunch of fees. Thank you Dave.
title: I‚Äôm a believer

Now, like I said, I‚Äôm brand new to this, so once payday comes and my first payment is due, I‚Äôll update ya. The only thing is the ‚Äútip‚Äù I‚Äôm not sure how I feel about  it. It‚Äôs  not an option to tip. You HAVE to. And they only give you 3 options. Yes I know it keeps them running. However, if I only have $5 to tip and $15 the next I should have the choice. title: Saved my life

review:
I would Highly recommend this loan app to anyone that is trustworthy and dependable with responsibility of paying back a loan. Dave has helped me in hard times when facing situations that I had no idea of what else I could do or who can Could I ask for help. title: Gratitude

review:
I can say a lot about this application. 
1. It helps 2. It is safe 3. It is addictive

1. It helps having a backup constantly. I remember when I was homeless and needed 75 bucks for a place to stay. This really REALLY helped me stay positive and get through it. I am now getting my own place and I still use it and donate regularly. 

Once you are trusted and accepted, the application works wonders for you and their customer service doesn‚Äôt fail. You tell them how much you need and confirm your payback date and amount. I‚Äôve never missed these not over-drafted so I‚Äôm assuming that helps me a lot in the future. 

You pay it on the confirmed date and do it over again. This gets addicting. Hence note 3.

2. It is safe. Keep in mind that you are borrowing money. It‚Äôs pretty much them trusting you with free money. So be a decent person and give them the money back. This app is a god send. The donation is a plus. 

3. It is addicting. The money is borrowed. It‚Äôs a luxury, not a right. Be careful with how you use this app. I find myself taking $75 out even when my dumb$&$ don‚Äôt need it. I‚Äôm assuming it‚Äôs because it feels like a game. It‚Äôs cool. Logically, it makes no sense for me to use this app. Honestly guys, only use this when you absolutely need something right now. Wants are fine as well. Just don‚Äôt become reliant as I have. 

5/5, 10/10

Love the app.
title: After 3 Months - I like you

With this happening there was way for me to login into my previous I account I‚Äôve been using for weeks considering it‚Äôs under my phone number. To attempt to access my old account I deleted this new account that got made and now I can‚Äôt even access my old account. I assume it‚Äôs because it‚Äôs under the same information and it‚Äôs collecting the information from this new account that got created. But Dave needs a better login system, your information should be more secured so your information can‚Äôt be used more than once for accounts. It should be one bank card per account. One phone number per account. It shouldn‚Äôt even have gone through to make a new account. It‚Äôs so disappointing because it‚Äôs such a good way to loan money and pay back easy. Which I had access to it.

review: I am very pleased with the decision to start using Dave. I have three jobs and it was getting difficult to stay on track with my expenses. Some part of me was thinking ‚ÄúOh it‚Äôs fine, I can afford this, I have three jobs now.‚Äù This was not really the case, and since using Dave not only have I been able to keep myself out of the hole but it‚Äôs easier to see where I am spending more of my money. In my case, the excess spending is mainly coming from eating out since I am always on the go. Now, I just get cheaper menu items and have started to get more grocery items so I can really cut my spending. I moved out at 13 years old and most of my adult life has felt like a huge failure, but I am learning and applying the things I learn and step by step things are looking up. Be mindful, take your time, and be patient with yourself. Thanks Dave!!! Can‚Äôt wait to plant more trees!!!
title: Making better decisions

review: Downloaded this as I had a family member pass and after I found out they didn‚Äôt have life insurance it put me in a tight spot financially since I only get paid the last business day of each month. Got this thinking it could cover any surprises that last week, well, went to get an advance yesterday, they wanted to deduct the money from my bank account 3 days later (on a Friday) but I don‚Äôt get direct deposit until next Friday (10 days after the day I looked). Essentially if I didn‚Äôt read it well and assumed it worked it would have caused the exact issue I‚Äôm trying to prevent, getting an overdraft fee due to being a couple dollars short in my account. Otherwise good app. Fix the algorithm and I‚Äôll change my rating.  I‚Äôve been getting paid the last business day each month for the past 7 years, and it is a pretty decent amount so it should be able to discern that pattern, and not be thrown off by deposits that are maybe 5% of that.
title: Incorrect Payday, no use to me

review:
When I first downloaded the app and decided to get some funds to help us out, I had flashbacks of the payday advance places. I remember getting into trouble trying to get my finances back in order and caught up on a few bills. Soon it was out of control. I was robbing Peter to pay Paul. Every week. 
But this is nothing like that. No exorbitant costs to get a little loan to help out. No trying to figure out why I kept going further in debt and this was not helping, only hurting. 
Dave is amazing. What a relief knowing I‚Äôve got a friend that‚Äôll loan me $50 or $75 without judging me. It‚Äôs an amazingly easy process. And very transparent. There‚Äôs no strings. There‚Äôs no crap in the fine print. It just works. And works well. So give Dave a try. He‚Äôll help you get through, without charging too much, without judging, without going through a bunch of stuff to get there. Just simple, easy, and reasonable help.
title: Relief

review: Definitely helps when I‚Äôm low on gas and my payday isn‚Äôt for another few days! And only 2$ and change for the express? Amazing üòç I‚Äôve never tried other apps before but Dave is definitely 5 stars, and I‚Äôve had it for about a month‚Äî no bugs or force quits needed! And it‚Äôs so cute that he‚Äôs a bear! Nice touch developers!!! The only thing I wish would happen would be, then reliable source of pay, which I totally understand why that‚Äôs a policy don‚Äôt get me wrong üòÇ but I‚Äôve always paid back on time I wish they gave you some sort of trust depending on how soon you pay like actual credit score but for Dave! And for those who don‚Äôt know, basically, as what I‚Äôve experienced, if you have 0 or below in your designated account, Dave can‚Äôt let you borrow money :( again very understandable policy don‚Äôt get me wrong developers... Still, very good app! Would definitely recommend!!!

review: I LOVE this app. I‚Äôm admittedly not the best at budgeting, or saving, or thinking ahead, so there have been MANY times I‚Äôve had to borrow cash from friends. Which is always embarrassing, but I don‚Äôt have to with this app. The money is in my account within 10 minutes, and the payback process is SUPER easy. Because of this app there have been times I‚Äôve gotten dinner when I thought I didn‚Äôt have the money, or been able to splurge on things in the moment, and know that I just have to pay the app back in a few days when I get paid again. The only downside I‚Äôve experienced is it won‚Äôt let you pay the app back within 24 hours of when you borrowed. So I borrowed money to get dinner yesterday, and then got paid from my nanny job that night, then when I tried to pay the app back it wouldn‚Äôt let me. Other than that, I love this app.
title: I don‚Äôt usually review things, but this is great:

review:
My son and I share an apartment after being made homeless during the Covid crisis. With my sons work hours cut and me being in unemployment, it‚Äôs been very tight, financially. My son‚Äôs paycheck was cut short and one I was waiting on got misdirected in the mail due to the change of address. We have a 5 day grace period before fines accumulate, and the 5th day landed on a weekend, so 2 extra days! I tracked down my paycheck and photo deposited it on that Monday. However, it wouldn‚Äôt be available until the next day, meaning I‚Äôd have penalties added to the amount I needed, meaning it wouldn‚Äôt cover the rent, and more penalties would accumulate and we could ultimately loose our home. 
My son told me about this new banking system he just got in with, and that I could ask fir an advance if I signed up with them. I investigated, did the math, that could put me over the amount I was short! I don‚Äôt even have to make a deposit, nor wait-it would be instant. 
Running out of time, I hustled to read through the fine print, how it operates, etc, and signed up. Then went to advances, selected the $75 option, and VOILA!!  It was in my bank account, and brought my balance up enough to cover rent!!!! 
The payback date is my next deposit date, and it‚Äôll happen automatically, with NO FEES!!!
ONE MORE MONTH WITH A ROOF OVER OUR HEADS!!!!!!!üòÖ
THANK YOU, DAVE‚ÄºÔ∏è
title: Thank you, DAVE!

A week went by then I tried again and got the msg that I‚Äôd be alerted if I were approved for a loan. I just recently tried again and it got the same msg about receiving info from my bank acct, I am so confused as to why I‚Äôve had this app over a mo th and only borrowed ONCE but yet I‚Äôve been charged multiple times by this app; yea it‚Äôs $1 but it‚Äôs mine and if you‚Äôre going to charge your potential customers it would be nice to let them at least get a dang loan.

For example when I chose to select an amount to borrow and no tip because I cannot afford it. As soon as I go to pay it back, I have to choose a tip amount. Even though I previously chose not to. review: So I‚Äôve been using Dave for the last 9 months and I just want to say Dave has kept me afloat during the crazy and darkest moments this year so far. title: Your New Bestfriend

review: I have been using Dave for a while and it was great and all until I recently started to encounter issues.  First issue was connecting with my bank.  I‚Äôve emailed support and then got a response 2 days later.  The issue has resolved on its own, well not exactly. I had to delete and reinstall the app.  Now, the new issue is the amount that I can borrow.  I have always borrowed 75 dollars until pay, no issues, until now.  Now it‚Äôs only allowing up to 20 dollars!! It states that it was having issues collecting after the recent payday, which is not true.  The amount that I borrow and plus tip was always paid in full.  It even shows in the history.  I have contacted support Sunday night and sent them a second request today, June 4th.  It‚Äôs been 4 days and nothing.  If this doesn‚Äôt get resolved, I will no longer need the app.

review:
I love this app it‚Äôs not complicated easy and no tricks.
Dave is a lifesaver for me because I work part time minimum wage and my checks vary from 300 to 400 dollars every two weeks and I have bills to pay sometimes depending on how my check looks like I may have 20 to 40 dollars left over but with expenses like gas and food during week things add up.
I have no one to depend on when I fall short or need a extra hand financially so I‚Äôm glad Dave is here for me a extra 50 or 75 to get me through the pay period has been life changing.
Not to long ago  I used to have to wait  days before pay day every other Thursday just to eat or to even buy a simple drink but now I don‚Äôt have those problems because of Dave I feel less anxiety after I pay my bills I feel more comfortable that Dave is there when I‚Äôm in a bind. 
Overall Dave is a excellent service.
title: Life Saver

review:
Oh Dave, my fuzzy, woodland, & banking companion has been a worthy addition to my financial services. Dave was pretty simple to set-up from the beginning, and the app itself is very user-friendly as well. Originally, I just needed the app for its advance feature, but I‚Äôve grown to really enjoy Dave‚Äôs simplified approach to banking, so I applied for a checking account with them. I‚Äôm planning for Dave to give me an account separate from my main finances and bills to use for my leisure and as a safety net to any negative financial situations. Thanks for the help during this difficult past year, and I have and will continue to recommend my main bear Dave to my friends and family! 

P.S. Only reason I didn‚Äôt give a 5-star rating, is because their forms of contact and email support are either non-existent or moderately delayed to reply. Let‚Äôs get a 24 hour, or at the very least, a 9a-5p Customer Service phone number Dave, you can do it!
title: Dave is Tops!

review: They really should have a number to call vs email to contact them. If there‚Äôs issues it‚Äôs ridiculous trying to get a timely response. I was trying to payback my loan & it wouldn‚Äôt let me. Took a week for them to get back to me with a link to try. Recently, they took their money a week earlier than the planned date & it resulted in overdraft. I have emailed a few times but no response of course. I personally think they should pay the over draft fee because it wasn‚Äôt the agreed upon date. Like why would I do a cash adv for 3 days? & not make it a rush? The money hit my account & they took it back in 3 withdrawals. I‚Äôve been using Dave for over a year. Never had problems until last 3-4 months. Frustrating. Not sure what‚Äôs changed or maybe just because I never had issues before. If I‚Äôd written this review before having issues i‚Äôd of given them 5 stars but after having issues (due to way the issues are handled) I don‚Äôt think they are that great anymore unless your issue free with them.

review: So I was in a bind needed cash until pay day I originally started to download Cleo when I read the reviews they were terrible many of the Cleo reviews suggested to ‚Äústick with Dave‚Äù so  that is what lead me to the Dave app where I couldn‚Äôt find one bad review so I downloaded it still skeptic of putting my bank info so I went searching for bad reviews I personally didn‚Äôt find one so I went for it once all information was verified I asked for a loan still thinking I was about to get ripped off I checked my account within 5 minutes or less and the money was there still a skeptic I waited for every to leave the atm machine before walking up there and VOILA it was really there and I really appreciated it I‚Äôve already recommended that others download it as well as far as the pay back I have yet to see how that happens but overall great app and a lifesaver
title: In SHOCK

review: I think this app is extremely useful and good in theory. The only drawback is this app and the people behind it are NOT an accredited bank or someone worthy and qualified to know ALL your information. In order for them to send you money they HAVE to have access to your bank info and social security two precious forms of information you‚Äôre supposed to keep to yourself. Normally I wouldn‚Äôt use these kinds of things because even though they say they don‚Äôt collect your info, they do. But desperate times call for desperate measures. The pros is that they don‚Äôt add interest I think, they might. Another pro is that they don‚Äôt let you borrow too much at first. Lets face it everyone who uses this app doesn‚Äôt know how to handle money well, or they don‚Äôt make enough. so its good they don‚Äôt give you the option to borrow $150 at first. Basically you pay $3.99 to borrow money. It‚Äôs only useful when you‚Äôre in a real bind. I wouldn‚Äôt make a habit of using it too often.
title: Instant Cash. But at what cost?

review: I work two jobs to support my life in one of the most expensive cities in the US, San Diego. I‚Äôm generally good with money but sometimes stuff happens even to the best of us. And, well, Christmas just happened and I was running low and not feeling good about it. I can always stretch a buck, but when I heard about Dave, I thought ‚ÄúWhat the hell?‚Äù and downloaded the app. I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to set everything up and I was able to get an advance of $50 in a matter of seconds. Dave provides, and the funds are withdrawn from my account on my next payday, with only a $3.99 fee! Say what?!!! You can also choose to make a donation to a great cause and that will also be deducted with your repayment. Guys, stay away from payday loans that charge outrageous fees!! I highly recommend Dave if you need a few extra dollars. Your borrowing from YOURSELF, not some loanshark.
title: Lifesaver

review: I wished you guys would do advance increases! Cause that $75 can only go so far! It would be nice if it was atleast $100 and your only option of that is for ‚Äúbanking with Dave‚Äù and I‚Äôve been doing this for 2 months now and it doesn‚Äôt look like that is going to happen anytime soon. If I could give some advice you should put into perspective the amount of money that is direct deposited into the customers account and then you should also look at how the customer pays back like a loyalty thing. And each few weeks or so they should get an increase up to a certain percentage of the amount directly deposited into the account each time. Like say I make $520 each week... which I do.. I should have a limit of up to atleast $150 maximum! You guys would get so many more customers if you did it somewhat like this. Maybe actually listen to your customers... they tend to be right most of the time l. Thanks have a good day

I just wanted to validate that the app and its services were in fact legit and Dave proved me wrong. Dave is totally 100% worth me having. Thanks, Dave, for bearing with me and showing me how useful and helpful you are going to be. title: Positive review

review:
I have been using Dave for about a month to month and a half, truly has saved me in a time of need! You request the advance and are able to choose between getting it to your account in 3-4 business days with no extra charge or for an extra charge (you‚Äôll pay back when u pay your advance back) you‚Äôll get it in your account almost immediately or within those next few hours. If you‚Äôre looking for a trustworthy app, then use Dave. I was super paranoid about giving any of my information at all to any app, but I took a leap and did it. Been super helpful and secure with your information!
I know that was automated^ but genuinely Dave has helped me out when I needed a little extra $$.
I highly recommend for anyone looking for a quick way to get some extra money for groceries, bills, gas, etc.
title: Trustworthy and Helpful

This time I tried to advance the usual and was only given a 5 dollar approval. I checked my account information and I saw that my income source was wiped out as well as my debit card information from my bank account. I tried to enter this information back in and received an error message. I reached out to customer service and here‚Äôs where things turned for the worse. The rep told me she fixed my income error but I could still only advance 5 dollars. I asked why and she gave me a generic FAQ response and said she would escalate since there were still issues with my account that she couldn‚Äôt fix. I got an email response this morning from another rep who gave me the same generic response. I replied back to the email explaining again and still haven‚Äôt gotten a response. Nothing about my account has changed since 2019 so I should not be having this issue. So disappointed....

review: I previously tried Dave and wasn‚Äôt too happy with being unable to get the loan I requested because I kept being told my income could not be verified...so I canceled my account.
