I was disappointed that it was such a small amount, but since it was a first time and Dave doesn‚Äôt have any previous experience with me, I accepted the amount with express payment of an additional $2.99 charge plus a tip so I guess it‚Äôs worth it.  I will probably keep it for a few months and if I need to get a loan again, I will apply again.  I do think that if I‚Äôm paying for ‚Äúexpress‚Äù payment and then a voluntary tip, I shouldn‚Äôt have to pay a monthly fee also regardless of whether I have a loan or not.  Just my opinion.
title: Cash received quickly

review: First off, you can pretty much ignore all the ads you‚Äôve seen for this app saying that it will give you anything. It is possible to get a loan from them but the way I look at it, there‚Äôs so many hoops to jump through and bank account requirements. If you are someone struggling who really needs the help then you most likely won‚Äôt qualify and if you are someone who does qualify then you are most likely in the position of not needing $75 that bad. My bank account that I uploaded showed $200 deposits weekly and I didn‚Äôt qualify for any amount. When I switched it to an account that shows $500 weekly deposits I was then only eligible for $15. Therefore I couldn‚Äôt imagine what you would need to make weekly to get the $75. Pretty much a complete waste of time and just another thing to have all my information. Not worth it IMO. I gave the 3 stars just because they did give me something even though it was a joke.
title: Mixed feelings and false advertisement

review: I would have to say I was skeptical at first. After putting in my information, I was sure either I wouldn‚Äôt get approved or I would get robbed. Both those things did not happen because 1. All of the information you put in is verified by Dave.(it is not sold to a third party person(s).) 2. You must put in a valid bank account which Dave will pull A. Your spending history and B. Your paycheck history and expectancy. Both of these are also kept confidential between you and Dave. Depending on how far your paychecks go back and how well you plan to manage your money, Dave can/will loan you up to $75, which you will receive in 3+ days. If one wants to say receive the money in less then 24hours maximum of usually 8hours, one can pay and amount of $4.99, which will be deducted with the $75 dollars on your next paycheck.

review: If I could rate this app and company -1,000 I would!!! I tried getting a loan through them, but was denied because it said I had two accounts. I have never had an account with this company and I can prove it but they won‚Äôt even listen. The time they said I had this loan was when I wasn‚Äôt even getting money deposited into my account I was a server at the time and my checks were $0. I tried explaining that to them but instead that added my number to an account I don‚Äôt even know how to get into they won‚Äôt provide the email address or the number that was associated with the account.  I keep emailing them and they won‚Äôt respond back.  They won‚Äôt even look into it. They are allowing fraud to be committed on my name!! I even explained to them if I knew I owed money I wouldn‚Äôt fight so hard to clear my name!! I will be reporting this app/company to the BBB!!!

Neither of these things have occurred, yet, this is all I keep seeing anytime I tap on the advance tab. Spoke with agents and have been told that the error was corrected but I‚Äôm still greeted with the  exact same screen. This has occurred for over a month now and support has hit or miss. I‚Äôm disappointed and would have loved to stick with dave banking, but it just doesn‚Äôt seem worth it anymore.

review: I heard about this app from my manager at work who also tends to struggle with money a little and I gotta say, it helped me out in a pinch. Earlier in the day I found out that my account went into the negative once again after paying off my rent for the month and buying food, I could barely buy milk. I figured I‚Äôd try it out and it saved me from a $35 overdraft fee. I‚Äôve never trusted payday loans, but this one is super reasonable, $2.99 with a $1 tip compared to $35 plus what I owed for the overdraw is pretty reasonable. They don‚Äôt even expect me to pay it back on payday. Hell, I might even open up an account with them to help me save some money for the future and emergencies. Setup was pretty easy too and the advance I got was instantaneous. I hope I don‚Äôt need to use it much in the future, but I‚Äôll be glad to know it‚Äôs there for when I need it.
title: Pretty handy

review: Gets you out of a pinch between paydays. It takes a few days to verify your bank account but after that you can get up to $75 in 3 business days, OR you can get $75 in a couple of hours if you‚Äôre willing to pay $4.99 extra for the convenience. They won‚Äôt take the $4.99 from the $75 advance, instead what happens is on your next paycheck they will automatically deduct the $75 + $4.99. I still think it‚Äôs better and much more convenient than a payday loan or pawning something. They ask for a tip, which is totally optional, but they claim to use the tip money to plant trees, so help with clean oxygen! Again, the tip is also deducted from your account on payday, so be mindful that your down almost 100 bucks on payday. Word to the wise, don‚Äôt be dependent upon the app or you‚Äôll end up LOSING money over time. $8 - $10 per paycheck adds up!
title: So helpful!

review:
I could NOT get EARNIN to recognize my work address, nor the fact that I am on salary so I don‚Äôt clock in! I get paid every week for the same amount no matter what, that‚Äôs the way our payroll is set up! Because I work for a VERY small business, just the OWNER and myself, it would NOT accept our business address because it‚Äôs the owner‚Äôs home address! We are a mobile mechanic service, we repair SEMI TRAILERS, our main contract is a FORTUNE 500 company! EARNIN does not like that! I shut them down and gave Dave a try! 2 wks answering questions for EARNIN and I got NO WHERE! Even sent them our business license and a copy of our business insurance information saying that we were a mobile service, they didn‚Äôt care!! 
Dave hasn‚Äôt given me any ISSUES! Should have went with my gut after DAY 2 of dealing with EARNIN but I had time to ANNOY them, since they wanted to annoy me!
title: Awesome

review: Dave gave me like $50 on spot and is helping me balance my bank account. Pretty cool for broke people like me who have troubles managing their money. You have to pay Dave back fairly quickly which is kinda with anyone you borrow money from so if you‚Äôre expecting to quick take money from an app and dip and never pay them back you‚Äôre sorely mistaken. But they‚Äôre reliable and only charge like $5(?) to send the money instantly (within 8hrs but mine hit immediately) to your account which isn‚Äôt much to front considering the app has to make money somehow if you‚Äôre not gonna tip then. They also plant trees which is awesome for the environment. Backed by the billionaire guy Mark Cuban from Shark Tank (WHOOP WHOOP) but seriously I‚Äôm a poor single mom and this app is cool or whateva so you should download it. If you‚Äôre tethering on ‚ÄúShould I or Shouldn‚Äôt I?‚Äù YOU SHOULD. Thanks Dave.
title: This cool or whateva

review: I have peoples united bank and the app didn‚Äôt have their bank available when I first downloaded it, so I requested to have their bank put on the app and about a month or two later it was there. I was then able to fill out all my information and it didn't take long at all until I was able to send $75 to my account. It helped out a lot and I‚Äôm happy that there was an option between waiting a few days or in instant delivery fee which was only 4.99, it said it would take up to 8 hours but it got to my bank account within minutes. I am very pleased with this app and will continue to use it as it also helps with budgeting and even puts the places that you spend money at regularly into weekly or monthly expenses. I dont mind spending $1 a month for something as reliable as that.
title: This app is great
developerResponse: {'id': 5567005, 'body': "So glad you've been loving the app! Thanks for sticking with us while we added your bank!", 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:44:51Z'}

review: At first it was not allowing me to borrow which sucked. Then a couple weeks later it said I could borrow but was giving me an error saying my card was used before (which it was used to try and borrow but on the same account so I was confused why it was giving me an error) I basically gave up at that point but did not delete the app and then today I randomly got a text saying I could borrow $75. I went and entered my card info and it instantly deposited the $75 into my account with no error this time. It took a total of about 1 minute to get the money deposited into my account. Super easy.  It lets you choose the tip amount you would like to give, if any. This app is pretty awesome aside from the initial complications. I would definitely recommend this app as long as you are positive you can pay it back on the promised date because it will automatically be drafted from your account.
title: YAY DAVE
developerResponse: {'id': 5650023, 'body': "Hey there, thank you so much for the review! We're so happy you like the app.", 'modified': '2018-10-24T19:48:23Z'}

review: At first, I didn‚Äôt believe it! there was NO way I was giving away my bank account information! But, I Just got paid Wednesday.. it is now Friday & I only have 30$ to my name until next Wednesday, so I read some reviews & decided to give it a try! Filled out some information & answered a few questions to make sure you‚Äôre able to pay Dave back & I was done. You can borrow anywhere‚Äôs up to $75 so of course, I go big or go home & chose the option of 75$ & was approved in less than 30 seconds! Dave said it would take up to 8 hours If you pay $4.99.. otherwise, it will take 3 days to get your money from Dave. I paid the $4.99 & not even 5 minutes later 75$ was added to my account from Dave!! He will be taking back his $75 he is letting me borrow & the 4.99 fee on my next pay day!! All for just $1 a month ! Thanks Dave!!!
title: Dave‚Äôs the real MVP

review: I‚Äôve used Dave a couple of times and yes it saved me. But I have my paycheck split up and deposited into 2 separate accounts for different expenses. Well Dave keeps counting my paychecks for half of what they actually are, so I gave them access to both accounts. But they still tell me I can‚Äôt borrow anything until they see $122 for 2 days after my last 2 paychecks. That makes no sense as I had over $200 in the other account that I gave them access to and over $122 in the main account. I had a lot of upcoming expense so I tried again and nope I still can‚Äôt borrow. So now I‚Äôm overdrawn despite being a great repeat customer. So it really seems useless to me at this point. I‚Äôm basically just letting them snoop on my finances and they aren‚Äôt letting me use the service at this point. It was good the 2 times I used it. But not now.
title: I‚Äôm done with Dave

review: So, overall for borrowing money.  Dave is good.  As far as getting a checking account with them.  Don‚Äôt do it! 1st of all.  I got my taxes issued into my account. My work deposit has yet still hasn‚Äôt deposited into my account 3 days later.  Only explanation is ‚Äú call back... wait the day out...we are having delays‚Äù. They‚Äôre having a glitch which people aren‚Äôt receiving deposits or getting them reversed. A family member sent me some money to get me through this week because of their delay. review: The only people who can actually use this are people who wouldn‚Äôt overdraft in the first place I would never not be able to pay them back when I get paid but they don‚Äôt get you all the requirements so the first two times the app worked great but now I‚Äôll never be able to use it because I pull out cash when I get paid and I try to pay a lot of bills in the beginning of my paycheck so I don‚Äôt have to worry about them this company is not going to make it if they can‚Äôt even be straight up with their customers and maybe if they would give you a second change after knowing all the rules then I would try to make it work but the fact that they aren‚Äôt even willing to help their customers to try and keep them why would I even bother. review: I work shift work and don‚Äôt have set hours so I either have overtime or only 30 a week. I‚Äôve used Dave twice now and it is perfect to help you get to that next paycheck when you really need it! I wish I could with draw more than 75$ so I didn‚Äôt have to borrow money from other people this next week but it  is what it is. I‚Äôm thinking I want to sign up for the banking but I know it is new and I really want to think about it before I leave my bank cause I‚Äôve been with them for years. Very cool app too though, it budgets for you based on past transactions which is awesome. And it lets you know when you are going to go below your limit (which you set or change) and just really cool. If nothing else it is a great way to budget and if you need a little extra cash you can get it fairly quickly
title: Dave is very helpful

review:
I have been waiting forever for an app like Dave to become available.

Long story short my ex developed a drug addiction and wrote checks out to himself for hundreds of dollars. As such I‚Äôve been in danger of over-drafting a lot recently as my income has barely been meeting my expenses until I can get things back under control and develop savings again.

Why do I like Dave? Dave lets me borrow money and then gives me the option on how much I‚Äôd like to ‚Äútip‚Äù. (I‚Äôve been doing just 10% lately because I‚Äôm still on shaky ground financially). Part of that tip goes to charity, which is awesome! The rest goes to gross revenue to the developer, which can be expected.

I will say I wish most apps (not just Dave) would integrate better with PNC. It‚Äôs one of the biggest banks in the country, but between this, Mint, MoneyLion, CreditKarma, etc. it‚Äôs always a hassle to try to link my PNC account for some reason. PNC I believe is like the 6th-largest bank in the country right now, and these apps should contact PNC to see why their technology isn‚Äôt always compatible.

It would be nice if once you hit a certain level of successfully-repaid loans (maybe 6?) you‚Äôd earn enough trust with Dave to take out maybe $100 as the maximum instead of just $75. 

Overall, though, I love Dave! 5 stars!
title: Frequent User; Frequent Fan
developerResponse: {'id': 5527973, 'body': 'Hi there, so glad to hear you had a great experience! We love hearing user ideas for how to improve the app, we encourage you to email davethebear@dave.com with your great ideas! Thanks for the review :)', 'modified': '2018-10-16T18:14:48Z'}

review: Just to test the waters, I downloaded Dave Banking to see if I‚Äôd qualify for a short term advance. At first he approved me for a $25 Advance (With No Interested Charge). I thought it was small but at the same time enough to put gas in my tank. When it was time to pay it back. Dave only took $10 out of my account that confused me. I wasn‚Äôt mad. Just figured maybe it was a promotion or something. My second advance was $25 for $25 straight across, no hidden fees, unless you want your advance instantly deposited. And on my third advance he upped the amount to $75. I can appreciate that if your account doesn‚Äôt have the money for your advance, he won‚Äôt draw it out or overdraw you, if you deposit the money owed into your account within a reasonable amount of time, Dave will work with you.
title: A Great Resource When You Need Spare Cash For Bills, Rent, Ect.

review:
Unfortunately we all have bills that slip from our mind and when that happens we deal with overdrafts and/ or late charges, with Dave I was able to advance up to $25 and my connecting by bank account Dave was able to figure out when my next payday is and select the payback date to the day I get paid. I did do the express pay so that costed 3.99 then I did a tip of 10% so I will be paying back  only $29 which is by far so much better than payday loan. 
Something however I feel should be said is that when you do need loans/ advances, sometimes it can be hard to not want to get an advance again or be in this cycle that is extremely hard to get out of, so while I say that Dave is great at helping out, make sure that you don‚Äôt become reliant on the app to get you through the next payday.
title: Helpful

review: Completely & totally written on my own accord, lol. I originally signed up w/ Dave about a year ago. This app has given me help time & time again‚Äî when you have $5 left in your account & almost a week until your next paycheck, you‚Äôre thankful for any help you can get & Dave goes above & beyond in helping me w/ that. I‚Äôm a TMA & I get paid twice per month. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard to budget when paying off debt, your semester‚Äôs tuition AND maintaining a roof over your head. This app gives me the ability to ask for an advance on a spur of the moment notice & it doesn‚Äôt ask for much in return. Dave has kept me above water & I am so grateful. It‚Äôs like asking for an advance from your employer without actually having to ask. Thanks for your help w/ keeping me afloat for 1+ years‚Äî I appreciate you more than you know.
title: Thank You üòì

review: Thanks Dave for being out there! It was so easy to get everything set up and verified. After all that was done (which was maybe less than 5 steps) I was able to request money! If you need the money asap, they have an option that can deposit within 8 hours, the latest I believe. But for me, the transfer was instant! If you‚Äôre in need of the money, maybe spending an extra $5 for the speedy transfer is worth it. Also, they leave an option for tipping. You don‚Äôt have to, but I‚Äôd recommend it because it‚Äôs just a thanks for the people that keep this app running. In the end, you don‚Äôt even have to pay the transfer fee or tip at that moment. It‚Äôs all collected on your payback date (which is probably the time you‚Äôre supposed to get your direct deposit from work)
title: Really quick and convenient!

review: I have been using this app off and on as needed for a few months now. It‚Äôs awesome to be able to access quick money when you need it, and that is why I continue to return when it‚Äôs needed. However, in order to get the repayment set up on my actual pay date(the app continues to try and get repaid before my check hits my account), there is not an easy option. It will not allow me to change it and when I call they say the date is what it is. Well each time they pull my payment early as my check isn‚Äôt in my account yet, my bank charges me non refundable $30 fee and when brought up to Dave they have offered no assistance. There are many other apps that do the same thing as Dave and I may just begin using only those, as they work with you and their accessibility and ease of change to correct dates to avoid fees is MUCH easier/better.

review:
I saw the ad on my FB timeline & decided to give it a go since I needed only a lil‚Äô bit of money.  I downloaded & took about 10 mins. to enter my personal info & bank details.  The Dave App knows if you have direct deposit automatically which was neat because I thought I would need to enter this tidbit.  I opted to get instant $75 & that cost $4.99 instead of waiting 3 days which would be free.  

Only drawback albeit minor:

- App froze on me after I got my money because it didn‚Äôt reflect my actual bank account funds.  So, I had to restart my iPhone twice.

- I get a text the day after I already received my money saying your money is being sent & on the way.  Please leave us a review if it was helpful.  I‚Äôm thinking this is a really good app & to receive this irrelevant text, why bother to even inform me to leave a reply.  I already intended to because I do want others to know this app is legit.  Let the app do its function & let users decide of their own accord to leave a good &/or bad review.

All in all: I like this app & got the $75 super fast but I had to pay $4.99 to get it instantly.  Didn‚Äôt need lots of cash, just enough to hold me over until payday.  This app provides it.  I like the positive energy of the app.  Def worthy app.
title: FRIENDLY, EASY & FAST MONEY APP

review: When I heard about Dave I was a little skeptical, but I needed money and I needed it fast. After signing up, and linking my bank account, I got an advance right away, and the best part was that you can pay back the amount you owe on your payday. I love this app, it has helped me not once but twice. It‚Äôs easy to sign up if you have a bank account they support, and direct deposit. You get an estimated amount for your advances based on your account history and paychecks, and after you ask for the advance, it is deposited into your account within seconds, and you are able to use that on what you need whether its for a bill payment, gifts, gas, or just for a fun day, it‚Äôs your money to spend, and pay it back once you are paid. I‚Äôm very happy i found this app, it‚Äôs a lifesaver. Thank You Dave üíØüëåüôèüèº
title: Very good and easy.

review: I will admit I was very skeptical about using this app. Only because you just never know what can happen. I just move and ran short on cash. I had used the bulk of my funds from my paycheck and had some unexpected things come up. I thought about doing a traditional payday loan but did not want to be locked in paying so much more in interest and fees. I was scrolling on instagram and saw the Dave app ad & decided to give it a shot. After I downloaded it & got all my banking verified, I started me out with a $50 cash advance & I pay it back on my next payday. How easy is that?! I also signed up for overdraft protection so it‚Äôll help me in case something else happens. I‚Äôm still learning so I plan on following up after my first payment. I will say this so much help & I‚Äôm glad I can breathe while in between paydays
title: Right on time help!

review:
This app is a very helpful way to keep tabs on your budget, and make it easy to see how much of your income is going into what; helps you with categorizing and organizing monthly expenses. 

Another thing this app offers is advances on your next paycheck. However, the advances are considerably smaller than what you see from other popular cash-advance apps, like earnin. I still think it can be very helpful for preventing things like overdrafts when you're over-leveraged and need a small sum to clear fund transfer. 

Types of advances: 
The "Dave" advances - apparently you can get an advance of up to $100, but you have to join the waitlist, who knows how long that will take. 

The other type is just an advance you can receive when you link your bank so they can confirm your payroll frequency and spending habits. 

I'm only given the choice of up to a $20 bank account advance, but this could be because of my spending habits.

I frequently transfer funds out of my bank to a brokerage account, recently had a hiccup where my expenses overlapped the transfers. Don't do that lol. But if I had Dave to transfer literally just at least $10, I wouldn't have had to suffer the $9 transfer reversal fee and $30 overdraft fee that resulted. So Dave provides a decent solution to these types of situations.
title: Good for budgeting; Decent advances

review: This app is great and very helpful from what u have seen so far. This is my first time using it so I don‚Äôt know much I just know I was able to receive my little loan for now. I just needed it to feed my 5month old and my 2yr old and it came in hand fast and easy. I haven‚Äôt had any problems so far. Only thing that I didn‚Äôt like but wasn‚Äôt really a big deal is that you can‚Äôt set your own date as to when you can pay it back. They give you dates to choose from which is fine but, I know when I‚Äôll have the money to return and they didn‚Äôt have it on there so I just had to pick something the app gave, now I‚Äôll have to borrow from someone to pay it back, that way I will be able to borrow again but then turn around and pay the person I borrowed from back also ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Other than that the app is great for when things getting a little tight.
title: It works!!

review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for awhile now and it has proven to be more than helpful to me. Whether I need $20 for gas or $75 for food, Dave has me covered for a small donation on my payback date. 

That said, I have tried to take away my *OPTIONAL* donation a couple times because I knew I was going to have a smaller check the following week as well and had to stretch everything, even using 3 day delivery to avoid the 4.99 fee and EVERY (yes every, no exaggerating) time I try to do it without the extra fees (yes I get it I‚Äôm being cheap but I almost always donate) it says a problem has occurred, basically saying ‚Äúhey, donate or we‚Äôre not helping you‚Äù

This isn't a huge deal to me because I‚Äôm still going to use Dave when I need it and keep donating (and not just because I‚Äôm forced to). I still highly recommend this app to anyone whose ever needed an extra $20 for gas.
title: Extremely helpful

review:
I‚Äôm fairly new to the app. It counted pretty much every transaction I made as a monthly debt and every check I deposited as a paycheck and I‚Äôm having a hard time sorting that out, but Dave sent me $75 the other day which allowed me to put gas in my car to go to work, feed myself, and make a small payment. The $4.99 fee to have the money transferred to my bank account within 8 hours (but it was only like two minutes for me) is quite steep in my opinion, but I‚Äôm enjoying using Dave so far.

Edit: This was my first reaction to Dave. Since then they dropped the transfer fee to 2.99 which is great. I can only get $20 now because my current job doesn‚Äôt offer direct deposit, but that‚Äôs better than other apps that I can‚Äôt use at all without a direct deposit. Overall I‚Äôm very happy with Dave.
title: So far so good

review:
Some of the identity verification can be worrisome, given the current state of internet security and privacy issues.

That said, I put my worries aside and trusted in the folks behind this app and got approved for the Advance quite quickly. There are some costs that are optional though they aren‚Äôt made obvious when starting out this process. Giving me the option to expedite the advance by 3 days for $4.99 isn‚Äôt terrible, but it feels backhanded to have it not made clear from the beginning that if you need this money right now, right away, you‚Äôll have to pay a bit more on the back end of the agreement.

All in all, this service is very handy in a pinch and comes at a time of desperation. I‚Äôm glad this app was there to have my back. I see no downsides if their security is as good as implied and you are honest with your intentions.
title: A worth while app, even if only budgeting.

review:
I absolutely love Dave! This is the second time I needed an advancement of $75 and it‚Äôs seamless. You chose the tip you want to pay and it doubles to help plant trees (how awesome is that!) There are two options of how the money will be delivered. In 3 business days for free or within 8 hours for $4.99 (don‚Äôt pay until you pay back Dave). Never took 8 hours not even 1 hour for the money to show up in my account. They make sure you know what day the money is coming out by having you type out the date (which I love). No issues. 

I wish the predictions of negative/overdraft account was better. It always have me in the negative because bills are coming up but already paid. 

To the developers, maybe add a option to check upcoming bills as already paid so balance predictions will be more accurate.
title: Love Dave!

review:
Dave has turned out to be the most trustworthy and efficient app I‚Äôve ever downloaded. I have never written a review before in my life, but this app blew me away so much there was no way I could NOT write one. I was sitting here stressing out because my account was getting low and I had so many things to pay for, until I stumbled across an ad on snapchat about Dave and thought I‚Äôd give it a try (after reading the reviews of course). Literally 15 minutes later I went from having $60 in my account to having well over $100 ‚ò∫Ô∏è Dave will definitely be on my phone for years to come.

Also, i have to say that I love how Dave plants a tree for every percentage of tips given. Not only does Dave save bank accounts, but he also gives the opportunity to make a difference in the world!
title: i was very very very doubtful but...
developerResponse: {'id': 5528016, 'body': 'Hi there, so glad to hear you had a great experience! Thanks for the review :)', 'modified': '2018-10-16T18:15:49Z'}

review: I don't usually take the time to review apps, but Dave is really so helpful! The app gets you easy, instant loans deposited right onto your debit card when you need them. It also helps you manage your money by estimating your future daily bank balances based on your purchase history, and even alerts you when it predicts or confirms that your account could be/is in overdraft so you can make a deposit or get a loan and avoid bank fees! I really recommend this app to everyone. It's one of those must have apps that I always install right away whenever I get a new phone. Best of all, when you do get a loan, you get to pick how much you think is fair to pay Dave for lending you money! Borrow five bucks and don't give him anything, or borrow a bit more and give him something fair. It's totally up to you!
title: So helpful!
developerResponse: {'id': 5528045, 'body': 'Hi there, so glad to hear you had a great experience! Thanks for the review :)', 'modified': '2018-10-16T18:18:44Z'}

review: This is an awesome app! Don‚Äôt believe the reviews that talk down on Dave because there are some fees here and there for different services. It is always a small charge and always optional. What financial institution is not only willing to advance you $75 but give you the option of paying for that service??? The answer is: no financial institution. So don‚Äôt let these complaining, entitled and clearly spoiled people leaving a bad review because it cost a couple bucks to receive 5-star service. This is a great app! Download it, use it to manage your finances and maybe pitch in a couple bucks to keep it in business(and no, I have nothing to do with Dave other than using the app. I WAS NOT paid by them to leave this review). Thanks Dave! You‚Äôve helped me more times than I can count!
title: Great App! Don‚Äôt be fooled by bad reviews!!!

review:
Great for one time use but after that it takes forever for a payment to process and and then have another advance available.. Some advances, I‚Äôd have to wait 4-5 days before they would have it available!! And the customer service is horrible!! They do have the manners for the job but lack the speed to help the customer in a timely manner. If you contact them on the weekend then you‚Äôre not going to get help with overdraft protection. That overdraft protection isn‚Äôt going to help if you reply 4 days later! This needs to be fixed IMMEDIATELY. 

SIDE NOTE: My sister is currently using EARNIN that is able to confirm a payment and then have money ready BY THE SALE OR NEXT DAY.  If not then they will have available the same day you contact them and I am very pleased with this. This blows Dave‚Äôs service out of the water. I suggest using their service instead!!!

Edit: Still haven‚Äôt addressed any of my concerns, to be put simple, Dave either needs to hire more employees in order for faster response time or fire the idiots who take their time..
title: Do not stick with Dave!

{'id': 3400962, 'body': "We're sorry to hear this Justin.

review: I see on the app that you can pick what amount you need, so I picked $100 and it told me that I would receive and email as to when I was able to open a bank account with Dave‚Äôs bank. I haven‚Äôt received an email and so I had to pick $75 instead of the $100 I needed. Why even give the option if it isn‚Äôt an option? I don‚Äôt understand that part, but am grateful for that $75 I did borrow. I had no problem getting the money to my account and my paycheck came in and Dave‚Äôs money came out. No problems, no hassles and I have used this app several times since. I am still wanting to know how to change to an actual bank account with Dave‚Äôs. Can anyone please let me know if that is possible or tell me if they have an actual account? This would be a 5 star review if I could have signed up for an actual bank account.
title: Dave‚Äôs banking account.....

review: So I was skeptical about an app that loans you money on your paycheck, however I tried it to see if I could get a bit of assistance. At first I tried for the $75 but since I do not keep large sums in my bank account it choose to decide I was an overdraft risk which isn‚Äôt the case with my bank. I use USAA and they do not do overdraft fees or let your bank overdraw so it could have lent me the $75 but it only allowed $20. It was a simple process and allowed me to have $20 in my bank within seconds which was nice. I normally wouldn‚Äôt need such a service however I had some last minute expenses that left me without money for the bus. I‚Äôm thankful that there are now trustworthy apps that allow for easy access to my paycheck or with loans for those that do t qualify in a traditional way.
title: So far it is working for me.

review: I wasn‚Äôt sure this app was gonna do what it said it would (lend me cash) but after reading another review from someone else who was in a similar situation, I decided to just try and after 20 minutes, bam $75 in my account, fixing my overdraft and supplying me with a well needed cash injection. I mean seriously, I was in a tight spot with my car and didn‚Äôt know if I was going to even be able to get gas money to get to work after a ACH fee hit me from peco, which we already paid and was their fault for double posting payments we didn‚Äôt schedule, it‚Äôs in the works for a return but in check form... so I needed cash fast and Dave definitely came through just 2 days from payday and holidays    are making cash tight right now, but thanks to Dave it‚Äôs lookin merry again!
title: Was a skeptic, but it really did work

review: I‚Äôve been using Dave for years now. I just feel really bad I‚Äôm not always able to leave tips cause I‚Äôm broke. But anyways. The app itself is so easy to use. They just verify your employment and advance what they think is fair. There was a period where I was having to reloan and reloan, but even having to do that with Dave is so affordable as their express delivery for their loan is 4.99 and you tip what you‚Äôre able to. They let you reloan as many times as you need. I didn‚Äôt use Dave for a couple years but then my bank account hit $27 dollars somehow after buying my husband too many anniversary gifts and I found myself pulling the Dave app out of the cloud. I had my money with five minutes. It‚Äôs so quick, so easy and reliable. I would recommend this to all my friends.
title: Easy, Convenient, Always Reliable

review: I was about to over draft like a week before my next paycheck and DAVE is so helpful to send me $75 so my account won‚Äôt overdraft with a $30 penalty over-drafting fee. DAVE sends the money and it hits my bank immediately, so when I suddenly notice that my bank account just hit the negative but have not charge me a fee yet (usually within 24 hours), DAVE sent the $75 and I did not have to wait a few business days, like a lot of places or APPS does. I can‚Äôt wait the few business days because my bank will charge me a bank fee so it‚Äôs nice to have an APP like DAVE, where it loan me the money for just a small fee that is nowhere close to an overdraft fee. Then on my next paycheck, it will take it from my account after my direct deposit. Also have other nice features on there.!!
title: Saved me from over-drafting

review: I have really appreciated having this app! I have used it a couple of times in a pinch and I have always received my money within seconds. Only allowed up to $75, you can‚Äôt borrow before at least 11 days til payday, and if you borrow what ever amount you can not borrow again until you payback the first amount borrowed, which I am grateful for because it keeps me from digging myself to far into the hole! A GOOD thing to note, when you are borrowing the money, the final screen is for a tip (to save the trees ) but if you don‚Äôt look closely it is preset to 15% but you can change it before you complete transaction, you can even click the link to set a manual amount. These things are all good to note but I don‚Äôt see them as cons, so far my experience has only been pros!!
title: Great when times are tight!!

review: I‚Äôve had Dave since November and everything was going well until today. I receive a check from my job that was half of what I usually get. So I paid back my 75+ the 6 dollars to get my money on the same day+ the 1 dollar service fee. So I try to get an advance today and it‚Äôs telling me that I can‚Äôt get an advance over TWENTY DOLLAR ! I‚Äôm a grown man, what am I gonna do with 20 dollars, my bank history shows that I always pay back my money, no matter what my checks look like. Even if it was just a suggestion for the $20, I should still had the option of a $75 loan due to my pass transaction, and I just find that unfair. How you going to tell me how much I can afford to pay back after all the time I did it before. I beyond upset by this and I want answers, you can‚Äôt tell somebody how to spend their money if your going to get it back regardless of what my fund say in my account. I always paid back on time and I always PAID BACK and that should be all that maters. FIX THIS !
title: How

review: So far so good it‚Äôs doing better than Earnin it‚Äôs so smooth and easy I was having so much problem with the Earnin app and the customer service is so terrible literally the computer for Dave fixed my same issue by itself with out needing a representative like Earnin did. And they all told me to go into the online banking website Nd change my things. I knew it wasn‚Äôt something I did wrong cus Dave app asks me if I changed anything on my bank by itself it said it would reset it self but tht was ok as long as I could use my money faster. Dave‚Äôs is awesome I even got a cash advance for 15 $ I really needed this I hope the app continues to work for me.
title: Excellent

I didn‚Äôt consent to that anywhere!! Also it seems like every other day I‚Äôm getting charged for this $1 fee on top of this app AUTOMATICALLY taking 15% to go with it even though it gives an option to choose a tip if wanted,and it still AUTOMATICALLY chose 15% for me making $75 turn into a whole $100 plus the other unnecessary fees I‚Äôm being charged because of this horrible app,and the fact that my accounts been hit this way and on top of no response from anyone on being reimbursed or anything that‚Äôs another big reason this app gets 1 star actually! review: I first found out about this app through an ad. I was skeptical at first but it is legit. It only took a few minutes to create an account, you have to verify yourself and your bank. Shortly after creating an account you‚Äôre prompted to select a $25, $50, or $75 as an advance and there is no interest if you wait 3 business days to have it deposited. I chose to pay a fee of $3.99 for express deposit.  The app states that it could take up to 1-8hrs for money to be deposited into your account, but my deposit was made almost immediately. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be using this app again, as I just wanted to see if it was too good to be true, and it is! And for a small fee of $1 a monthly this is a great app for anyone that maybe be short a few bucks until your next payday.
title: New intriguing and legit app!

review:
I just downloaded Dave not too long ago and I have to say I‚Äôm quite impressed. I‚Äôm not too good technically,  keeping up with apps and social so coming across Dave and seeing how easy and user friendly it is to navigate and find what you‚Äôre looking for is a great set up and just what I was looking for. I haven‚Äôt used all the options in the app because I am fairly new but I see that there are options that you can adjust yourself and options for tips which I will be looking to donate to when the time comes and I‚Äôm more familiar with the app. So far Dave is helping and giving an insight of what goes on with my account and I love it! I definitely recommend 10/10 
I also applaud the developer for doing a good job and investing their time for creating a well organized app, Thank you.
title: Great!

review: For 1 , I think everyone should have this app especially if you drive 30+ miles to work most days. Have you ever had to choose between gas or food just to make it that last day or 2 til you get paid? I sure have and it‚Äôs awful. Dave can help with getting you both.. have kids? Well than I have no need to explain why this is handy. I usually express when I use Dave because I usually need it at that time or day. It says wait time is 4-8hrs depending what you borrow, however I‚Äôve never waiting over 15mins. I‚Äôve tried other apps that Claim they are similar but I highly disagree because they make it as hard as trying to find a place to give you a short term loan. I‚Äôm a realist and it either works or it don‚Äôt well Dave works and it has saved me a handful of times. üôåüèºü§ôüèºüòä
title: Tight spot? DDDAAVEE GOTCHU

review: I‚Äôm a single mom and thought this app could help me get some groceries before my payday. I did a 50 dollar advance with Dave, and agreed to pay the four or so dollars plus ( for the advance to be done I‚Äôm 8 hours or under). The Dave app said that the 50 plus four dollar fee would be taken out when I get paid. There was no mention whatsoever about a random ten dollars being taken out. That‚Äôs right: the Dave app took out ten dollars randomly from my account, before my work pay has gone through!! This means less grocery money for my daughter and I and I‚Äôm worried I will be overdrawn if they suddenly decide to take more money from my account. I have enough problems to deal with and thought this app would help me but instead I‚Äôm now borderline withdrawn and have no idea if this app will keep taking money from my account. And the customer service is impossible to get ahold of; the Help link here on iTunes for the Dave app doesn‚Äôt even work.
title: Dave took out 10$ for no reason!!

review: I am among the most skeptical of people. I read reviews before I try anything. The ones I read for Dave made me feel like this was simple, yet real and that put me at ease. I have now completed the process completely- from signing up to borrowing $75 and having it deducted from my check. I waited to review to make sure nothing more than I expected was taken from my paycheck. I got exactly what was promised! The $75 that I borrowed + $4.99 fee and the $3 tip that I gave is all that was deducted from my paycheck. My $75 was in my account within 1 hour. The very next day after I paid it back I was informed I could go ahead and borrow another $75 if I needed it. LOVE this app!! As far as tipping goes- I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs ok not to leave one, but I work in a tip based industry so it‚Äôs just in my nature to do so.
title: Thankful For This App

review:
I recently got down to the last few dollars in my bank account because of some unforeseen emergencies. I was okay with this because I knew I was getting paid next week and could get by until then. I guess I spoke too soon because I got strep throat a few days later! Getting an advance from Dave allowed me to go to the doctor and get the medication I needed; without it, I would still be in a miserable amount of pain, waiting around for my next paycheck. I‚Äôm really impressed overall with this app and appreciate what a help it‚Äôs been. 
To be honest though, what made me download this app was when I saw that they plant a tree for each percent you‚Äôre able to to tip them! You don‚Äôt have to tip anything, but if you can, you‚Äôll be thanking the creators of this awesome app AND helping save the planet!
title: Awesome app!

review:
So I‚Äôm went on a two day trip out of town . I had a couple bucks but it was enough to last me the time . On the last night while I was ordering lunch , my account goes into the negative - mad bills came out . 
I only knew one person in the entire city but he couldn‚Äôt help so someone told me about this app . Of course everybody is skeptical but I was over drafted and hungry .
It was ode easy . You install , put in your bank info , verify your email and yourself and the app goes through your history to see the direct deposit . This took all of 5 minutes . $75 is the max , I qualified for it and they sent it in less than 5 minutes of me requesting it . Only charged me $5 for $75 . It tells you when it‚Äôs gonna take it out of your account .
It‚Äôs easy , simple and REAL .
Go for it .
title: Please Read ..

review: So I started on this app because I needed a few bucks and payday was still 5days out. I saw the ads for Dave everywhere so I said eh screw it maybe it won‚Äôt be a scam and at first I thought it was great. Get a small loan Pay it back with at most $8 on top not bad. Till I realized that if you‚Äôre ever in a pinch like oh idk your bosses didn‚Äôt pay you on time. They will not listen nor budge to help but they will attempt to pull the full amount later if they can not the first time well that‚Äôs not how it works. any money that is in the account they‚Äôll take leave you with 5-10 dollars and if you contact them to ask why they didn‚Äôt attempt the full amount you‚Äôll have to wait a full day or more for a response that helps in no way. I had my friend transfer me 50 dollars and they took 40 the second it hit my account. On top of all this they will constantly say that your account is about to be over drawn and that you need help! But every time my account is fine and my bills are paid. This app is just horrendous.
title: This app will drain you

review: I needed a couple extra bucks nothing huge but I needed a couple extra dollars just to hold me over for the week and I looked online to see if there were any money apps that I could use for a quick loan to pay back within a week and a half and Dave came up and I was really hesitant at first because it didn‚Äôt seem real and I was reading all the comments and everyone was saying it was good, but I got it and I had to put in my bank information of course and social security and all that! review: I was always see this ad for this app everywhere and always just ignore it because i didn‚Äôt trust it but one day i finally took it into consideration. I read the reviews and saw a bunch of 5 starts so i decided to download the app. The app gives you the option to get $25, $50, and $75 and a extra $3.00 if you need the money at that very moment (optional) or FREE to get the money in a couple days or hours. Me needing the money i just paid the extra $3 and got the money right away after i linked my bank info. You could pay back Dave whenever you get paid or when you get the money back! review: I would of never downloaded an app like this if I hadn‚Äôt seen the commercial in tv.  Once I found it, I noticed right away that it was a featured favorite in the Apple Store.  Those two advertisements together made me feel secure in sharing my info.  Dave‚Äôs graphics are fun and simplistic.  The app itself is very easy to use and doesn‚Äôt take long at all to set up.  Once all your personal credentials have been checked, Dave offers several different types of financial options.  Whether it be side gigs to make a little extra cash, reoccurring debt analysis or a quick cash advancement to help you out until next payday.  The money was in my account within minutes!  There are fees involved but they are minimal...nothing different than what you see on Venmo or PayPal.  Very cool concept for an app!
title: Dave‚Äôs App Rocks!

review:

 DONT GET THIS APP!!!

review: I can Borrow up to $75 but the only few things I would ask to be changed is to allow the Borrower to set the Payback date up to 2 weeks. Or put the payback date to the day we get paid. Like how Brigit does it. I would also like to be able to unlock the $100 but in order to do that I must have a Dave Debit card. If you are someone like me and have a crap load of cards already why would you want to add yet another card to your wallet, but I would like to achieve getting the $100 to borrow. You should make that possible somehow, maybe make it available to those that payback on time but only if you can borrow the $75 limit that you have set and make enough money that you know the $100 can be paid back. Other than those things I love the Dave app it has saved me on multiple occasions. Thank you Dave, you are amazing.
title: I love Dave

review: I was super skeptical of using Dave, since it asked for banking info and I‚Äôd never really used anything like it before. It worked really well the first few times. signed up super fast and was able to get a loan up to $75 very easily. What frustrates me is about a month into it, I suddenly couldn‚Äôt get a loan anymore. I emailed customer service and they told me they only allow direct deposit and if you have paper checks deposited it won‚Äôt work.  I had been using it for a month, deposited my check the same time/day every week( because I work for a small business and my job can‚Äôt do direct deposit). I would pay back in full on time or even early. I‚Äôm super Disappointed because something should‚Äôve been said earlier when I signed up. I make good money and had been very loyal to Dave, recommending it to all my friends.  It‚Äôs not fair to people who get paper checks and don‚Äôt get to have direct deposit. I liked the app very much but now I can‚Äôt even use it and left a very upset and disappointed customer.

Example: I could change my car payment to the actually full amount, instead of the partial payment I did last month that is shown in the statement. Dave is a 2 in 1, and so far so good!

review: I should start by saying I never write reviews for apps, but I just have to for Dave! As a recent graduate, living paycheck to paycheck, there‚Äôs been a handful of times where unavoidable circumstances (i.e. emergency dental work, a visit to the vet, etc.) have left me unable to buy food and essentials for the week. Not enough to be worth the time or the effort to go through the whole process of getting a traditional loan. This app is JUST what I was looking for. An easy way to borrow just enough to get me through to payday. Not mention the process was incredibly easy, and I had the money in my account not even a minute after it cleared. I truly don‚Äôt understand people complaining about the $1/mo fee or the optional tip - they‚Äôre a business and need to generate revenue somehow. I love Dave and will recommend it to everyone and anyone.

review: I used to love this app. I pay a lot of bills between Loan payments, rent, insurance, etc. and it helps me between checks. I‚Äôve never had an issue paying on time and have always left their ‚Äútip‚Äù. However, I recently deleted the app because I was trying to not rely on advances anymore but after a misunderstanding with my bank I was charged nearly $130 in overdraft fees over 2 days. This payment came out on my payday with rent, leaving me very short on cash. I redownloded Dave and hoped it could help again, but when I tried to advance I was told I could take $15 max and had to pay it back before payday. I thought this may have been because it was more than 10 days before I got paid, but prior to this it has always just denied to give me an advance before their 10 day limit. If this issue could be solved I would say this app is perfect and extremely useful, but it denied to help me when I needed help the most. So I‚Äôm just switching to another advance app.
title: Used to love it...
developerResponse: {'id': 4018978, 'body': "Hey l--67! We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and experience you went through with us. Shoot us an email at friends@dave.com and a representative will gladly help you out!! We're always here to help our users.", 'modified': '2018-06-28T21:22:37Z'}

review:
This is not something people should use to go shopping with. That said, if you find yourself in a situation where you have an overdraft, this can quickly keep you from being charged overdraft fees.

I accidentally moved too much money to an online savings account yesterday and woke up with a negative balance. Electronic transfers take days so I had no easy way to get money back into my checking account before my bank charges a fee. Dave sent me a notification with an offer to borrow the exact amount I had over-drafted before I even saw the overdraft. I didn‚Äôt even have a chance to get stressed out about how I‚Äôd handle it. 

I can see how an app that easily allows you to create a debt can be misused, but this is overall a great and very helpful service.
title: Lifesaver in times of need

review:
This is a great app. All you do is put in your bank information and it connects to your account. As long as you have a big bank like USAA, Chase, etc. you‚Äôll be good to go. Smaller local banks won‚Äôt be able to connect.
The app sees your deposits and amounts that go into your account every month and predicts when your next payday will be and for how much based off of history. So as long as you‚Äôre going to make enough to pay back the loan, they will let you borrow money 10 days before your next check. Up to $75 right now. Then on your payday it takes the money back plus a small fee $5.

Money always comes in within 5 minutes for me, and I have not had any problems. It‚Äôs been a real life saver sometimes for me. I have nothing but good things to say about this app.
title: NOT A SCAM!

review:
This wasn‚Äôt my first choice app, I was going to use a different vendor that provided similar services but they didn‚Äôt work with Chime bank so I went with Dave. 

In theory this is a great service and the fees are less than what you would pay for overdraft or on a payday loan. 

But my only issue is that they charge you a fee to have the funds deposited within 8hrs. Anyone who is using this service is using it because there‚Äôs an element of urgency behind their need. If they could wait (3) days to get the money deposited without a fee then they would but clearly they are not in a position to wait so the appeal of this service would be to get the funds in the account as quickly as possible. If you knew 3 days from now that a certain transaction was going to put you in overdraft then you would cancel the transaction to avoid an overdraft fee; you wouldn‚Äôt need to use Dave...get my drift?
title: The fee structure is weird
developerResponse: {'id': 9577590, 'body': "Hi GracoTrunner, we understand your concern! The charge is due to bank fees. Sadly, we have no control over those, but we feel the peace of mind that comes with avoiding overdrafts until payday is worth it. Thank you for using Dave, we're glad you've been enjoying it!", 'modified': '2019-07-09T23:19:56Z'}

review:
So never do I write a review or comment on anything simply because I don‚Äôt try it. Well this week our budget was a little short an we need some grocery‚Äôs for the house & dog food. So I was very nervous an read all the reviews I could an figured the worst to happen was I‚Äôd have to call my bank an report fraud. So I connected my account an my card an applied for a short loan. An Dave offered me 25 , 50 , or 75. So I picked the $50 an it cold $4 to get it writhing 8 hours an I also left a tip. ( tip is mandatory) not even 20 minutes later the money is in my account! This is an amazing app to help working people who have direct deposit an need just a few buck to get them till Friday! Swear this is amazing an I‚Äôm
Beyond glad I gave it a try. We will be eating Taco Bell‚Äôs dollar menu tonight baby!!!! Lol 

Thanks Dave!!!!!!!!
title: Omg this is amazing!

review: So , like i was very skeptical of it even working , especially since you have to pay a $1 which turned out to be $1.99 üôÑ but it just seemed like a scam , so I‚Äôm like whatever why not I‚Äôll try it , verified my self & email address, agreed to the $1.99 (that they take AFTER it‚Äôs time to pay back) & literally within seconds $15 was in my account .. so yeah it was my first time using it & I don‚Äôt expect anyone to give you $75 the first time .. cause who knows if you‚Äôll get it back .. but in the app it says I need to get paid back before i can increase you , which makes perfect sense... I mean i get paid in 3 days so $15 was a decent little cushion , im 23 lol so I‚Äôm still learning how to budget money & pay bills yada yada so this is helpful for me , working full time & being in school it‚Äôs just great .

review: Dave is real. I thought it was a gimmick since i seen so many ads all over ig and snapchat. I went down to my last $10 and really needed some cash. I downloaded Dave because a coworker recommended it to me actually, & i got my $75 in the next couple days. You are given the option to pay a fee in order to receive the cash the same day or choose the free option which takes a couple days. The app also plants a tree for every tip amount that you leave which is amazing. I will be continuing to use Dave for my short term quick money needs. It takes the cash out if my bank account on my next pay date which is great because i dont have to worry about it. Thank you and shout out to you Dave for being there for me when I needed it the most.
title: its real people

review: I needed more money than I had for a work trip. I tried out this app and request a load of $75, i chose the 5$ fee to get it within 8 hours. Later that night I see the money is in my account and think great. The next morning it‚Äôs still there and I take a Uber to where I needed to go(50 miles from my home). Everything goes fine and then I go to use Uber to get home later and it said insufficient funds. Now I check my bank to see the the issue is that the money has been taken back out of my account leaving me stranded 50 miles from home on a hot summer day in Georgia. I try to find a way to contact them and all they all is for you to email them no number to call. Aaaaaand they say they will get back to me in up to 24 hours. Needless to say this was a horrible first and last experience with ‚ÄúDAVE INC‚Äù & I‚Äôd never recommend it to anyone I‚Äôd actually caution you not to use this app if your circumstances are similar to mine. Don‚Äôt get stranded, don‚Äôt use dave. 0 stars should be an option in cases like this.

review: If I could give them a zero I would. I was charged a $29 overdraft fee from my bank and another $21 from DAVE itself on Monday. On Dave‚Äôs app they state that they check your account before hitting it to avoid fees such as these but that‚Äôs actually a complete lie. After a WEEK of trying to contact someone I support regarding this they finally tell me that they are refusing to refund me because my bank told them I had the funds in my account which honestly doesn‚Äôt sound like something Golden One would do. title: Overdraft Fee

They ASK you if you WANT to leave a tip, I did the first time, no problem, but wen I saw the $75 taken out, plus $5 express fee (so it comes immediately) an extra $2 tip, then this $1 dollar charge that I can‚Äôt seem to understand. It gives an OPTION to leave a tip, never required. So that can‚Äôt be the case. Anyone else having this problem? The app taking a few extra dollars out of your account whether or not you want to leave a tip. What‚Äôs that about? I want my money back. review:

You don‚Äôt have to burden them with those questions because let‚Äôs face it, we all need money and we are always coming up short, there is really no extra to lend to others. 

That‚Äôs why I love this app, they give you 3 amount options to choose from,also while showing you a purpose of good karma because you can also tip to plant trees. If every company out there has consumer options to improve and impact the world just imagine how much more we would all benefit from it.

Also, anytime I‚Äôve reached out with a question, their customer service has been great which was another reason I was skeptical at first because of other reviews. title: Great to help you get to your next pay check!

review:
So I have never been able to successfully use this app. There has always been some kind of problem and it‚Äôs been truly frustrating. Then when Dave finally predicted that my account would be overdrawn he actually hadn‚Äôt predicted anything and my account was already overdrawn. On top of that they mislead you by saying that they can give you a cash advance but they leave out the part that in order to not be charged for it you have to wait three business days in order for it to post to your account or for $3.99 you can get it in 2 hours. 

They need to be more transparent with their information, their process needs to be better streamlined and outlined for folks so people actually understand it and can decide if this is actually a feasible option for them or not. title: The Dave App was no good for me
developerResponse:
{'id': 2146660, 'body': "Sorry for the mishap. I'd actually love to hear more of your problems if you wanted to email us at friends@dave.com. Please also send your mobile number you used to create your account so we can take a deeper look. We'll also use that to permanently delete your account.

review: These past few weeks have been a crazy struggle after having lost some hours while my employers found a store for me to set in as assistant. review: This was super helpful when I started a new job and they held pay for four weeks. With Dave I am able to select the pay back date so there is no way the cash would be gone until I know I've been paid. I wish it would start you out at more than 20 dollars but even the 20 was super helpful to get me by with a new location get commute and a month with no paycheck.
title: Such a good app

review: I was skeptical about using an app like this. I have tried others and found them difficult to use because I do not have a punch in clock I was unable to get far in the enrollment process. However, Dave just needs a direct deposit account and it is good to go! I have used Dave multiple times and love it. I recommended it to many of my friends. This is a great app if you are in a pinch or just want some extra cash to enjoy a night out. You pay Dave back via automatic withdrawal on your next pay day and there are no penalties if you choose to pay the money back early. You can only withdrawal funds within 10 days of your direct deposit pay date. You can add a tip in if you would like but it is completely optional. I love Dave and would recommend to anyone.

title: Hi Dave

review: This app is a lifesaver when it actually functions...unfortunately, that‚Äôs not very often, in my experience. If the app isn‚Äôt randomly generating an ‚Äúunexpected HTTP response‚Äù error (as it does 75% of the time I try to use it), it‚Äôs irritating me with the payday recognition algorithm. I get paid on the 15th and last day of each month, but the middle of the month check can come on a different date depending on what day of the week the 15th falls on. If I get paid on the 13th, it seems to throw the app‚Äôs ability to recognize I‚Äôm still getting regularly paid. Also, I‚Äôm on my husband‚Äôs bank account as a joint owner, but I don‚Äôt use it. title: Worst app ever- even worst customer service.
developerResponse: {'id': 21123855, 'body': 'Hey there,\nPlease email us at davecares@dave.com for further assistance. ', 'modified': '2021-02-17T23:34:05Z'}

review: Dave Co. has you on a ‚ÄúNewby‚Äù ‚ÄúHoneymoon‚Äù period and uses this block technology to gain access to all of your banking and financial info. For your first time use, this company will probably offer you an amount of up to $75 or $100. Nothing wrong with that and you can even pay back as scheduled. However, the second and future time around, they have had plenty of time to totally snoop  into your actual spending habits. And for those with tight budgets and barely any leftover money to save, just spare yourself the coming humiliation, Dave is worse than them just going by a credit check. At least a credit check is a simple yay or nay and you can quickly bounce to another lender. However, Dave‚Äôs will just each day humiliate you, every time you open their app. You will just see charts of your money spending and  downward spiral of your deposits made. When  you try to get any further money advances, they will laugh and offer you $5 with a $3 transfer fee! They make Payday loans look good !!!!!!
title: CONSUMER BEWARE!!!!

We have the same bank (BOA) and she said she found Dave and it‚Äôs saved her so many times on behalf of overdrafts all under $5!!! Dave is easy to use, professional, and sends your money instantly! I am an independent contractor and own my own company. I am solely commission based so I couldn‚Äôt enter in a solid pay date. When I went to delete the app due to that, they asked my why I explained! Instantly they said they‚Äôll work on it and credited my account what I needed! DEFINITELY need to download and use Dave! Interest is fair and reasonable! Amazing application, highly recommend!
title: Amazing!!

review: Everyone knows if you budget well ‚Äú over drafting‚Äù your bank account doesn‚Äôt happen. However for those of you that are like me and let it slip now and then. Dave is the answer. Money goes in as soon as 8 hours if you pay the express fee of $4.99. Otherwise if you don‚Äôt have a fee but it could take up to 3 business days before your cash hits your bank. In addition they will plant trees for every % off a tip you leave if you feel like doing so. Tip is optional. But you do get to see as you slide the tip bar down to 0% the trees in the background disappear leaving it to look like a sad dessert, making you feel a little sad about the trees you prevented from being planted. This app has helped me and I will continue using it when I have to.
title: Saved me overdraft fees

review: The only app like this that I have ever found worth the download. Some of my expenses vary on the days they are paid, so they don‚Äôt show up to be selected, yet are calculated again by the app afterward. This causes your app to think my balance will go negative if I‚Äôm not careful, and it doesn‚Äôt allow me to combine or clarify expected expenses. This will not keep me from using your app, it‚Äôs just inconvenient for it to mess up a wonderful functionality of it. Thank you!

review: The advances are awesome in a pinch, that‚Äôs for sure, but I also really enjoy the budgeting feature of this app which is something I didn‚Äôt even think I would be using. For someone who maybe finds it difficult to keep track of the little recurring payments that come out of your account, which can add up to significant amounts, the little reminders to check my bank account or the heads up that I have upcoming expenses for little subscriptions has kept me from over drafting my account on multiple occasions. It‚Äôs also helped me budget my paycheck, better, and allowed me to set money aside. I really enjoy this platform and customer service has been really helpful the few times I‚Äôve had to use it. 100% recommend.
title: Awesome help, not just for advances

review: The app is straight forward and easy to use. No hidden fees or hoops and love that it‚Äôs tip based with no recurring monthly membership fees. That being said, there is no chat or phone option for those who only use the app for cash advances (vs having a checking account with them). Your only option is to send in your question/request via email - I sent an email a week ago and the only response I have received was from a bot 2 days ago asking if I still needed help or if they could just close the ticket. I immediately replied that I still needed help and have not heard anything since. I needed to update my payback date and am now concerned that I will not receive a response prior to them processing my loan repayment, which will result in a hefty overdraft fee from my bank.  Over one week to get any type of initial response is excessive IMO - not sure I will continue using after this experience.

review: I was in a pinch. Just needed a little more cash to get rent paid. If I would have paid rent late I would have to come up with another $75 to pay late fee. That they ASK for, that they do NOT require!!??? This little tiny loan saved my month, saved me from having to ask friends, saved me from a week of anxiety trying to catch up financially. Thank you for not just seeing me as an opportunity to snag whatever you can from me as I fall down a financial rabbit hole like EVERY OTHER FINANCIAL INSTITUTION IN THIS COUNTRY. This was an awesome little find. Obviously created by a real human. Can‚Äôt say enough. Thank you!

When I applied for an advance this time, I was not able to.  When I checked the advance history, it shows I received 2 $100 advances the same day and both were paid off on the same day 2 weeks later however, it‚Äôs not possible. I tried to chat with customer service 4 times but kept getting disconnected.  I deleted the app a couple times and reinstalled it as suggested in a chat with CS without success.  A day or so later, I gave it a shot and got $75. Guess it‚Äôs better than nothing. DAVE, ya going backwards.  I do have to say, up until this, it‚Äôs been a great service.  Hope it gets better.
title: Glitches with advance and  CS chat

review: Money apps are hard to really trust in, its the basic you need to be able to prove you are making more then about 600 a month, for any kind of cash loan which it gives you a a little over a week to pay back, they report it to your credit score etc etc, but it also starts to analyse what you use each month and creates a bit of a budget (like hey, you usually spend 10$ on gas about now) or (your subscriptions are 24$ and the time to pay them is coming up) kind of deal, all in all its pretty nice but unless you are making more then 1000$ a month or build trust in the system with the payback stuff, theres not really a way to loan out more then 75$, its good for some quick cash (for 3.99 its deposited within hours, otherwise expect it to be about 2 days for free) but i wouldnt rely on it for a loan bigger then that. Not bad though.

review:
I had Dave before and I deleted my account because the payback process is way more stressful than it needed to be. When I authorize a payback I want you to get your money right then, not 5-7 days later. 
I reactivated because I heard that the payback system had changed to an auto debit like Earnin (which I love). HOWEVER, my first payback was late because it didn‚Äôt come out when it was supposed to even though there was more than enough to cover my payment. I had to contact support to get the payment done and I couldn‚Äôt do another advance for about a week because the payment took forever to clear in the Dave system. It was already posted and cleared in my account. 
I am finally eligible for another advance, but if this one is a hassle I‚Äôm leaving after my payment clears and not coming back. The idea is a great one, but this payback system needs serious work.

review: I know we are all supposed to have saved enough in our bank account that would pay our bills for at least a few months without any money coming in. That is just not the reality for a lot of us. Trying to juggle paycheck to paycheck is exhausting and stressful. Having DAVE is a great and inexpensive way to smooth out the rough spots in our budgets. I have used DAVE several times now and have always been super happy with the service. I try to plan in advance so I won‚Äôt get caught with the $5.95 fee for an immediate deposit. Next to regular Payday loans, DAVE shines like a beacon of light to those of us that know we are going to be a few days late on a payment and are going to have to eat that late fee. Thanks, DAVE~!
title: Dave is a great tool for keeping your budget running smoothly~!

review: So recently used the app because I needed extra money to pay my utility bill after paying rent. Since I just paid rent I was short needing extra money to pay my utility bill which is due in two days. I downloaded Dave thinking I could get $75 advanced from my next pay check and that would help cover my utility. However, Dave could only advance me $20. I was seriously upset because I would still be short. They falsely advertise that you will and can get loaned $75 with no interest and have the amount taken from your next check. Also, my payback date with the fees and tip don‚Äôt fall on my next pay date. My pay back date was a day before I get paid and it would only give me options for days before my pay date. I highly recommend using the earnin app over Dave because they will let you get $100 advanced and they take it out from your bank directly on your pay date and it‚Äôs instantly deposited in your account with no fees just a tip.

title: Great way to borrow a few bucks

review:
I used this app when I was in a crunch, and it came in handy for last minute emergencies. When I went to use it for the past week it never updated my bank account information, so I wasn‚Äôt able to cash out despite reporting my paychecks which were verified. 

I contacted customer service in which they promptly replied, they claimed it was my bank not wanting to release anymore information to the app. they‚Äôre directly tied to my account, and when the app did actually work it updated regularly. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm using another app similar to this one, and they saw it as fraudulent so the bank put a stop on releasing sensitive information- who knows. 

Anyway, I told the customer service rep to close my account to see if I reput my information in from the beginning would work. I open the app put my number in, it tells me to text so I can resubscribe. I do it then the app tells me I have to wait 56 days to reopen my account because ‚Äòit‚Äôs expensive to operate Dave, and Dave helps others out.‚Äô Really? I‚Äôm sure this app makes a killing charging people a dollar monthly plus all the money paid back, PLUS tips. 

Goodbye Dave we had something great but now I‚Äôm rebounding with Earnin which only allows me to take a hefty 100 dollars out of my pity weekly check.
title: Worked Then Nothing.
developerResponse: {'id': 8535907, 'body': "Hi Momma.manatee, we're sorry to hear you had a negative experience and apologize for the difficulty. We will check in with customer support and see what we can do to get your account reopened faster if you ever want to return.", 'modified': '2019-05-06T17:06:21Z'}

review: I needed a ‚Äúloan‚Äù until payday and I decided to try the app. I read a lot of the reviews and I was kinda skeptical cuz they would say ‚Äúit took days to get the money‚Äù or something negative but I thought I‚Äôm gonna try it anyway. I downloaded the app and it took me maybe 8 mins to give all the info I needed too and literally before I closed out the app the money was in my account. When the day came to pay it back they took out exactly what the said. I definitely would recommend and use again if I need too. The only thing I (we) didn‚Äôt like was my husband tried to use it too but couldn‚Äôt cuz the account was already being used. We have two checking accounts with the same log in. Would be nice if he could use his account also.
title: It‚Äôs great!
developerResponse: {'id': 5528250, 'body': "Hi there, so glad to hear you had a great experience! Please reach out to friends@dave.com to see if we can figure out how to get your husband's account up and running. Thanks for the review :)", 'modified': '2018-10-16T18:35:36Z'}

review:
I had an unexpected expense come up that was just large enough to make me have to choose between eating ramen at every meal for a week and putting gas in the car so I could go to work. Or, I would have had to make that choice, but Dave turned that question of ‚ÄúWhich one?‚Äù into nothing more than a ‚ÄúWhat if?‚Äù

Setting up my account and connecting my bank account and debit card was extremely easy and I went from downloading the app to having a positive account balance in fewer than 15 minutes. Thanks to their expense tracking, I also have come to the helpful realization that I probably SHOULD be eating more ramen and fewer burgers, as well as cancel a couple of streaming services that used to be free trials. Thanks Dave!
title: Saved me in a pinch so I didn‚Äôt have to pinch pennies
developerResponse: {'id': 5528352, 'body': 'Hi there, so glad to hear you had a great experience! Thanks for the review :)', 'modified': '2018-10-16T18:42:56Z'}

review:
I had to resign up once because it didn‚Äôt recognize my information now it needs to verify me for an advance even though I have had two.  Guess what I get a message the verification was taking to long.  If you are ever in a spot and need money I wouldn‚Äôt depend on Dave and his numerous glitches.

The developer said to email one of their top notch customer service reps.  I did once 5 days ago, 3 days ago and yesterday without a response.  If this considered top notch customer service by Dave then we all should be very concerned.  In my opinion the know the app is glitchy so they have no customer service number and up to this point I even wonder if they have customer service at all.
title: When this app works it is fine but it is so glitchy

review: I've used the app twice in which saved me in those emergencies and paid them back early but went in a few days ago and now I'm getting a message that they can't track how my deposits come. Confused but still sent through "chat" my stubs but yet the message hasn't been looked at yet. And why can't there just be a way to get to your "chat" without having to request the advance again? So I mean it was cool at first but now I don't know, not that the app should know why you get certain money but I get money sent to me from family and friends through Zelle and same with me sending but those deposits are payments for things. Can the app distinguish between a transfer or direct deposit because that could be my only explanation about when I get paid. Ah well, I'll see if I ever get a response from chat and maybe update my review.
title: Been good but now I don't know
developerResponse:
{'id': 1803764, 'body': "Hi decbabe77,

review: So you know you have the option when getting advance to give a tip to whatever cause they ‚Äúdonate‚Äù to. So, I got an advance because I needed the money. The max they can give you is $75 and so I got that but the only issue was that I didn‚Äôt choose a tip and low and behold, when it was time to pay back, I found a charge for $12 for a ‚Äútip‚Äù like y‚Äôall already charge me for putting it in my account to begin with, which is $4.99 and on top of that, they charged me even more. I emailed about this to Dave team and they still haven‚Äôt responded. They just sent me a text saying that they‚Äôll try to get to me ASAP which is a lie because it‚Äôs been a whole week. Screw this app!!!! Please Dave‚Äôs team, as a note, y‚Äôall should inform your users that not selecting no tip automatically puts a tip on their advance. If people needed an advance, it‚Äôs probably because they need it and not because they want to get it and end up spending more by the time they get paid. Complete bs.
title: This app is lowkey a scam
