review:
I do not recommend this app. I used it only once and was very dissatisfied. I had a small emergency due to a federal banking holiday. My pay was delayed a day. I found this app and was excited about it, but in the end it cost me money and didn‚Äôt fix my need.
My normal payday is Wed, but my bank credits it on Tues, usually. 
I needed $75 which was quickly approved. My issues with this app are this. The payback choices are the day you take the money. If you could pay it back the same day, I don‚Äôt think most would need it considering it‚Äôs tied to your bank account. The second choice is payday, which should be fine, but in my case, I didn‚Äôt even get to use the funds. I received them late on Monday afternoon and at 5:00 am Tuesday morning, most of it was taken back out of my account. This would have been ideal if there were just a little flexibility in the payback day. My experience was not positive and I will not recommend the app to anyone. Thanks Dave!
title: Think carefully about using this app

review:
I was super skeptical about using this app. Considering I‚Äôve seen it all over Facebook and as you know a lot of that stuff is scams. But I was in a really rough position a couple days ago and I needed gas money to go see some family in the hospital. So I took my chances and it so simple and my money was in there within 10 minutes! 
It just asks what is direct deposited into your account. You decide what check you want the borrowed money to be taken out of and boom it‚Äôs there. There is a fee for it being put in your account immediately but that‚Äôs only 3.99$ plus a tip which you can decide how much you want to tip. It cost me a total of 7$ to get that money which also doesn‚Äôt get taken out until you get paid! 
It‚Äôs great and a huge help!!
title: Great!!

userName: KI KI DO YU LUV ME
review: If you‚Äôre in a jam and need money right away, we‚Äôll look no further than DAVE! Dave is the most efficient and convenient money app out on the market. I never had to use an app to borrow money before, so this was my first time! I was out of town and I needed to borrow some extra money in between time before my paycheck arrived in my account. The formatting of the app made it easy to set up my account in seconds, and I was able to borrow money right away with my bank, and there was no issues with my bank confirming the app! Got my money literally on the spot with no issues and don‚Äôt have to worry about paying it back because it‚Äôs automatically debited as soon as my paycheck arrives! Thanks DAVE ! YOU SAVED THE DAY!
title: Best App Thus Far For Money Borrowing !

review: Thought the app would be very gimmicky with a lot of strings attached but decided to try it anyway. It‚Äôs very easy to get the money you need when you need it, and not gimmicky at all. The money is transfered instantly with a very small percentage fee, or you can do a free transfer but it takes 3 days. There truly is no strings attached. It automatically takes the money from your account when you get paid so you don‚Äôt have to worry about it and you only have to pay a $1 a month fee which is worth it when you‚Äôre pressed for cash a few days before your payday. It does ask you to leave a small tip of like a few dollars but you don‚Äôt even have to if you really don‚Äôt want to and aren‚Äôt feeling generous.
title: Great App and Very Helpful

review:
On three occasions that I have utilized this service I have seen unauthorized deductions from my account the following weeks.  Each time I have used the service I have consistently said zero tip and yet on these three occasions this corporation has just decided to deduct the tips it desires from my account without my authorization or agreement.  So if you do use it, be sure to watch your bank statements carefully.  I have yet to hear how they respond when I disputed their unauthorized deductions.

In response to my review Dave wrote that a tip is always optional.  They either didn‚Äôt read my review  or I wasn‚Äôt sufficiently clear, so let me be:  on three occasions I expressly authorized $0 as a tip and contrary to my instructions, on three instances Dave stole a minimum of $10 in each instance out of my account and against my express instructions.  Although they say a tip is optional, when I said no tip they stole money from my account.  Do they figure a certain number of people just won‚Äôt notice?
title: Shady Raquet

review: I‚Äôve honestly been a little irritated with this app, for downloading it, it took about 36 hours to verify my bank account and every other app I‚Äôve had like this or have for banking doesn‚Äôt have this issue. Secondly, I don‚Äôt get paid on the same 2 days a month, it varies. One of the days marked as a ‚Äúpay day‚Äù for me I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever been paid on and if I have it was rare. review: I woke up to my account being overdrawn, it was too early so everyone was asleep and I wasn‚Äôt able to text anybody to zelle me some money and I sure was hell was not about to get up and head to the bank üòÜ, I used the Dave app before and it deposited my money instantaneously for a 5 dollar fee, it had been longer than the 60 days they require to be able to use the app again so I was able to download it again, because had I not deposited money into my account the bank was going to give me an overdraft fee, and with one eye open and one closed I filled out everything and I requested a 50 dollar advance üòÇ and as expected Dave delivered. In short I‚Äôm very happy with this app, definitely a life saver. Thanks so much.
title: Dave is a life saver

review: I just used this app for the first time today. To be honest I thought it was fake as hell. To my surprise, they deposited 75$ into my account within minutes!!!!!!! review: I was really skeptical about trying this app at first especially once you download it and it ask for you chase information as well as your social security number, but I was really in a bind and got tired of the bank overdraft fees. Dave let me borrow $75 until i get paid and you can either choose to pay 4.99 which will come out from your next check as well or wait three business days to get it. And I chose to receive it instantly and i signed my name and I checked my account in it was there to my surprise. And when I got paid it came directly out the exact amount no extra charges or anything. I recommend this app for anyone who needs a little extra money to get by till pay day
title: Satisfied Customer

review: I signed up for Dave a couple of months ago and have not been able to use the app yet. It said my account needed to be verified by microdeposits that were made by the app. $0.01 sat in my account for a few days then disappeared so I figured all was well. Next thing I know I‚Äôm getting an alert that Dave can‚Äôt verify my account. Ok so you can‚Äôt verify my account yet you can tell me anytime you think I‚Äôm going to be overdrawn or you can alert me to certain transactions? You can charge my account $1 every month but you can‚Äôt verify if it‚Äôs a good account? Finally I go to try to use the service again and I notice all of my account info in the app. My balance, deposits, and all my transactions, but you still can‚Äôt verify my account right? At this point I‚Äôm done. I tried sending my info again and it says it still can‚Äôt be verified. It should not be this difficult and if I can‚Äôt use your product stop charging me for it.

review: I never review apps. I was in a crappy position when a roommate left unexpectedly and needed to get by, when I saw an add for Dave on Facebook. I scoffed at it, but I was pretty close to pawning stuff off just to get gas to make it to work and back that week. Reading the comments and seeing how responsive the social media team was errors and such, I decided to give it a shot. Within 10 minutes I had an extra 75 in my account, and I‚Äôve now been using this app for a few months. It‚Äôs a great ‚Äújust in case‚Äù solution, and the finance tracking, while still in the works (it doesn‚Äôt seem to detect variable monthly payments like car insurance or phone bills too well) helps a ton! Great app, great support team, fantastic value for only $12 a year.
title: Works great

review:
Just started using Dave, I‚Äôm really excited about to receive my first payment of $75. I opted for the express delivery which said it would be 8 hours for an additional $4.99, however, I did not receive the transfer until the following day about 24 hours later, so I‚Äôm kinda upset about paying the additional money for express delivery that wasn‚Äôt express. 

Nonetheless, I am forever grateful for this service they really did the transfer and all you have to pay aside from the money back out of your next paycheck is a tip of your choosing (within their reasonable options), you also have an option to increase your deposit. I am excited about my first transaction and will continue using Dave. I also encourage others looking for extra cash in between paydays to use them.
title: Dave

review: I‚Äôve downloaded Earnin‚Äô and it took way too long to for my profile to complete. I‚Äôve downloaded Brigit. $10 a month on top of a loan? No thank you. So I‚Äôve resorted to Dave. Dave is a cool little app that budgets for you, and also gives you a pay day advance with no interest and no credit check! And there‚Äôs also two options when you cash out your pay day advance - standard option (takes 3 business days) or instant (8 hours) and like everything, fast isn‚Äôt free. It‚Äôs a 4.99 fee to instantly get the money. But luckily, it doesn‚Äôt take it out of your account right away, it waits until payday. You must be asking so wait, what‚Äôs the catch?? Well there‚Äôs only two catches, you tip whatever you think is fair (5-20%) and it costs a dollar a month. Not bad for a catch though right? :)
title: Thank You Dave üôèüèº

review: This app have saved me in more ways than one! I seen this app on a tv commercial so of course I was skeptical to try it out. But of course you can‚Äôt help it when times get hard so I tried it anyways (and it took about 2 months of waiting for them to calculate and determine my account as far as confirming my paydays with my online banking account) and I got approved for an advance finally and it really helped me out so much. They automatically take the advance (ALONG WITH a $4.99 fee included for payback if you choose to get the payment within an 8 hour period) on your very next paycheck. So if you‚Äôre ever in a bind AND can‚Äôt overdraft your account (or like me, don‚Äôt want to ask anyone for the money), then Dave is a go-to source!
title: So Clutch

review: I just downloaded Dave yesterday and requested money as I was at a balance of $9 and have 4 days until I get paid again. Setup was easy with my bank and I received the money instantly even though it said it could take up to 8 hours(maybe depends on your bank?). There‚Äôs optional tips and fees for deposit time frames(like shipping costs). But the tips and fees will come out when you pay them back(which they estimate when you‚Äôll receive your next check, and are linked to your account so can see when your check deposits). So far no problems! Would recommend for those in a pinch, just don‚Äôt forget it‚Äôs not free money, you have to pay it back so don‚Äôt take more than you can pay back!
title: So far so good

review:
I‚Äôm a grandmother raising three of my very young grandchildren, and with unexpected school projects and medical bills things can get tight at times. DAVE is great to use in cases such as this!
 DAVE also tells me when my account is getting low and It‚Äôs great to know that my Financial information is safe, plus he can help me to forecast a budget so that i‚Äôll be in control of my spending!
I received a message that said that it could take up to eight hours to receive the money, and immediately afterwards a message popped up saying that it was done!
Dave also give to causes that affects us all, like programs that feed children and this is the first time that I‚Äôve been involved with a lender with a conscious, and it feels good!
Thanks DAVE for everything!
title: Thank You Dave! ü•∞

review: Dont get me wrong, your friends and fam will be there in the long run, Dave has gotten me thru a few situations where i thought i was stuck. They only let me take out 20$ my first 3 times this last time they advanced me the whole 75$ and i seen the tip i send goes to feeding America at first was only gonne tip 5% then i read that and gave enough for 15 meals. This app is very resourceful when your other resources have been used up they have given me a final final option when im seriously in need of a financial safety net. Taught me better budgeting ideas, and soon enough ill be a HeyDave Bank associate, cant say ive found any other app that has made me as happy to use it instead of phoning a friend Dave is just one App away. YOU GUYS ARE LIFESAVERS!!!
title: Better than a Good friend

review: This app is probably the easiest of its kind to use in terms of setup and accessibility. All you do when you download is login to your online banking system through Dave, and then boom: you‚Äôre given an aesthetically pleasing bank statement, it calculates how much money you will have based on your spending by the end of the month, and you are immediately able to borrow money. It does all the work for you, calculating out how much u make from certain reoccurring monthly deposits: and allows you to borrow a certain portion of the money. Money is usually due within a week, and Dave automatically takes whatever amount out which you owe (if you do instant deposit it‚Äôs an extra $4.50 or so). I‚Äôd highly reccomend this app, it‚Äôs awesome.
title: Fantastic App

review: It helped me out when I used to be broke üòÖ I‚Äôm not sure if I remember correctly but I‚Äôm pretty sure you have to wait a week or two before you get to qualify so make sure to get it before you‚Äôre dead broke lol you can manage yourself really well and get you‚Äôre money in 3 days or pay the extra 5$ to get it basically instantly I have chase and I remember I got money in line before ordering my food so that‚Äôs pretty dope. review: Started using about 2 weeks ago. I am supposed to get my debit card within the next week or so... looking forward to it! I have used the advancements 3 times so far for 20$! One of the advances I never received and had to pay back so I personally believe that Dave owes me 20$ now but other than that one mishap it seems to be ok ....When I get the debit card I‚Äôm supposed to be able to advance up to 100$as long as I get it because I will be seriously upset if that same thing happens with 100$ and I have to pay back that much without ever receiving it. Also that happened over a month ago so I just figured it‚Äôs a loss !! I also really like how it keeps track of my money coming in and what‚Äôs been spent.
title: Great app

review:
Greetings coming from somebody that works in debt collections. It‚Äôs a great relief to find a app like Dave that‚Äôs safe, organized, very futuristic alternative that doesn‚Äôt require any credit whatsoever and doesn‚Äôt have loopholes tryin to manipulate the customers. 

However, it is a tremendous pain that after having all the requirements necessary to be a candidate capable of using the $25-$75 advance, if you guys can‚Äôt see 60+ transactions we‚Äôre unable to use the service. My first problem is that I indeed have more than enough transactions , great income record with my credit union I‚Äôve been with for years so that shouldn‚Äôt have been a problem to begin with. And even if I didn‚Äôt have 60+ transactions, I find it hard to understand what significance that would have after customers willingly hand over private banking information to you guys which allows you to access our accounts just for it to still not suffice .   

My point is it defeats the purpose of your companies motto of ‚Äòwe can help you in need‚Äô and let alone makes it any reliable when those dire times do occur.

Besides that great fan looking forward to how you guys will develop this app but that‚Äôs my only complaint which happens to be very imperative.
title: Remove the ‚Äò60 transaction‚Äô requirement and you‚Äôll be perfect.

review:
This app is incredibly handy for the quick bind where you need to fill the gas tank a couple days before payday, and other issues you may run into if you‚Äôre stuck paycheck to paycheck. I say ‚Äòdon‚Äôt get stuck‚Äô because it becomes amazingly easy to spend money from a check ahead but ultimately it‚Äôs still gonna be taken out. I‚Äôm sure there are many life mishaps that this app could help with. Money does make the world go round.

     I‚Äôm mostly pleased with this app, sometimes the interface on the phone is struggling to update and other small glitchy moments. However, it seems safe and I‚Äôm not too worried about my finances being compromised or exposed because of Dave. Hopefully, security never becomes an issue with this app or this review will have to be superseded.
title: Don‚Äôt get stuck

review: It does what it says it‚Äôs going to do; loans you money. Instead of paying interest, you give a tip (that you don‚Äôt have to give, so far). However, once you‚Äôre out of the red, don‚Äôt keep this because you‚Äôll become dependent on it. ‚ÄúOh, $20‚Äù here and ‚Äú$70‚Äù there until boom! You‚Äôre in the hole again. Just learn to save. Oh yeah, I think Dave is supposed to help you save. So far (only have had the app for a day and they want a review so here ya go) it‚Äôs only helping me by telling me what my bank statement might be by the end of the week. Like a projected outcome. Dave takes the money out when you get paid so we‚Äôll see how much he took from the top. Anyways, learn to save and invest...in mostly saying this for myself because borrowing money from an animated bear...a new low.
title: Does what it‚Äôs supposed to do...that‚Äôs it.

review: At first I loved this app, it was convenient and helpful when you needed a couple of extra dollars to make it through . Then for no reason whatsoever the app decided I get paid every week instead of every two week. Ok no problem I‚Äôll just message the ‚Äúhelp center ‚Äú and let them know about the issue. I got a confirmation email that my message was received and that they would be getting back with me ASAP. A month, three paychecks and 5 messages sent later still nothing . It even took half of the money I owed at one random time 3 days before payday .. that was money I was going to use to get to work üò°üò°. Bad customer service?? NO CUSTOMER SERVICE at all!! If you are going to be dealing with peoples money you need to get your customer service fixed!

review: Took me maybe 10-15 minutes to give my info, was a little worried what they could do with the info, but I needed any amount of funds, they were only able to give me $15 and I chose the express option for $1.99 which doesn‚Äôt have to be paid until they collect from your account. Of course I wish I would‚Äôve been able to get more from the jump, but frankly any amount would‚Äôve helped and this app was able to do just that. Other than that it‚Äôs around $5 to have it instantly put into your account or free within 2-3 business days. It‚Äôs very simple to use aside from these issues and you can be approved for $20 $50 or $75. Not bad for a small emergency.

title: Dave vs other loan apps

review:
I have had Dave for a few months now and honestly it is life saving. After their latest software update, however, I‚Äôve ran into a problem with the system recognizing my paycheck that i get directly deposited. My advance went from $75 to $20 because the app says I missed a paycheck when I clearly got paid. To make matters more interesting, I‚Äôve contacted their customer service department twice with no response but an automated message telling me that they‚Äôll contact me again shortly. It‚Äôs been 3 days. I‚Äôm really disappointed because the app was working totally fine and then now this happened with no apparent resolution.

Update:
After going back and forth with tech support for weeks, nothing has been resolved. I set up an account with a different payday advance app and they approved me within minutes. I do not recommend Dave if you run into any issues with the app because their customer service department is basically non existent.

title: Cindy

review:
Hopefully this helps someone. 
Essentially it did what it claims. The issue I have is paying for express delivery to get the funds faster. I read a few reviews of people saying they received their funds same day within an hour or two from when they chose express delivery at check out. It does state it may take ‚Äúup to 8 hours‚Äù for express delivery. After not receiving the funds the first two hours , I figured I‚Äôd have to wait the whole time. Not a problem for me. 

So I waited, after 8 hours I emailed support which responds with an automated message saying someone will get back to me. I know this because I emailed three different times and all were the same response. 
I received the funds the next day, however I am a little upset at the fact that I also paid a tip at check out (stupid really if you ask me)  You would think it would incentivize them. 
Overall, overpromise underdeliver. 
You would think I would be an ideal customer for them, paying extra when you can simply opt out of the extra services when checking out. 
Still no response from anybody.

title: The Dave app has been a humongous help!!!

review:
I signed up with Dave but hadn‚Äôt borrowed any money yet.  I just wanted Dave to monitor my spending and account balances so that he could alert me of possible overdrafts and payments that were coming due.  When I got my first alert, Dave offered to lend me the money to avoid bank fees and overdrafts.  The application was super fast and easy and I had the money within an hour!  I would recommend Dave to anyone who needs help managing their money or needs help in a pinch!
The second time that I requested an advance from Dave, I noticed that they had my pay dates wrong.  I contacted Dave to correct it immediately and was assured that they had corrected it.  When it came time for me to pay back my advance, much to my surprise Dave withdrew the money out of my account early which affected my schedule of ACH commitments that I had already coordinated.  Luckily I jumped right on it and managed to work things out.  This was an ‚Äúall day‚Äù chore that was very stressful and exhausting.  
Other than that, Dave has been there for me and helped me out no matter what time of the day or night I needed it.
Thanks for everything Dave!  

Sincerely, 

Shawn Hart
title: Nick of time!

review:
So, I originally had a review that talked about how I wasn‚Äôt able to use Dave because it wouldn‚Äôt link to my bank, but that it seemed like an awesome and helpful app. However. This week I got in a desperate place where I needed money and I thought, ‚ÄúWhy not give Dave another shot?‚Äù And this time it worked! Dave is so helpful, and I cannot express how thankful I am for this app. I have even told my friends and family about Dave, and I hope they will use it as well. I highly recommend using this app. Not only because you can get a pay advance of $75, but because it also helps you budget and offers other ways of making additional money on the side.
I hope you give it a shot like it did!
title: Dave Is So Helpful!

review: The app was great for the first two or three times I took out a loan. I choose the tip I want to give plus the 2-5$ charge based on the loan amount. Because I love they are not overcharging for a loan I tipped ‚Äúgenerously‚Äù. After about three months I log in one day to get a loan and realize the checking account number listed is wrong. So if I apply for a loan it might not go into my account but whose to say it magically updates when time comes to pay back. I tried updating the info but it asked to verify info again which would mean waiting another month for Dave to verify deposit into my account. Although it still had my transaction history on the app. It was too weird for me so I canceled my Dave account and removed all banking info. It was good while it lasted.
title: Ok at first...

review:
The only reason I‚Äôm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because I wish there was a way to borrow more money. Other apps and most places I‚Äôve seen that are very similar to Dave usually have the option to borrow more $. Usually it depends on how much income you‚Äôre bringing in & you need to show them you are responsible and pay back timely. Dave doesn‚Äôt give you any options at all. 

Aside from that I have nothing but positive and great things to say about this app. WAY better than the old walk in cash advance places where you have to wait in line & then everyone there can hear your business. What I REALLY like about Dave is that the money goes to your account very quickly. (Less than 8 hours) When choosing the ‚Äúexpress‚Äù option for only $4.99.
title: Lifesaving App!!

review: Dave is already saving me from over drafting and keeping finances in order, this is the beginning of a beautiful "friendship." üôÉ Now, there was an additional charge for wanting cash right away, but that was nothing compared to the $32 fee my bank would have charged me. All I have to do is auto-pay back what I borrowed as soon as my regular pay hits the bank. Easy peasy. A tip is requested when doing so, so that's no big deal and still only a couple dollars compared to the insufficient funds fee I would have incurred. If you need help managing your cash flow and/or often run just a bit short before payday, this app is for you and an excellent place to start getting your finances in order. Thanks, dev team!! üòä‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Dave to the rescue!!

review: I always hear about these types of apps, and was my 1st time trying this one because the logo caught my eye, and also because once i pulled up the app, the reviews i read before downloading it were really good. I only didnt give it 5stars, because when i tried to enter my bank info, it wouldnt process kept kicking me out and i had to connect my bank info several times before i gave up and tried again in the morning. Might be a glitch, but it made me very sketch at 1st because it would connect to my bank log in but right after that it would freeze and kick me out. review:
It took me a few days to get to know how Dave works, all in all, I‚Äôve enjoyed it so far. I plugged in my bank info & at first, I only qualified for $5 advance because I‚Äôve only received 2 small checks from my employer for about ~$40 & this last check for ~$200 but today, I qualified for $15 advance after leaving @ least $150 in my bank acct (a tip from Dave himself!) from Friday to Monday so....(curiosity killed the cat & I just wanted to see how the process went already). 
   I‚Äôm almost positive if I didn‚Äôt have a few things to pay on today & left my balance above $150 until payday, then by this upcoming paycheck (weekly, every Friday) I would have been able to advance the $75. I can definitely say that I will be actively using Dave in the future!
title: Broke living @ home, 20 yr old says 4 stars!!

review: Great app to have when in need. Easy to use and able to get an advance that same day and doesn‚Äôt make you pay a monthly fee off the rip. Starts you off at a small advance on your paycheck but as you go it starts to increase up to $100. Only issue I‚Äôve had is that I‚Äôve gotten charged a 10 dollar tip when I haven‚Äôt agreed to it or clicked on a tip so seeing extra money being taken out of my account when not expected is kind of a bummer. My gf download it as well when I told her about it but she hasn‚Äôt seen an increase on hers, doesn‚Äôt say why or what she can do in order to receive an increase on an advance but either than that ,great to have.
title: Worth having when in need.

review: I heard of the Dave app from a friend  guyand really didn‚Äôt think it would be as easy as they said. So after putting it off and needing money yesterday I said what the heck and it was pretty  easy to get started after getting the app. BiAs soon as I was done giving my info I checked into getting an advance on my paycheck and I was surprised that they were already going  to give me a part of my check a few days early. I paid it back the day of my paycheck arriving. I strongly recommend this app and it‚Äôs nice to see something good happening in our daily lives again amidst such uncertainty. I rate this app 5 stars
title: Finally something good thru all these financial difficulties that has people broke from the pandemic

review: Ok I get it with a name like Dave you immediately think of your weird uncle Dave.... maybe it‚Äôs just me, but who cares about the name with an amazing app like this!! It‚Äôs saved me from being stranded with no gas, to helping me celebrate a little extra for my birthday (Shout out because I haven‚Äôt celebrated my birthday for 14 years), to helping me see my recurring bills and where I can work on saving money! Like what company will show ways to save so you may not have to use the app every 2 weeks? Company‚Äôs need to make money too and this one cares for its users! I was apart of Dave when they let you pay back and planted trees with it. We need more apps that help the users like Dave! 5 stars all around!
title: How are people not more jazzed about Dave?!

review: I am very appreciative that this app/company helps me out whenever I am in a pinch. And I really don‚Äôt mind the fee to get the cash asap, and I leave a tip each time I borrow because I am very grateful. The only downside that I have about using the app is that each time you borrow money, the amount they allow you to borrow goes from $75 down to $40 and so on. There is also a waitlist to open an account with Dave, where you would be allowed to borrow $100. But this app is the real deal, it‚Äôs very easy to use and convenient. There is also a couple days wait to receive your first borrowed amount when you sign up, because they have to link your bank account and your bank has to also confirm. Enjoy and borrow wisely.
title: Very helpful, just one disappointment.

review:
I downloaded the app, and was declined for being a member - probably due to being a 1099 employee. But my card all of a sudden received 7 charges for $1, and the app has been deleted for some time now. Will change my review if my money gets refunded for something I didn‚Äôt use or get any benefit from.

** - update - I am still being charged monthly, and even after contacting Dave Support, the $1 a month charge has been going on my bank statement for well over a year now. Will just have to call my bank and report as fraud, since they don‚Äôt care to think what it does to someone who is a contracted employees pay statements. Unbelievable. Scam.
*** update May 2020
Still being charged monthly for a membership I don‚Äôt have. Will continue updating until the BBB is aware. You‚Äôre welcome for your cash advances! Since it‚Äôs coming from non-customers accounts. With NO follow up from anyone at this ‚Äúcompany‚Äù.
title: Charged 7x without being a customer
developerResponse: {'id': 13720893, 'body': "Hi there! Please note, deleting the app doesn't cancel it out. Please contact us at davecares@dave.com!", 'modified': '2020-02-26T16:44:30Z'}

review: Omg, I can‚Äôt express how much of a blessing this service was. My one year old was diagnosed with an ear infection in both ears, and we are waiting for his insurance to be reinstated. Bc he had an ear infection two weeks ago in one ear we thought we could go to Publix again to get it free but bc he was prescribed a more strong antibiotic, they actually didn‚Äôt have it for free. We had just spent our last to take him to the ER and were tight. My daughter mentioned Dave so I figured we could try it out and see if we could get the funds for my son‚Äôs medicine. I tried it, and we were sent some money immediately via my debit card. I was able to get my son‚Äôs medication. Thanks Dave!!! You are a lifesaver and I‚Äôm sure my son thinks so too.
title: Lifesaver

review: Earlier this week Dave went me a msg saying I could advance 75. When I tried to advance it there was an identity verification to do. I kept failing for some reason and it wouldn‚Äôt let me get the loan. I‚Äôve had this app for a few month and had been advancing money without any big issues. So I emailed Dave and the next day I went to the app to see if I could get an advance and the security verification was gone and I was able to get the money I needed. I love Dave. Always there in a pinch when I need him! If you don‚Äôt have this app already you gotta get it! It‚Äôs so easy and convenient and when you need cash in a flash Dave will come to the rescue. Thanks a lot Dave for all the help you have been these last few months.

review: When I first seen the ad I thought it was a scam. But I decided to try it any way I did $75 cash advance on Wednesday enough money until Friday for gas $20 and small grocery item from store. title: Great app, great opportunity for short cash advance without going to get a loan.

review: When I first started with the app I was very happy and satisfied with my experience.   But then things took a quick turn after they decided to do an update with their app.   I had borrowed and paid Dave back many times before the update.   After the update they made everyone reconnect their bank account and now mysteriously they claim they cannot connect to my bank account.   I mean I have used the advance option many times in the past and Dave has received plenty of money from my payback tips and now all of a sudden doesn‚Äôt work.   I have contacted customer service and received NO response.  They did not even address the issue or rely at all.   But all the meanwhile they continue to charge their monthly subscription fee and I cannot even use the service.    Majorly disappointed and would not recommend Dave.   There are other apps that are eager to help and customer service will not ignore you if you have an issue.
title: Knjones

review: Everyone should consider Dave. This is not a paid review. I really wish they had a savings option though. To throw change into and mybe save for vacations. But this app is so clutch. I‚Äôve multiple times needed to barrow money, because sometimes when I pay bills they are a little high and Dave always looks out. But beyond that, they have bank statements every mo th which helps with car rentals and work related things for me. They keep track of all transactions and the money u borrow hits your account with ong minutes most times. As long as u use the Dave banking option. I love this account. Only other thing is I wish more people accepted it as a bank card and not a debit but still fantastic.

We all need a little help sometimes and this app definitely makes it easy! Thank you Dave !
title: Get paid with Dave

title: Amazing so far!!!

review: At first my experience with this app was great. I signed up and the verified my bank rather quickly. The first time I borrowed from Dave I believe the most I was offered was $25 dollars. I paid that back on time. The second time I borrowed from Dave I was offered up to $100 dollars. I paid that back on time. After that things went downhill. The third time I went to borrow from Dave my limit went back down to $25 with no explanation, however I borrowed it anyway to see if it would go back up. After paying the $25 back on time I went again to see what my new limit would be and all I was offered was $5.00. Five dollars. I‚Äôm upset with this service because I also opened a Dave checking account and linked my other main bank account to Dave so they can see my bi-weekly paychecks. I have sent two emails and got no response, maybe I will get my answer here?
title: Need help

review: I‚Äôm not sure about Dave yet. I CAN say that he is relevant in this day and age. The idea is simple- he loans you a little bit of money based on your banking consistency, which is good for people living check to check and sometimes just unable to hit the budget mark every time. The bad is that sometimes it feels like it still doesn‚Äôt cover it. What would be cool is if somehow Dave could use the billing information that you provide and cover one when it is clear it won‚Äôt be paid. Say you have a bill due on Wednesday and can‚Äôt cover it and you have that bill auto deduct on Dave‚Äôs platform and Dave sees it and alerts me to that and offers to cover the vig and then gives me flexible, low cost payback plan. THAT Dave would be my main bank for life
title: Dave is relevant

review: It was the easiest loan ever actually I didn‚Äôt need the money my mom did and she‚Äôs had my back my whole life and never asked for anything, she took out a loan for my son and i offered to pay it back she‚Äôs paid on it for 3 months. It was awesome from the time I downloaded the app and got my money was ten minutes flat. My moms loan is paid and all is well. Thank you Dave you are awesome!!!!!!!!!

title: Dave

review: I got my advance a week ago, and this week it was due to be taken back out of my account. On payday it said it was unable to withdraw from my account without making my account go negative. My account had money in it, so I wasn‚Äôt sure why this was the case. I figured if I had an unexpected charge that I forgot, that it was nice they didn‚Äôt make me go negative. Well the next day a bill I forgot was to automatically withdraw cane out, and it left me about $4 negative, which is low enough to not get an overdraft fee. Then a few hours later all of a sudden Dave took the charge out and made me go negative and get charged a fee. So when I had enough money to pay it, it wouldn‚Äôt let me. If I had paid it and gotten another I would have been saved an overdraft fee, but now I‚Äôm stuck with a negative balance.

review: I found this app in an advertisement and thought  I‚Äôd try it out. I began the start up process and filling in my info. I get the the part where it asks for my bank info, so I enter that but I keep getting a message saying it‚Äôs a savings account. It‚Äôs my checking account. So I email support and get a email saying it was received and they would get back with me in 1 business day. I get an email a day later asking me to rate my chat with tech support when I never talked to anyone. So I email again and say I never spoke with anyone and am still waiting on a response back to my issue with my bank info. While waiting another 2 days, I stumble upon a similar app called Dave. review: I don‚Äôt have a father figure or even a mother figure in my life. I‚Äôve always been on my own learning and bettering myself as I go. I never really had money or the knowledge once I received income on how to save, budget, or just simply making a better decision. Save has been a mother, father, and mentor. Great tips, keeps me motivated , and helps me broaden my knowledge. Over the past couple of months with everything going on with Co-Vid Dave has been there. As the young people say ‚ÄúIn the clutch ‚Äú. I would love to invest in this company, be a spokesperson and face, because this company can be the movement that can make a difference in this world. Turn a lot of this negativity into positivity. Thanks Dave family for treating me like a son.
title: My mentor

review:
I love this app. It fetches your banking information and allows you to set up and manage a budget. It also provides salary advances. These are very helpful but you can only get them 11 days before payday. Can this be changed? Sometimes we need it sooner. It is also frustrating that a) you have to input your information again although nothing has changed or b) the app has lost connection to the bank. c) The app also thinks that your pay day has changed if you were paid on a different day due to a holiday, etc. All of these may affect your ability to get a salary advance for two months. Overall, I have used several financial apps and found this to work best for me. 
I would recommend Dave to others!
title: Excellent Financial Aid

review: I thought this was going to be a scam because they want your banking information. They literally go into your bank account and look around so-to-speak. That way they can verify your source of income as well as the frequency of that income. They have options for delivery of the loan they give that can cut down on what you owe them on payday. The tips are optional and I think they are necessary and well worth it for a service like this. For those times that you just need a few dollars before payday, this app is genius. I love it and I left a tip because where else can you get cash with such low or even optional fee. Thank you Dave. I don‚Äôt know who you are or how you got started but thank you.
title: Amazing Dave

review: I downloaded this app yesterday. I get paid in personal checks so I couldn‚Äôt take a large amount of money, but Dave did loan me just enough to get some staples regardless. I‚Äôve been on vacation, first I‚Äôve taken in a year and I overspent. I have a paycheck at work I‚Äôm waiting on but can‚Äôt get quite yet. I normally never let my account get so low. Dave helped me get by. I didn‚Äôt need help paying bills, or help with an overdraft. just in getting some food and stuff for the next day or so. The money was instant. Thanks Dave. Without you I would‚Äôve been cooking canned beans for food for two days. If you need money loaned and can pay it back seriously just get this app. I can‚Äôt believe how easy it was. Dave has got you!
title: Legit.

review: The app started of great. I had no issue with the amount being paid back or the $1 monthly fee. However when it was time for my account to be debited on my payday, it was removed correctly the first time. Then the next day, the same account was removed from my account again. I have contacted them by email twice and have gotten no response. Also in the app, it is still saying pending instead of paid and it has been two days since the first payment was debited from my account. I‚Äôm afraid they will try and take the amount again. This is the last time I will every use this app. I will be contacting my bank soon if I can‚Äôt this resolved.
title: Started off great...now it is garbage

review:
I am going through some financial issues lately and have been really upset about it. My parents planned is a vacation and I was anxious about going because I feel like I should be working instead. During my vacation I realized I had forgotten I had to pay my phone bill but I had no money left. I saw an ad for this app and did some research on it and tried it out. I was able to borrow money to help pay my phone bill. It helped to let me enjoy my vacation with little stress. Thank you so much! Definitely recommend this app to others who need a little
Help financially. Now, it‚Äôs time to get though this rut I‚Äôm going through and get my feet back on the ground financially!!
title: Financial Life saver

review: I love Dave, great for when you need some emergency funds, but I don‚Äôt appreciate them just randomly taking money out of my account when I don‚Äôt have enough to cover the funds. For example...If I owe a full $75 but only have $50 in my account, they‚Äôll take $40 like come on guys really? And then they‚Äôll keep randomly trying to take and take even when you don‚Äôt have enough. Like just wait until my check deposits and then do it or after one failed attempt just let the customer manually pay back the remaining balance. We already can‚Äôt get another advance until it‚Äôs paid back anyway, this is why I prefer the branch app a bit better cause they just don‚Äôt randomly snatch money out of your account.
title: Love the app but...

review: First off, at minimum it takes at least 8 hours to get the funds transferred, which you are not informed of until the transfer has already been scheduled. Also be aware there is a ‚Äútip‚Äù that is withdrawn when the borrowed money is returned. I borrowed $75 and it cost me $25 on top of what I borrowed; $4.99 for the same day transfer and then for some reason a tip of $10 was withdrawn twice. I‚Äôm sure I missed the fine print, but the tip is set to $10 as standard and I feel that info wasn‚Äôt presented as well as it could be. I understand the company has to make money, but no body likes hidden fees or details. Super easy to become caught up in the process and click ‚Äúokay‚Äù when someone is need of money, and I feel the app takes advantage of how desperate some borrowers are.  My two cents.

review: I like the budget part where you can see what is due and when. It was easy to connect and Dave could easily see my income and expenses. He loaned me $75 without interest. (I was worried about missing a bill and having late fees rack up daily so I looked into another pay day loan.. would have gotten $200 but had to pay back $751!!) it‚Äôs crazy. I really appreciate Dave!!

I‚Äôve contacted the company 3 times and it‚Äôs been 2 weeks and haven‚Äôt gotten any response. Like everybody else that uses this app it because I don‚Äôt really have money. I‚Äôm broke and thought this would be helpful but it‚Äôs causing more stress then relief. Extremely disappointed!!!!!!

review:

Even when the mortgage company refunded my account, the damage was done. I couldn‚Äôt crawl out from under bank fees. 

Dave will lend me money even if I have already accidentally overdrawn. Not all apps do this, and what‚Äôs the point of paying for a service you can‚Äôt use when you need it? A big five star review for the Dave app and a thank you. I‚Äôve not had any issues with the Dave App. I will continue to use Dave when I need it.
title: A money app you can trust.

review: It‚Äôs a great concept for an app and company. It theory it could be wonderful. But the lack of easy to access customer support and the constant bugs and error messages makes it virtually useless. I‚Äôve managed to get it to work months and months ago and it was wonderful and useful. But since then it‚Äôs been impossible to use. And it‚Äôs always a new error every time. It will go from not seeing my paychecks to not understanding my paydates or my bank acct. It also claimed I didn‚Äôt have money in my account that did. The system just doesn‚Äôt work and they still charge you. They also only seem to do customer service over an email I got from the comments section on their website. Not exactly promising. I‚Äôm thinking I‚Äôm ready to delete my account and just write off the charges from the past months despite never being able to use it.
title: Great concept

review: When I first saw the little ad on social media about Dave, I was skeptical but when I found myself in a bind for money, I decided to give them a try. I love the side hustle aspect of Dave as well because it helps you be able to find things to make money quickly without having to do a lot of research on your own. I highly recommend Dave to anybody that needs a little extra money.
title: By far the best cash advance app

review: This is such an awesome idea and app! I have had a few glitches. Several times I needed a loan . It wasn‚Äôt given because they couldn‚Äôt verify my direct deposit from social security and it was the same for months and months. Also denied once because the app said I got paid when I in fact haven‚Äôt been paid. I have been with Dave for 6 months and still haven‚Äôt been able to get any more then a 20$ loan and it‚Äôs been rough trying to get that. However with that being said if the glitches get fixed this app would be wonderful. Helping budget keeping track of expenses! Great. And when my loans came through it was when it was needed thank you!
title: Dave rocks

review: Hey DAVe actually seems like a legit way to have some support when or if you have no one . Kinda like that family members some people you know can call and bails them out of the trouble they are in even though they seem to get In that trouble monthly , your friend always has some family members there for them  . Well DAVID not only gave me decent advice , it only took him a few seconds  to look at my account and see what money I had coming in and what money I need regularly to survive and like magic he had told me where  to adjust my spending and covered the 75 til payday I would need to stay in the black , thanks Dave ..highly recommend
title: I was going to be 75 dollars overdrawn , not now!

review: It would have been given five stars but for the following issues; only one bank account and card can be linked to app which cuts out additional income many customers have due to the fact some, like myself, get other job income split between two accounts or just have one check go to another account. This issue means that the advances could be higher or more frequently, please fix!! It's not an accurate and complete picture of many customers incomes at all!! Secondly; the wait period between is not bad but there's no need for these restrictions if a customer is on time for payment and has met the other requirements. Maybe the wait period should be for those who pay late more than once or twice? Other than that easy to use .
title: More than expected......

review:
For those who work paycheck to paycheck, this is it. Life is as real as it gets and when you need extra, and when you NEED to get by, having someone like Dave can really help. Having someone track what you have available along with upcoming costs will help you manage funds and keep you from overdraft fees, which are as serious as being broke. Borrow what you need and wait 3 days to get it or if you really need it ASAP, Dave will ask for 4.99 for immediate transfer. Dave lets me know the reality of my expenses and I know what‚Äôs coming up and I know when I will need extra. Dave has been great! 

The only other thing I could ask is, if Dave is able to advance more as it expands.
title: Dependable

review: At first I didn‚Äôt believe it, but it‚Äôs no bull$hit!! It‚Äôs easy to sign up, download the app & link it to your bank account.  If you‚Äôre ok w/giving access to viewing your online banking info w/username & password then you should be ok.  The app is super easy, user friendly, & not to mention it‚Äôs great for the environment by automatically giving you the option to plant trees for a very small fee.  When it‚Äôs time to get money from the app it takes all of sixty seconds from start to finish!! Wish it had a higher advance amount, I‚Äôm sure it comes in handy for those making ends meets who live on a tight budget from week to week.  üôÇ

review: I love Dave I can get 75 dollars instantly. But instantly requires additional $5.00 paid back upon returning the $75 in five -seven days. So you loose money more than borrow Money. That have standard option that does not take addition $5.00 when it comes times to repay. But I only get the money when I need it.   Not when I think I possibly may need $75 dollar in three (BUSSINESS)days I like the app ‚ÄúEarning‚Äù better because each time you request money you get to increase  the amount you want to borrow. However, remember if you don‚Äôt have  the money(hence why you are borrowing the money) you will owe back what you don‚Äôt have. Sometime making your account negative because earning will take back what you borrowed.  So requesting a less amount like the options Dave has works out better because  there is a limit to how much you can borrow. But I keep using Dave twice every month.

review: I can not believe this app actually loaned me cash I needed on the spot. I gave 5stars for now because it actually works. I will update my review IF ONLY I find any issues when it comes to auto drafting my bank account for the repayment. I know a few people have stated that I may get hacked as soon as my pay check goes into my account, but I am very optimistic and pray everything goes according to what the app has stated and no more money is taken than what is expected. So far I‚Äôm absolutely amazed. Thank you Dave!
title: Amazing For Now

review:
I needed some quick cash two days before payday. I saw Dave‚Äôs commercial on TV! So I contacted them online;  filled out my personal information and verified my email. I had the money in my account within an hour (though they tell you it could take up to eight hours).

Dave does exactly what he says he does. In my case, I needed $75. Add tax, convenience fee, and tip, and I ended up having to pay back about $90. Dave took it right out of my account on payday. What is the tip for you ask? Not what you think - Dave takes that money and pays it forward by making donations. 

It really seems too good to be true - but this is a legit business Dave has going. I give it five out of five ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
title: Legit

Everything was fine at first up until a few days ago, a weird bug occurred that basically just had my pay dates totally wrong and for no reason at all, like the dates it had as my pay dates, I haven‚Äôt even been paid on in literally months . So essentially I can‚Äôt borrow money or I‚Äôd have to pay it back on a day i don‚Äôt even get paid basically meaning I‚Äôll either get over drafted or get banned from the app for not paying back. Which is bull. I emailed them, even sent them screenshots for proof and it says they will get back to you within 24 and it‚Äôs been 72 hours and counting. Still nothing . I even had to go to the better business bureau just to attempt to get a response or anything from them. So the app itself isn‚Äôt bad . But the customer service and help center is a complete joke .

Due to that I rarely use Dave app as much and only gave 2 stars for this app. I switched to Earrin app and have received the customer service that a loyal paying customer should receive. Funny how Earnin can loan me $100s of dollars a day if I wanted (and gets payment on my payday without skipping a beat) but lil fuzzy Dave here thinks I should stay at $20. Overall Dave is good to use in a pinch, but if you‚Äôre looking for a loyal customer service and the respect that a hard-working individual should deserve when asking for a small loan switch to Earnin.

The free transfer (3-4 business days)  I‚Äôve never had to wait more than 24 hours. I choose to tip each time which helps plant trees. Why not! Definitely the most useful app I‚Äôve ever had.
title: Life Saver

review:
I‚Äôm 21, live on my own, and currently in an unaccredited Cosmetology school. I‚Äôm paying off student loans from college at the same time. I work my factory job 2 days a week and I‚Äôm paid every two weeks. My student loans monthly are 100$ my phone bills 80$ and my appointment is 450$ a month.

I don‚Äôt know how I would survive without apps like this.
title: Going well

Firstly they already charge a monthly fee of 1 for using the app and they charge 4.99 to receive the borrowed money instantly for express. I sent multiple emails to the company which was told I would get a response within 24 hours and I still have NOT received anything. I want my money back for the express deposit I DID NOT RECEIVE. review: This app charges you $1 a month and $5 in service fees per advancement. Which would be fine, except that you can‚Äôt borrow money when you need it. I ran into a unfortunate situation of having to use my whole paycheck to pay my rent because of some car trouble. Because I had to wait for my paycheck to pay my rent I accrued a $75 late fee. I was panicking, but then I remembered I had the Dave app. I went into the app (that I pay a monthly fee for) and tried to get the $75 advancement that they promise and was denied. Mind you, I have borrowed $75 from this app before with no problems. The alert stated that you can‚Äôt borrow money within 11 days of your pay day. !!!!!!!! What?!?! I needed this money on this day but wasn‚Äôt allowed it, even though I pay monthly. Download the Earnin it‚Äôs a MUCH better app, with no monthly charge and the ability to borrow what you need when you need it.
title: Scam!

review: What? WHERE HAS THIS APP BEEN ALL MY LIFE??!! Okay I literally made a payment thru my paypal for something and I‚Äôm a few dolors short in my checking account(so when the PayPal payment goes thru it‚Äôs going to overdraw my checking account) anyway so that‚Äôs not fun at all, my bank has a $32 overdraft fee which is so not fun either. Anyway, Dave just gave me $25 to my checking account and now I know I‚Äôm going to be safe when my paypal payment goes thru. Plus, Dave will just take the money back when I get paid. title: AMAZING LIKE WHAT

review: Kept seeing ads for the Dave app and thought why not give it a try, I‚Äôve been a little financially tight recently after moving. This app really works in under 5 minutes I was able to verify my identity link my bank account. All it asked was to choose my reoccurring bills to offer budgeting advice, no credit check and no interest. They profit from ‚Äútips‚Äù which are not obligated and YOU get to choose the percentage to tip them for lending you money. You do have to have direct deposits, so they know they will get reimbursed for their loans. I borrowed some money and within seconds the amount was available in my account! A great application for when you‚Äôre in a pinch.
title: Legit App 1$ a month!

review: It helps you track how much you‚Äôre wasting, and how much you might waste that pay period. If you qualify they give you an advance up to $75 and you have to pay it back by your next pay check which is a nice option if you‚Äôre short on cash that week. The only thing they don‚Äôt tell you until after is that you pay a $4.95 fee for them to send your money express if not the other option is 3 business days which doesn‚Äôt help if you need the money that same day. Then after you confirm and sign that you agree to payback on your next payday which for me would be in one week on Friday, So as of now seems like a legit company and if you need some extra cash to get through the week this app can help!

review: I get paid Bi-Weekly and sometimes towards the second week within 5 days until my next pay I tend to run out of money. I came across Dave on Snapchat and at first I was a little hesitant on using this app thats claiming that you can borrow up to $75 and when pay day comes around it automatically withdraws out of your account. So, I tried it out and when I tell you that I was thrilled that this app is really legit and a life saver. It‚Äôs going on 2 months since I have started using Dave and so far no problems for me! I would totally recommend.
title: I totally recommend!

review: So far this was awesome! It came in perfectly handy exactly when I needed it. Thank you guys all at Dave. Thank you so much!I will be receiving my actual direct deposit tomorrow and I will be able to see all transactions that have occurred and if everything is as it should be this would have been one of the best things that could‚Äôve ever happened to me at this point in time, especially with the coronavirus and being in the healthcare field. I hope you guys know how much you‚Äôre actually helping people get by day-to-day especially when we are as healthcare workers putting our lives on the lines for others. Thank you thank you thank you!!!!
title: So far....

review: I‚Äôm not really the type of person to write reviews but if something is really good I‚Äôll take the time to write one but if something is really bad I figure I‚Äôd get the word out about it. With that being said this app does not directly deliver the message it‚Äôs sending. I downloaded the app and setup my account only to find out that my checking account was only gonna be monitored by this app and would let me know when my balance would be low. However I never got an immediate approval or disapproval for the loan only to find out I wasn‚Äôt approved for some unknown reason according to the customer support. So I deleted my account and had to find a plan B for the money i needed at the time that I thought I was gonna be loaned. Just a waste of time if you need money right away. I‚Äôm all about business in a timely manner not about beating around the bush and being a gimmick. Don‚Äôt believe me just try it out if you have time.

review: The concept is great, cash advance for free who wouldn‚Äôt like that. BUT the app itself it stupid. Constantly trying to ‚Äúpredict‚Äù expenses that you purchased ONE time and tell u if you will actually overdraw. That‚Äôs a horrible assumption. Something very annoying and SHADY about the app is that they never advertise that it actually costs $1/monthly. It‚Äôs listed in their FAQ which let‚Äôs be honest no one reads before using the app. Business tip:if you‚Äôre going to charge people, please do your best to inform them. Seems complicated, I know. Imagine if Netflix seemed free but surprised you with an $8 monthly charge and at no point ever made you confirm this to make sure you knew. Also, reading all the responses to reviews for Dave...the customer service seems defensive and childish. Take responsibility and just do better. No one needs your justifications it reflects poorly on your management.

review: Had this app since they first started out. I love that it keeps track of my account and spending. The cash advance is one of my favorite features because of hardships this world and our country had to endure and still are during pandemic it‚Äôs helped me keep food on the table and keep me a float until I found a better stable job. Heathers are plenty of apps and businesses who offer the same and claim better, but this one was created by a real successful business man who cares about the people and has been and still fighting to make sure everyone is financially stable and taken care of. Thank you Dave app and especially thank you Mark Cuban
title: Keeps getting better!

review:
Right in the nick of time. May not be much, which means you don‚Äôt have to pay back much. My wife has been in the Hospital. They removed a superficial tumor from her brain. She also has lung cancer with a mass in her lung and a few masses in her abdomen area. So you can imagine I‚Äôve had some unexpected expenses. So Thanx For helping me out.
Review number two:
Thank you again for your help. My wife is now doing chemo for the tumor in her lung. Dave helps out a lot. And on top of that, it may be a small amount, Dave just don‚Äôt want to make your financial situation worse. Thank you Super Dave
Review number three:
Thanks for helping me not get an overdraft fee. By the way, my wife‚Äôs cancer has been deemed ‚ÄúInactive‚Äù God is Good!

review: So far on my first time using it. With money being tight and I was able to get $50 right away 3.99 fee(for I stand deposit free to get it in 3-5 days)   but so worth it when your just needing a few bucks to get by untell pay day.. By the looks of it depending on your income you can get more. I could have gotten more but didn‚Äôt just did what I needed for the next 3 days. So far I‚Äôm liking it . $1 monthly fee for the service but if you refer people you can get it free. Used it a couple times now in between pay checks and it‚Äôs been great!! I love there are apps like this to offer a small amount to help out. Thank you Dave! This is great for people just needed a little extra
title: Dave

review:
Great app. As long as you have a bank account with direct deposit, you can cash up to $75 11 days before your direct deposit hits and you‚Äôll be approved. 
You can choose the express route for $4.99 to receive the money in a few hours, or free to wait a few days. Now I‚Äôve tried both ways and the only issue I have with this app is that when I chose to get it in a few days, to avoid paying the $5 fee, I still received the cash in a few hours and was still charged the $5 fee. Which is added to the $75 you asked for, so 11 days later they take out $80. Now when you have no cash to last you till next paycheck, $5 is nothing! Thanks again. But please fix that glitch.
title: Great but with one issue!

review: We‚Äôve been having a hard time trying to catch up after some time off work for a new baby some unexpected things hit my account this week and we had no idea what we were going to do. I don‚Äôt do cash advances but had remembered seeing an ad for this app. I checked out and read lots and lots of reviews. I was still skeptical but we really didn‚Äôt have any other option, I signed up, requested the cash and it was in my account within minutes. I‚Äôm keeping the app also for budgeting purposes but I am definitely impressed. The money will come out of my next pay check, interest free. This app saved me this week, it‚Äôs definitely worth it!
title: Wonderful

review:
Listen y‚Äôall..I don‚Äôt like trying new things that involve me having to use my personal info due to the fact that EVERY bank account I‚Äôve ever had has had terrible fraud happen b/c I fell for something advertising an app like this. So I was VERY iffy about this one, but I was desperately in need of money for my household and even a little bit counted as better than nothing. 

I tried the app out and was able to be loaned the $75 as promised and I was so scared that they would scam me, but THEY DIDNT! I‚Äôve been using this app for about a month now and it really helps. I don‚Äôt do these reviews, but honestly i would have tried this sooner if I had more open and real reviews. Dave is perfect for an extra couple dollar to handle a bill or personal expenses. 

If you are anything like me when it comes to financial issues, I think you should have this app. Dave helps monitor your account as well to keep you away from having a bad standing account, which I thought was bs at first, but it‚Äôs perfect üëåüèΩ.  

This app has gotten me through ALOT ! TRY IT OUT!! You will not regret it. I promise ü§ûüèΩ

And because one bank gives access to money a day in advance, I get messages from Dave saying ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt have that pay schedule‚Äù. Tedious. review: I saw this as an option in October. I set it up and thought it would all be good to go. Unfortunately it takes about a month for Dave to review your regular deposits, so if you need it now you‚Äôll have to wait. The app is quick but a bit counterintuitive, they need a summary or status because it kind of leaves you hanging (when you first set up.) After a month and after Dave reviews your accounts the experience is much better! It also gives you suggestions and spots your recurring charges. I used it yesterday and the money said deposit by 12 a.m. but then I got a notice from bank saying deposit received within 15 mins.
title: Overall great

review: I‚Äôm super happy to have seen the advertisement for Dave it does actually allow you to advance cash but it may not be instant, up to 8 hours, can cost up to $5 for an advance (not bad) or free if you wait 3 days ( but wouldn‚Äôt be on here if I could wait) and unlike it original commercials you can‚Äôt take out $100 unless you apply for their card and have an account a few months old. So besides the little details and the fact that you pay a whopping $1 month to use the service Dave‚Äôs great. I‚Äôm not to keen on the system having so much access to my bank account especially when the budget is wrong (after they‚Äôve calculated their repay) All an All I like Dave and definitely would recommend
title: How I See it ü§î

review:
When I first started using Dave it was fine well with that well when I decided to switch banks it no longer gave me the $75 advance only $20, but now it won‚Äôt give me an advance at all it says my account is ‚Äúnot atleast 60 days old‚Äù which is a little ridiculous considering it worked fine before!
Also I‚Äôve been on the ‚Äúwaitlist‚Äù to get a bank account with them for a year, which come to find out they‚Äôve already come out with it and have been letting people open accounts for years but they tell me it‚Äôs not out yet so I‚Äôm on the waitlist... just seems a little dishonest to me.
title: Used them for a year, after I switched banks it all went bad

review:
I‚Äôm leaving my whole review here, but none of their issues were Dave‚Äôs fault. The app is great, they‚Äôre great, download it. 

So I used to have a five star review on here, and I‚Äôm changing it to one because I‚Äôm annoyed by their support staff. (TURNS OUT THIS WAS NOT THEIR FAULT IN THE END)

My bank isn‚Äôt updating, it hasn‚Äôt in two weeks. I don‚Äôt even think it‚Äôs a Dave problem, it‚Äôs a Plaid problem, but their response was for me to keep trying to log on or check Plaid‚Äôs status. I checked Plaid‚Äôs website, I don‚Äôt even see a way for me to check if there‚Äôs an issue with my bank.

The app is now useless to me, so I cancelled my membership. I‚Äôd come back if they could help me fix the problem but ‚Äòkeep trying‚Äô isn‚Äôt the solution.

UPDATE: Turns out it wasn‚Äôt a Dave problem, it was a bank problem. After working with one of Dave‚Äôs tech people, we decided it was on my bank‚Äôs end and I should call them. Apparently Santander decided to no longer allow Dave to work with my account and won‚Äôt even let me use it. So basically I changed banks so I can go back to using Dave.
title: Five Stars to One, Back to Five

review:
Really enjoying all the features so far!!
The app is Perfect to help you budget and follow your spending habits. I love the advance feature because my credit score makes me unable to get a payday loan or advance from any place locally but Dave will always do it!! It automatically collects payment from your linked account based on your direct deposit information that‚Äôs tracked on your bank account. Really convenient!!! I‚Äôm still waiting on the savings/checking account feature to finally be available!!
I love how the advance can have a top be added and it‚Äôs to help a good cause like planting trees!!! Really user friendly as well
title: One of the most helpful apps available!

review: The Dave app is AMAZING! When you need just a little extra cash right before payday, Dave spots it to you. The fee (‚Äúdonation‚Äù) is very affordable with 3 options to choose from. Unlike, traditional ‚Äúpayday loans‚Äù Dave doesn‚Äôt allow you to borrow a large amount only to realize it‚Äôs harder to pay back than you had imagined. The only dislike I have about Dave is that once your payment is returned to Dave, you then have to wait one to two days to reaccess funds. Whereas, payday loans will allow you to immediately borrow after repayment! However, using Dave is more convenient due to being able to click a few buttons in the comfort of your own home‚ò∫Ô∏è an overall win for me.
title: Amazing App

review: I absolutely love Dave. I needed money right THEN and I had my money within 5-10 mins of downloading the app. I was told about Dave from a friend of mine. Dave was there when I needed it, on the spot. No waiting. Only thing about Dave is that once you pay back the advance, you can not advance again right away like you can with Earnin or MoneyLion. BUT, Dave has gotten better with the waiting time. You use to have to wait at least 3 or 4 days. Now you can advance at 4am the next day. So I will give them props for that! I absolutely love Dave and the fact that they now have ‚Äúbanking for humans‚Äù.  And you can deposit your payroll checks and receive them up to 2 days early.
title: Great app!

review: This app was helpful and convenient at first. But after 6 months, the app continued to read my bank balance incorrectly. It would tell me my bank balance was negative even when my paycheck had got the bank. When I would write to customer service, I never get a response or fix for the problem. Eventually I updated the app, deleted it and reinstalled and for the last 3 months I haven‚Äôt been able to connect to my bank at all. Because my bank isn‚Äôt connected I can‚Äôt even see any way to contact customer service to fix the problem until I am able to reconnect my bank account. However, they‚Äôre still somehow able to take their monthly fee for membership or whatever ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I don‚Äôt understand how I can‚Äôt connect my bank but they can still withdraw a fee from my account. And for the record it‚Äôs not my bank, it‚Äôs the app!!! What was once a blessing has become a curse.
title: Failing

review: I love it it‚Äôs amazing. I recommend the Dave app to anyone that ever needed an advance from their next check especially if you get paid every 2 weeks, bi-monthly it helps a lot when you're short on cash. You pay back whatever amount you take out the most is $75 you can take off which that is a good amount. I just got this app month and a half ago and I used it twice already, once my check came in I paid what I owed. But use the app for yourself sometimes other ppl reviews won‚Äôt help you decide on what to do. It helped me and I love it I‚Äôm still getting to know the app it‚Äôs not rocket science but I like too fully understanding things especially when it comes to money. It‚Äôs helped me I hope it can help you too. Very resourceful.

review: I‚Äôve been using the Dave app for some time now, and I‚Äôm amazed by their eagerness to assist users. The pandemic brought forth a lot of unexpected hardship, but I‚Äôve been able to depend on the Dave app for solutions. They provide you with financial assistance, even when you‚Äôre not borrowing money. I really like their tips for earning extra cash. I also like that they calculate your bills into your balance so that you‚Äôll stay within a certain budget. The most you can borrow is $100 ($75 without a Dave checking account), but it‚Äôs very useful nonetheless. I really foresee better financial choices with the help of the Dave app. I‚Äôm eager to find out how far this company will take me.
title: No Strings Attached

review: I‚Äôve only had to use the advance option once. My mom was diagnosed with cancer and I spent more on gas and her medications than I had budgeted. Dave saved me from an overdraft and effectively prevented me from getting $175 in overdraft fees. That makes such a huge difference in my budget. Other than that, I like the feature where Dave gives you your projected balance until payday with consideration for all of your bills. I would recommend this to anyone who just needs a little boost until payday. There‚Äôs no membership fee, you tip what you can afford/feel is appropriate. I think you should tip generously though, given that Dave is helping you so much.
title: Saved me from overdraft

review: I have borrowed money from the Dave App countless times before, no problem. Always had set it my payback date up to be on the 31st each month. Now all of a sudden when I borrowed money again it decided to automatically change the date to a week before my payday. I didn‚Äôt notice this because I used the app so frequently and it never did that before so I just signed off on agreement. I‚Äôm beyond livid, and support is taking over 3 hours to respond, if Dave app is going to be running it needs to have agents that can faster respond. Especially during the pandemic, I only have limited money. Now I don‚Äôt know how I‚Äôm going to pay for groceries for this week. Thanks, Dave.

 SECONDLY, I can‚Äôt afford to wait 3 business days either which is fee free. Most people are need of extra money sooner. That‚Äôs why we download the app ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

review: I have used this app a few times and every time it has been a fast and easy process. We all have those weeks where our paycheck doesn‚Äôt last as long as we need it to. Dave makes it easy to get a cash advance. The same day payments make it easy to avoid costly overdraft fees. There is a $5 express fee to transfer the money but I don‚Äôt mind because it is $30 cheaper than overdraft fees with my bank. They also have a feature that lets you monitor your bank balance and Dave will notify you when you have a projected overdraft so you can get an advance. It does not work all the time with my bank but it can be extremely useful as well.

title: My account

review: In November 2019 I applied to get this online banking app for the $100 advance . Unfortunately I did not qualify. Time has passed since then but I need to get my concern out there for everyone. I have the Experian app with the added benefits for security alerts on my information being used on the dark web. To my surprise recently I come to find out this company has violated the privacy of their clients sensitive information. Either they sell our information online or an employee of their institution violated the GLB act and didn‚Äôt keep my information safe. My SSN has been leaked to the dark web because of this application and now I have to go through the trouble of sorting everything out myself because my SSN has been caught associated with multiple addresses. Everyone please be cautious about this application and company in general. They clearly have no safe measure parameters.
title: Security Alert
developerResponse: {'id': 21714875, 'body': "Hey there! Dave didn't do this, a previous third-party vendor breached the data. Please see our blog post regarding this breach: https://www.dave.com/blog/post/\nAny further questions, please reach out to davecares@dave.com\n", 'modified': '2021-03-17T18:39:02Z'}

review: I have used this app for almost 2 years and I loved it. Then a couple weeks ago I went to get an advance and it told me that since my bank card expires in TWO monthes that I couldn‚Äôt use it unless I put in a different card. I only have one bank card and my bank will not issue a new card until the month of expiration. So basically I can‚Äôt use the app again until April. It‚Äôs kind of inconvenient that they go two monthes out on expiration when most banks do the same as mine and issue a new one the month the current one expires. I loved this app it helped me when I was in a tight spot but unfortunately due to this incident I was not able to get my medications on time and as a result I deleted the app. Hopefully if this could get fixed I will download the app because it‚Äôs great aside from the one hiccup
title: Expiring card
developerResponse: {'id': 21219759, 'body': 'Hey there!\nThanks for your honest feedback. \nPlease email us directly at davecares@dave.com and we can assist further. ', 'modified': '2021-02-22T17:57:39Z'}

review: The money was credited to my account within a few moments. It does say there is no interest, however in for choose the instant method instead of the 3 day method, you pay a percentage. Also, make sure you review the info carefully before you submit your request. It automatically tact‚Äôs on a tip. I tipped 15% of my $75. It is optional, but the default setting has you selecting 15%, with you having to go in and change it manually. So my $75 dollar repayment ended up with a 4% express fee, and a 15% tip to help keep the app running. It‚Äôs not a deal breaker, it was still very useful, but I know now to be a little more careful and less eager to click ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù
title: Helpful

review:
I‚Äôve been using Dave for about a yearAnd a half nowAnd I will say that it is my least favorite of all the cash advance apps I have tried out. (Earnin‚Äô and Albert being far better than Dave). The area that needs to be improved is for people who get paid on odd days (as opposed to every week, etc).
Since TECHNICALLY I get paid on the 1st and the 15th of every month, this leaves my paydays and paycheck amount open for variance (in other words, if the 15th falls on a Saturday Sunday or Monday, we get paid the Friday before.) Dave is constantly asking if I got a new job or if my payday changed.... and then will only allow me a $20 advance. It‚Äôs really annoying and frustrating‚Ä¶ Especially when they can look back on my paycheck history for over a year and a half.
title: Room for improvement!!
