review:
This is the best app ever. I‚Äôve been using Dave for about 4 months now and it has not disappointed me. This app is always there when I‚Äôm in need of a little cash to hold me over to my next pay day. And the fact they they only take back exactly what they gave you is even better. No extra fees!!! Thanks Dave!

Update: Well the app was great until today! I had money taken out of my account a whole week before my payday leaving me with a negative balance. The app shows the date of my next payday and yet money was still taken from me. All I know is someone better either put my money back or make sure none is taken from me next week üò°
title: LOVE‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

review: Truly admire this gem! I no longer have to ask anyone for financial help because Dave has my back. ‚ù§Ô∏è I know we all go through hard times, so I know I‚Äôm not alone on this. I don‚Äôt mind the fees, & I‚Äôm always happy to donate when I‚Äôm able to. Truly a feel good app that even helps you under stand financial help/tips while also helping you budget your daily expenses. The only thing I wish it had was more in detail expense diagrams. I think a pie chart/circle chat can be more visually pleasing & really open your eyes to the reality of how big your expenses are & where you need to work on. :) but overall extremely grateful I‚Äôm able to use Dave!
title: Dave has your back!

review:
Has some hiccups initially but I think I started to understand it‚Äôs algorithm and was able to figure it out. I probably used that word out of context but all in all, I like this app, it‚Äôs like having a friend who will spot you when needed.

Previous review: I got spotted $50 but then Dave wanted the money back in 2 days. Why not on my Payday? I was a day late in paying him back which I didn‚Äôt like as I don‚Äôt like being late on anything but it would have been more convenient to take that money when for  direct deposit went through. The point of getting sorted was to carry me over until payday.
title: Dave is great for spotting you cash when you need it but...
developerResponse: {'id': 11960254, 'body': "Hi friend! It is indeed supposed to be until payday. If the app isn't synced with your pay schedule properly, let us know at davecares@dave.com (please include your full name, email, phone number and the subject of this review), and we'll get it fixed!", 'modified': '2019-11-20T19:02:51Z'}

review: To begin with, I myself was a skeptic. However, I have been using Dave for about 4 months now and have consistently been requesting compensation from $20-$75 weekly. In having done so, I can attest to Dave‚Äôs efficient and mindful services. The money is deposited to my bank account (BofA) within 5-20 min and is withdrawn typically between 8:00am - 12:00pm, 7 days later. The fee varies depending on how much you request, though is a mere $5.99 for the express fee payout (which is most ideal). I have read other reviews that insist that Dave will try to withdraw the full amount from your account unexpectedly, though I myself have never encountered that issue. Thank you!!!
title: Convenient, Predictable, Assured

review: Wouldn‚Äôt recommend anyone over use this. Just use for when your in major tight spots or your gonna get paid in less than 5 days. Great flowing app with easy to understand explanations and requests. It‚Äôs lacking in the whole fees before borrowing though. If they could just place the disclaimer before a person borrows then you‚Äôd think more on it. But when your in a bind your thing okay they‚Äôll send me this money and your all on board but then your like oh I have to tip after you‚Äôve confirmed everything and the money is on its marry way. I understand why they do it but man if they would just be blunt at the beginning it would weed out the people who could suffer in the long run.
title: Great when your in a bind

review: I borrowed money last night for today and I spent 14$ at the convenience store . Next thing I know the money I borrowed for today Dave took back at like 5 this morning so I basically paid 3.99 to borrow 15$ and for just a few hours. I don‚Äôt see how this helps anyone and my next paycheck wasn‚Äôt until the 19th so that isn‚Äôt accurate. Also there‚Äôs no easy way to communicate .. You have to email cause there‚Äôs no phone. I wouldn‚Äôt say this app is a scam but I‚Äôd definitely say who borrows money until your next paycheck and has to pay it back just less than 12 hours later?. Not really happy with the way this app does its lending process and I‚Äôll probably not use it again. I‚Äôd recommend Brigit. She is accurate on pay dates and you can borrow money like normal , pay it back on your next paycheck just like it says.
title: Not really impressed
developerResponse: {'id': 9601225, 'body': "Hey, thank you for letting us know you've encountered this problem! We'll check in with customer support and make sure they get back to you.", 'modified': '2019-07-11T00:34:58Z'}

review: At least once or twice a month I use this app not because I absolutely have to buy just Incase I have an unexpected payment coming up and I want to make sure I don‚Äôt over draft. Typically the money goes into my account immediately, and I have a few weeks to pay it back. There was one instance where I was unable to pay the loan back on the date and unlike other loaners I was not hassled for it constantly. Instead, when Dave was that I had enough money in my account to not cause an over draft, it quietly took the money I owed. Without a late fee and without a head ache. I can‚Äôt tell you how much I appreciate this app and it‚Äôs founders. It‚Äôs amazing
title: Best app ever

review: If I could give Dave a hug I would but since I can‚Äôt I‚Äôll give 5 stars. The setup is simple and easy. You provide your bank info and answer a few question. The app is user friendly. The loan amounts are small but handy especially if you‚Äôre in a pinch. You have the option for free to express deposit into your account. With express I usually get the money in minutes. I haven‚Äôt had any hassle with getting or paying for funds (even when my first payback was late). What I like most about Dave is the tip feature which is used to help out the environment by planting trees. So thanks for a great app and service Dave... I hope to pay it forward one day.
title: A helping hand

review: I will say I did get off to a rough start with Dave trying to connect my bank account, but customer service was so great and got me going in 2 days! I‚Äôve used a similar app with less success than Dave and I gotta say the switch was definitely worth it. It‚Äôs great because it also helps keep you on budget, you add your monthly expenses and he tells you what the lowest balance will be til next payday. The advancement options are great too and you have the option 3 day delivery or express for a few dollars more. I don‚Äôt even mind the 5% tip as it really does go towards planting trees. Overall it‚Äôs a wonderful app I wish I would have used sooner.
title: Absolutely worth the $1 per month!
developerResponse: {'id': 5567035, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! So glad you're loving the app. And thanks for tipping--it's optional but always makes us smile!", 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:51:51Z'}

review:
Dave spotted me $75 instantly. We're in hard times, and I don't get paid for a few more days and was down to an accumulative $30. They did charge $4.99 for an instant transfer, but that's cool. I'll happily pay back $80 for $75. I have a one year old and don't want to ask family or friends for a loan right now when I know almost everyone is in a similar position due to the pandemic. Thanks Dave, I appreciate the loan. I will definitely do business with you again! 

BTW - Yes, I'm a real person and this is a real review. I don't work for nor am I affiliated with Dave other than the loan they just gave me. I was skeptical and a bit sketched out but it's real.
title: Thanks, Dave!

review: Dave is great to have when you have a unexpected expense or need money fast. The only issue I have is that they don‚Äôt allow you to agree to a payback date. I say this because I usually get paid on a specific date each month, it can sometimes vary due to holidays or weekends. But usually it is the same day each month. Dave however will use the last date of the previous month that you are paid. This on many occasions will not be the same day that I will be getting my next months paycheck. If Dave would be better at allowing you to put your correct paycheck date down it would be a great app to use anytime you need it.
title: Great to have when you are really low on cash.

review: I make more than enough money to pay my bills but for some reason always come up short of overdraft throughout the month. dave puts mandatory expenses in perspective and takes the hard thinking out of it, as well as the guilt of spending. once I was able to see how much I was spending on extras framed in an encouraging manner (instead of the despair of looking at my bank accounts) I was able to think through those decision making processes to make better choices. I like the advance feature - it‚Äôs extra padding, but not so much that it‚Äôs impossible to pay back or predatory lending. smart app that makes me smarter.
title: millennial money management!

review: I‚Äôve used this several times towards the end of my pay periods when I needed a little something to get me thru the last two days leading up til getting paid. It‚Äôs been extremely useful. I usually do the instant transfer which only costs 5$ and you get it literally in seconds. When I had issues with my app glitching I wrote in and received really fast assistance and they emailed me maybe an hour or two later telling me they had fixed it for me already. Cannot recommend this enough. The tip (which is optional if you‚Äôre worried about the extra money) even goes to planting more trees and who doesn‚Äôt love a good tree am I right?
title: Dave is the best!

review: Not very happy with the app been trying to get on it is horrible I changed banks and been trying to update information and it keeps resetting my bank information then it locked me out of my bank I had to call and reset my bank information through the bank I message Dave and no response two day still waiting I deleted the app and then added it again and still same problem but when I paid the money back it seen my bank very clear and took the money out quick with no problem terrible service I am worried they have all my information and can lock me out of my account that is scary

I live paycheck to paycheck if I‚Äôm that lucky. This has helped me get gas, food, pay for bills that auto deduct before payday. $4.99 for an immediate deposit (it says 8 hours but it‚Äôs never taken more than 5 minutes) or no extra cost if you can wait a few days. They ask you to tip but it‚Äôs not required. I absolutely recommend it if you need to borrow some money and want to save yourself the embarrassment of asking someone you know or doing a payday loan.
title: Better than I ever thought

review: But, I still took a major leap of faith. After doing some research, I found that this app is no joke!! This app is the real deal! No strings attached, either. Dave has truly saved me. I just needed a few bucks to keep me from getting down to my last $6 after bills, after having some unexpected emergencies come up that my small check couldn‚Äôt quite leave me enough to cover. Hating having to deal with other money lenders who insist on the minimum being $100, plus interest, Dave is perfect! Small amount that I needed, NO interest, and it was in my bank account in a FLASH! Set up is SUPER easy, too. I love this app!! Thank you, Dave!!
title: I thought it was too good to be true...

review: This app is very useful! I had unexpected bills come up. I was able to to pay the bills by Borrowing money and then pay the app back when my paycheck came a couple days later. Highly suggest this app if you‚Äôre in need of cash really fast and are able to pay it back within two weeks. The app doesn‚Äôt offer a lot of money. I got  about 75 which is what I needed to pay one of my hospital bills so don‚Äôt expect a huge amount of cash but a little bit still helps. I‚Äôm not sure but it may differ for others on the amount that it gives you but overall had a great experience. Have a recommend this app if you‚Äôre in a quick patch!
title: Dave
developerResponse: {'id': 5567053, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to write a review! Hopefully you're feeling better soon. We're here to help whenever you need it!", 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:56:45Z'}

review: Occasionally I get those oops bills that you did not properly schedule or budget for leaving me quite tight as I await payday. Such is the case today with a whopping $3 in my account and a paycheck coming in two days. Dave got me $75 to hold me over and the money was deposited instantly even though they say express will take up to 8 hours. So far so good, I am excited to see how this helps my budgeting as you can enter expenses and their frequencies so that Dave can remind you when you may get low on cash any given pay period and cut expenses accordingly. Brilliant app, happy it is legitimate as I was a bit hesitant to give out such important information.
title: Lifesaver for the working class.

review:
I saw this and thought yeah right. Someone lending money not based on credit? Ok. But it‚Äôs true. My credit isn‚Äôt the best I‚Äôm working on rebuilding it and I needed a little help to get my rent paid on time. I downloaded this app and with in 10 minutes of downloading I had $75 in my bank act. It‚Äôs only $1 a month which is cheaper than others. I‚Äôm so impressed with how quickly this went for me to get money into my account. I tried other apps and it was all a hassle. If you‚Äôre debating between dave and earnin don‚Äôt go to earnin. They were completely awful! 

Dave is the way to go!!! I‚Äôm letting all my friends and family know about dave!
title: I was skeptic but it‚Äôs great

review: Hello, my husband used Dave to get an advance of 75$...we‚Äôve had a good experience but some issues. I‚Äôll first start off with the minimum monthly fee...I love that it‚Äôs only a dollar!! Much better than bridgit app...the only issue so far that I‚Äôve had with Dave is that nowhere in their advertising off of the app does it state that getting your money sooner than a few business days (Dave App says 8 hours with the fee but my credit union had it to me in minutes) will incur a  USD $4.99 charge when you are due to repay it...you only find out just before you accept to send the payment to your account...that might throw people off who are in a pinch and could really use the money.
title: Decent app but a few issues

review: There is a $4.99 fee for an advance of $75 and I believe it‚Äôs lower when the cash advance is lower BUT they deposit the money almost immediately and it is VERY convenient. If you choose the option of receiving the money within 3 business days, there is NO fee. So if you know you will need the $75 any time soon, it‚Äôs a good idea to request the cash in advance to save yourself paying the fee. I hate paying fees but I didn‚Äôt mind when it comes to this. They do give you an option to leave a tip. Was easy to make an account and go through the process. I would HIGHLY recommend it ! I loved it, will be using this again !!!!
title: Excellent service

review: This app is legit. I was skeptical at first about sharing my account info and debit card info with this app as any person would be. The app works exactly as advertised. They also offer a free service that analyzes your previous transactions in your bank account to form a budget plan. They provide an option to manually enter and remove bills as well. I requested 75 right off the bat. The funds were available in less than 5 minutes on my bank account. The payback date was dated for my next payday. They do charge an additional 5 dollars on the payback, however if you need cash in short notice; a 5 dollar charge is fair for the service.
title: Legit

review: I am a young adult learning to budget and after a car accident that left me out of work for a month. Finally getting back in the groove of things were financially unstable. I just needed a few bucks for gas to get me through the week. I pondered on what I could possibly sell or favors I could do. I thought about asking but my pride is too big and I hate to seem like a charity case. I did some research and found out about this app. Extremely nervous at first thinking I‚Äôd need a credit check and I didn‚Äôt. Dave‚Äôs was easy! I linked my card, verified myself and BOOM money in my account. I immediately told my boyfriend to download the app as well.
title: Made a believer out of me

review: Dave and ALL his cronies are awesome to have around. They are the friend that you go to when you need someone to spot you that hundo when you‚Äôre tapped out till pay day and need something to eat besides ramen noodles. Money is always in my bank before I close the app, not hours or even minutes. And as long as you are in good standing they will never say no...with no questions asked! You always need friends like that, you just don‚Äôt always know when you‚Äôre going to need them. The world is falling apart out there and the chances of finding friends like that are slim to none. I give them 5 stars and 2 thumbs up!
title: Super duper cool Bear...eh-hmm... I mean App! ü•∞

review: I was told I‚Äôd be charged $1 a month for the Dave app, within three weeks I was charged twice. I hadn‚Äôt used the app once and was charged twice I figured it was only $2 so not a big deal but I might as well use the app since I was charged twice already. Upon realizing I wasn‚Äôt going to use this app much I decided to cancel but the Dave app quickly offered me an incentive to stay by offering two free months of the app service so I accepted. A few days later I accidentally lost my debit card and tried to update the app with my new debit card information but then when I accidentally logged out and entered a different phone number all my information was deleted and my two free months were rescinded and app supposed basically told me there was nothing they could do, then I was charged for another month all in a span of two months. Such a waste of time.
title: Told me one thing then did another

I‚Äôve had a much better experience with the Earnin‚Äô App. You can advance up to $100 starting off and go up to $500 once you‚Äôve been with them a few months and show consistency, money is deposited right away with NO FEES & you can request an advance the same day your payment is withdrawn. review: This app has proven to be reliable time and time again! I have found myself just needing a small amount of money just to get by. Being a young adult without help from parents is tough and sometimes you just need a helping hand but don‚Äôt want a get a pay day loan. You just need a few dollars to make it by until you get paid in few days or you need a big amount for an unexpected emergency. I‚Äôve used Dave to buy groceries for myself and boyfriend when we didn‚Äôt have anything. This app is one of the best I have downloaded. I don‚Äôt mind paying the $1 to get the loan of the few extra to get the loan within the hour.
title: Young adulting

review: A bit of advice, make sure you had your checking account for a bit. (At least a year).  Make sure you frequently use the account. Make sure you can pay back what you barrow. And also make sure your account isn‚Äôt in negative. Times are rough, be patient, you will succeed. This application saved me over 300 dollars on overdraft fees!! I I have the up most respect  for this app. When you need a quick advance, pay that 4.99 cost to get it deposited in your account. Most of reviews and ratings, I noticed the people who are funded are the most truthful. People!!, you will get through this. All your debt will be gone. Patience please üôè
title: Review

review: if you have a compatible bank account that gets regular deposits this app is amazing! i wish you could sign up with ADP mobile but my other bank works just fine. I‚Äôve used it to get $20 fronted til the next friday a couple times and had no problems! even got $75 before. the money didnt even get taken out until more cash was deposited so i didnt see an overdraft even though i couldnt put the cash in til that afternoon. if you get paid every other week sometimes the payback day can land on an awkward friday, but i definitely recommend Dave to anyone just lookin for a little cash and can‚Äôt wait til payday
title: legitimate app, used multiple times

review: I have been using Dave now for a couple months, it was fine but up until now I have a major issue. I put in for a loan of $75 and even paid additional money for an instant transfer. It‚Äôs been 2 days and still nothing. All the app says is that I am to repay back the loan (which will be automatically withdrawn) on the 12th of this month...I have contacted them numerous times via their email system because there is no phone number! I‚Äôm worried they will withdraw the money next week even though I haven‚Äôt even received the loan!! I hope they fix this, but it seems to be landing on deaf ears....
title: Cash was not received but they claim it was sent

review: I was skeptical about the possibility of getting loans from an app, but this app really does it if you have steady direct deposits or paychecks deposited yourself. I was able to receive $75 instantaneously one time, and I tried to get another loan recently and was approved for $40 but my card expires in a month and I guess that's against the policy to loan to a card that's so close to being expired. That's the only issue I've encountered though, it also lets me know when I have an overdraft likely and keeps track of all of my regular expenses so I can see in one place when money's going to be taken out to pay for my subscriptions and regular fees.
title: Genius app!!!

review: Being a single mother of three with a full time job is tricky, especially when it comes to budgeting paycheck to paycheck. Sometimes we just don‚Äôt have enough to cover incidentals or run out of groceries more quickly than expected... This has been one of those weeks for us. I saw the ad on Facebook this morning, read some reviews, and (though it sounded to good to be true) decided to give it a try. It was incredibly easy to register. Now, our $75 is on its way and just in time! I also set up some of my recurring expenses on the budgeting tool, so I‚Äôm excited to see how that works. If this app continues to deliver, it may just be my new best friend!
title: Life Saver!
developerResponse: {'id': 5567062, 'body': "So glad you're enjoying the advances and getting to know the budgeting feature! Thanks for the review!", 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:58:56Z'}

review:
Love the ability to add a little extra when I need it. The low tip fee to transfer quickly and optional tip amount are small and totally unlike payday loans.
The only thing I would change is that even if you‚Äôve borrowed several times and paid on time every time, the Dave app wants to see a certain amount of money in your account for a few days or they drop the amount you can borrow. For instance, I had bills come out of my check the day I got paid recently, so I was pretty low in my checking and counting on Dave to get through the week. But the app dropped the amount I could borrow, even though it would be paid back on my next payday. 
Other than that, I have no complaints.
title: Mostly great
developerResponse: {'id': 5567058, 'body': 'Hi! Glad the app has been useful for you. Yes, we do have a couple low requirements to be sure someone can pay us back. Thanks for taking the time to review!', 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:58:08Z'}

review: It budgets your money and remembers monthly payments for you. You can borrow up to $75 and it charges $5 to borrow money and then asks for a tip. Now we‚Äôve got what we need and all I have to do is pay it back from my next check. Also this app offers its own banking service and you can get a $100 loan with that and you don‚Äôt have a $5 fee. You also get your checks 2 days earlier. So all things considered this app is a definitive 5 for its thoughtfulness, ease of use, and overall usefulness.
title: Great app.

review:
when I kept seeing the advertisements I was like no way but then I had cause to use Dave twice  I love the benefits of the whole site   I am 68 and have had Bank accounts since I was 15 but that just might be a thing Of the past. I never use checks anymore and pay bills on line  

Dave is all I need Dave has bailed me out about three times and they say it could take up to eight hours to get the money but within seconds it was in my bank account. They don‚Äôt charge you an arm and a leg every month it‚Äôs very fair price and it‚Äôs convenient. I would recommend Dave to everybody. It‚Äôs a site that‚Äôs easy to navigate. Join today.
title: Review of DAVE

review: I love Dave! Wow! When you‚Äôre in a pickle and need fast help, use Dave! Also, with everything going on in the world, you might have to adjust those random charges, those automatic bills, the ones that overdraft your account! Dave alerted me in time to stop those payments from over-drafting my account! Most of them I had forgotten about because of autopay. But Dave didn‚Äôt forget!!! Dave saved me so much money by helping me manage my accounts and also get me set up with super easy ‚Äúside hustles‚Äù! Thank you Dave!!!! You seriously saved me! Helped me put food on the table for my kiddos and really helped me calm down and not lose my mind! Thank you!
title: Amazing and fast!!!

review:
Tried Cleo, Albert, and Earnin to help me out of a bind till payday, and none of those apps were actually able to do it. Not one cent from those after several registrations and verifications etc... Either the advance pay function isn‚Äôt available immediately or you randomly don‚Äôt qualify. 
The Dave App is great and gave no issues like this at all.
Dave skips all the nonsense and makes the experience painless. Dave is easy to use, fast and responsive and it can actually help you unlike those other apps that advertise similar benefits but ultimately fail at delivering. Dave is the best advance pay app hands down, the other will wasted your time.
title: Best Advance App

review: It bothers me to not be able to get an advance before the 11 days cycle  and you getting money back later then the day you have set I‚Äôm on a fixed income and receive my check same day each month, don‚Äôt get me wrong it‚Äôs nice this service is available kootoes on that ! but your lending time on those 11 days where if a person needs the$ before that is not right for creditors or repairs needed to pay them and having to wait on the advance! title: Not being able to get advance when really needed

review: So to instantly deposit there is a $4.99 charge in addition to whichever option you choose, but ultimately great way to make ends meet until payday. You have to directly set this up to your debit card so when it is payday, which is noted by your previous automatic deposits Dave can have his money back, for me I borrowed $75 + the $4.99 for instant rather than waiting 3 days. So I‚Äôll have $80 to owe back once my check is dropped. Also, he helps find gigs you could apply for that are helpful, and he acts as a financial advisor to a degree by evaluating your bank statement and telling you what your projected balances are (ultimately to avoid late fees.)
title: Very handy

review:
I have used Dave a few times now with absolutely no problems. My grandma just died last September and my family members that were relying on her financially have split that between me and my mom, so now my own financial costs have skyrocketed. Without Dave I would have been unable to help my aunt and uncle, or maybe not buy my cousin (who lives with me) pop or snacks to munch on while I'm at work. 

This app is amazing, and I am glad I gave it a chance after seeing it had so many positive reviews. So now here is another positive review that will hopefully ease someone else's worries about using this app so they, too, will give it a chance like I did.
title: In a pinch life saver

review:
For myself and I‚Äôm sure many unsuspecting customers, I had a ‚Äúsmall charge‚Äù taken out which turned out to be $1. This would be returned in a couple days, they claimed. It‚Äôs now been weeks and the money was not returned. This is not transparent and they essentially trick you into giving your information before they tell you about a fee. 

The reason I signed up for your service is to help me get money sooner, not to find out I don‚Äôt qualify and still end up paying $1. Feels horrible to be ripped off by apps like this :( 

I wouldn‚Äôt support this company with a penny and believe me, I‚Äôm going try and get my dollar back. (I know it‚Äôs a membership fee, this wasn‚Äôt told to me when I was prompted to link my bank account) 

0 stars!

EDIT: The app has since offered me 2 months of free membership and I‚Äôve changed my rating to 4 stars. I wasn‚Äôt refunded, but I was definitely compensated for my confusion. I stand by what I said before, but I‚Äôm definitely appreciative of what the app has done to remedy my issue. I have since used the app for its services and am very satisfied with my experience.

review:
Dave came in clutch for me when I was without an income for two weeks. You can start right away with a $25 advance, then when you build a good payment history, your limit increases to $75. There‚Äôs little to no interest involved - just the tip and a fee if you want instant deposit. Why is it free? Likely they‚Äôre collecting bank account usage data and aggregating it - most of these companies do, CreditKarma, Mint, etc., but 
Nothing to be concerned about!
My only complaint is that the app frequently disconnects from my bank account, forcing me to re-enter my info. I have a smaller bank (FNBO) but it still should work!
Keep up the good work, Dave.
title: Dave is Great!

review: I was skeptical- I‚Äôll admit- thinking this was one of those apps that trick you into into installing then you end up having to pay money to actually use it. Right off the bat, I got a list of my monthly expenses some I didn‚Äôt even realize I was paying. Not being paid to write this review at all and I‚Äôm a ~real human~ so take it from me and the 30,000+ reviews!

review: It‚Äôs my fianc√©es birthday this week and my last paycheck was lighter than I had hoped. As a young adult with little knowledge of financing, Dave helps me budget properly and actually start saving my money, given I admittedly have spending tendencies. Overall, anyone of any age needs this app.

title: Actually Works WHAT!

review:
So many apps like this have a billion hidden fees or added charges to use the app after so long. 
But Dave only charges $1 A MONTH!! And the ONLY other fee on this app is an OPTIONAL one!! Yeah OPTIONAL!! 
Whenever Dave loans you money you can choose to have it sent to you the ‚ÄúStandard‚Äù way for absolutely free or the quick way which I believe is called ‚ÄúExpress‚Äù and when I borrow $20 the Express option only cost $2.99, and when I borrow $75 the ‚ÄúExpress‚Äù option is $4.99
BUT GET THIS 
You don‚Äôt have to pay it right then you pay it when you pay back the $20-$80!!! 

Now .. FOR THE BEST PART!! 

If for some reason your check doesn‚Äôt come in, you go negative before Dave can collect, or any other thing happens to where you are unable to pay on your due date ???? 
DAVE WILL NOT OVERDRAFT YOUR ACCOUNT!!! 
Dave will just wait until you get paid again!! 
I am genuinely so satisfied with this app!! It has kept my account from over drafting more times then I can even count!! 
So if you‚Äôre considering downloading it?? 
DO IT NOOWWW!! You will NOT regret it!!

review: I had no idea an app like this existed. I was looking for ways to make a little money. But what I found was this app, which helped more with my immediate struggle. I was about to overdraft just as soon as my rent check would hit. This app offered a small loan that would keep me from over drafting and that would come out of my next paycheck immediately without me having to worry about paying it back. And I could pay a small fee to have it the same day. The fee comes off at the end when they take the money back out of my account. It‚Äôs as straight forward as it sounds. Absolutely wonderful app. What a life saver.
title: Phenomenal

review: Dave is bound to boom! It connects to your bank account and keeps track of your spending and income and advances you up to $75 to help you avoid overdrafts and rediculous bank fees! Only downside is occasional app glitches and connection problems with your bank account especially if you change your bank account password or make any changes to your bank account info and also the fact that you can't speak to anyone on the phone under their customer service info- they don't list a customer service phone number to call- all issues must be sent by email only which is the trend these days for most phone apps. Otherwise, I'd give them 5 stars!
title: Great Product

review: I thought this had to be BS but this app is absolutely incredible. I‚Äôm a young widow and have been waiting a year and a half for social security to approve my disability for PTSD. I struggle to make ends meet each month with the little money social security gives me and my son for survivor benefits. When I saw this app, I seriously thought it had to be a scam, but I got a text from Dave yesterday, after my bank account hit $0.00, saying I was approved for $75. I went to the app and requested the money. It said the money would show up in my account within 8 hours but I got a text from my bank right then saying I had a balance of $75.
title: Like magic

review: The Dave app is a lifesaver. Allowing you to pretty much borrow from your paycheck and paying it forward for the next person. They process the requests super fast and they give you the option to get it he same day if that is what you need at a reasonable fee. The app itself has quite a few benefits. It will look at your bank account and project the lowest it feels your balance will fall. I love the fact that it helps me track my spending and better project what money I will have left after my bills. I am trying to get my Finances together and the Dave app is helping me do just that! Thanks Dave app and team!
title: Dave is a Lifesaver and It‚Äôs easy to Use

This App is the best !!!

This is a very frustrating app that doesn‚Äôt work at all like ‚ÄúDave‚Äù says, don‚Äôt waste your time, or you‚Äôll be like me wondering why I trust an app with my sensitive bank and employment info when time and time again they can‚Äôt get my payday right. title: Exactly as advertised

review: So I kept seeing this commercial for Dave. being a person who don‚Äôt handle money well decided to try. I make decent money but budgeting is not my thing. review: This app is easy to use and is a lifesaver when you are in between paychecks. It also manages your recurring payments and will warn you if an overdraft is likely. Other than that, the only ‚Äúfee‚Äù that you pay is a tip based on the amount you received as an advance. But you can choose any amount for the tip. This app is definitely a must have if you have ever been short on cash between paychecks. The additional features are just icing on the cake!
title: Easy to use

review:
I can‚Äôt even begin to count how many times this app has come through for me. I‚Äôve had one issue and they were responsive and fixed the issue so that I could get the money. They even finessed my pay date so that I could get the money. Usually I am the one crying that things don‚Äôt work for me there is ALWAYS an issue when I try to do the simplest things but not with this app.
 I hate to see so many having issues with it. It‚Äôs not the app it‚Äôs your bank acct TRUST . If you have a routine deposit that deposits every month without fail then you‚Äôre good to go. If your deposits vary then you‚Äôre most likely to have an issue .

review: This app is great! You can borrow up to $75 (or $100 if you join a waitlist) and for me, it goes into the account in about 20 seconds. (The app says it can take up to 8 hrs.) You pay it back whenever you get paid or possibly even a week after, it tells you when you borrow what the payback date is. You also have the option to tip, and I believe they donate money to a food bank. Highly recommend!!   -T.S.
title: Awesome app

review:
I have been using Dave since December of 2017. I used to love the app, until today. I went to make an advance, and it didn‚Äôt allow me to. I contacted support, and was told my method of how my paychecks go into my account are no longer supported by the app. I had no warning, no explanation, and it was blatantly obvious the support rep didn‚Äôt care. She kept emailing me saying ‚Äúthe new app has new rules.‚Äù 

What I don‚Äôt understand is how a company can just decide their current customers can‚Äôt request an advance anymore. I‚Äôve paid everything I‚Äôve ever borrowed, Gave more to plant trees, and then boom... ‚ÄúSorry, let me send you all these links to prove why you can‚Äôt request an advance anymore.‚Äù

I do not recommend this app and will continue to let the world know. A company that can‚Äôt ensure their current customers can continue to be customers and obviously picks and chooses what type of accounts they want to hold on to, is one that I want nothing to do with. No morals, inconsiderate, and horrible operations. 

 Earnin is a much better app, with no glitches, and a much more considerate customer service team. They have my business now and I recommend you reach out to them before five if Dave any of your money for ‚Äútrees.‚Äù Do they even plant them?

review: Dave is a service that offers quick loans from $10 all the way to $75 if you need an advance for emergencies like gas or groceries until payday. There‚Äôs no credit check. The coolest feature is it allows you to get paid early based on your direct deposit and you pay him back for a service fee after it hits your accounts. Helps in tight emergencies. There‚Äôs an option to tip, which may seem annoying, but each percentage you tip is a tree planted by Dave. I honestly feel like everything they offer is a scam, and when contacting customer service with questions (they only have an email address, no phone number) it took them between 5-7 days to reply. review:

My only suggestion is to allow to borrow a little more than just $75 each pay period. I will not complain one bit about being able to borrow the $75......honestly thank you, but about double that would have been the perfect amount to get us by till payday. Regardless, the app gets 5 stars all the way!!

review: I've been using Dave for a month now and so far I love it! The advances are easy to get and easy to pay back! No hidden fees! I'm really happy that I waited and continuously checked for my bank to be added to their list! Definitely comes in handy when you need it fast. For example, I just realized that my Christmas tree was thrown away last year, I forgot and never bought the new one. Well here comes December and no tree in my storage. That was a surprise that wasn't in my budget....requested and received my advance quickly! Now my kids have a tree to decorate, thank you so much!
title: A lifesaver with no hidden fees!

review:
Completely happy with how easy this app was to use. Very helpful in looking at your upcoming bills and seeing if you‚Äôre going to go negative.

Easy to use, money was available instantly and you tip what you want! Something like this is amazing and not having to pay outrageous interest fees for a tiny amount of money needed is awesome, especially for a single mom who lives paycheck to paycheck and occasionally makes a mistake in her budget.
title: Amazed

review:
Bad app, bad rules.

**Edit**
Reply to developers response. Yes. I already sent my feedback to that email address when I canceled my account. 
Thanks for that....ü§ìüëç

I‚Äôm not using your service anymore. 
Because when I needed it, it wasn‚Äôt available to me. I‚Äôve been struggling with your app for 4-5 months, and I‚Äôm talking about passed the initial setup. There is another company out there that is easy to use and fast. That‚Äôs what I‚Äôm using and that‚Äôs what I will continue to use. 

Your process is way too convoluted. If I need money I need it now! And all too often your app said I couldn‚Äôt have it now. It said I didn‚Äôt have enough money in my account to barrow, or that is was too close to me getting paid, or that I just got paid (I get paid every seven days), or it can‚Äôt verify my paychecks deposits, or the debits. The app is checking my bank at lest every two hours from what I saw. However it sent me IM‚Äôs and notifications saying I was gonna overdraw, but wouldn‚Äôt let me barrow! Ha! It‚Äôs like a carrot I can‚Äôt have. 

My two cents is to spend more money on building a better process and make it faster and easier to use and spend less money on the aesthetics and marketing of the bear, and you might have a good app in the future. Good luck!

One warning: If you get a money advance, make sure you *carefully* edit the amount of the (optional) tip, or else you may accidentally chose a large extra gratuity that adds a lot to your payback amount. But overall, Dave App gets 5 Stars!

review:

I decided to try out the app finally & as soon as I asked for $20 it was immediately sent to my account! Ever since then I know I can always rely on this app! review:

Twice my card kept declining at a restaurant and at the metro station for no reason. The chat agent wasn‚Äôt able to tell me what‚Äôs wrong. super awesome app! you guys are doing great!

review: I love this app. It‚Äôs really quick and I pay the extra 5$ for the instant cash, the money goes into my account within minutes. review:
If I could, I‚Äôd rate the new service a zero. They completely changed the advance process from various options increasing up to $75. Now they have this ‚Äòrisky vs safe‚Äô advance algorithm. 

Essentially now they want you to keep so much in your account after payday in order for it to be a safe advance. It doesn‚Äôt take into account your payback history at all. I‚Äôve never missed a payback, but now I can‚Äôt withdraw the full $75 because I don‚Äôt leave money in my main account. I have different bank accounts for bills, savings, etc. The only money I leave in my main bank is extra money or gas money, that way I never have to worry about accidentally spending bill money. I‚Äôll be switching services because of the new changes.

title: Pretty straight forward.

review: I like being able to count on this app when I need it the most. The good thing about this app is that it lets me cash out $100 which is really helpful. Way better than going to a payday loan store and wasting time and gas. This app is really fast and convenient. I get my cash deposited instantly once I request my payday loan. The only thing I dislike about the app is that the instant fee is a little too high. A flat price of $0.99 cents or $1.99 is way better than $5.99. This app would get 5 stars from me if you could fix this. I also like how it gives you the option to tip. Tips go to providing food for kids.

review: I kept seeing ads for this app and kept brushing them off until last night when I needed quick cash and had no other options unless I made my account overdrawn which is definitely never good. I downloaded the app, entered my info and 10 mins later I was able to advance $100! I chose the express option and was told it could take up to eight hours but on a chance I checked my bank account and it was there immediately! So easy, so fast! And it will automatically repay my next payday. Such a helpful app and I am very grateful-thanks Dave!!

review: It‚Äôs hard with my bank (chime) to find certain loans an such. I can even choose handy options like where I would like to receive my advance and how urgently I need it!ü•∞ so if I need a spot next week on utilities Dave‚Äôs got me! Or if I have prescriptions I need now not covered by my insurance, Dave‚Äôs got me there too! Just a wonderful app! Provides me weekly peace of mind and help during these trying times!!ü§óüôè‚ù§Ô∏è

Everything said my correct payday info ie; Fridays, biweekly; up until the payback due date (which came after asked if all is correct and transaction completed) All of a sudden DAVE puts a Thursday on there, the day BEFORE I get paid to repay the advance.ü§î No where is there an option to inquire that particular move nor change it. Then the tip aspect. I accidentally hit the tip amount (already highlighted to choose) that was not the one I wanted. Because, of course it was already highlighted. And nowhere did it ask to verify that. What a shock. $75 is now almost $100. I feel I  Could have done that at any quick loan Co. Just my thoughts and concerns.

review: As long as you have an upcoming pay check within 11-12 day that can be seen on your checking account,  you can get up to $75 pretty much instantly. Checked that account and money was deposited as promised!!! Such a great help.  I would absolutely recommend.

review: What a great way to help make ends meet when you need it most. This app has even more features than I originally thought after downloading it and creating my account. The budgeting tools included and notifications will help me to continue to improve my financial standing. Dave is awesome! Thank you for such a great app and service!

review:
The app description states multiple times that you can get an advance of $100 (which is an incredibly small amount). However, once you download the app it only offers you $75, if you link your debit card AND agree to Dave sharing your purchase activity with third parties. The $100 advance is related to opening a checking account with Dave and said feature hasn‚Äôt even launched yet. 

FWIW, $75 is such a tiny amount to advance. Some people are only offered $10-$20 for an advance, which is laughable in 2021. I would recommend just saving a little and then advancing yourself said amount. There‚Äôs no need to pay a monthly fee in order to have the opportunity to receive such a small advance. 

Also, for an expedited advance (which takes 8 hours) they charge you a fee of $5. The free advance takes 3 business days. 
 
Furthermore, tipping is NOT optional. It‚Äôs the tip percentage that you get to choose, but it will not accept anything below a 1% tip.

There also seems to be a lot of fake five stars reviews, which Apple needs to police more effectively.  One or two word reviews with ‚ÄúDave‚Äù in the title field clearly aren‚Äôt authentic reviews. 

Deleted.
title: Dishonest advertising & sketchy privacy practices

We take your privacy and security seriously, and all of your information is secure. Thanks for the review!", 'modified': '2020-03-18T17:07:05Z'}

review:

Not only could I pay the fee but also paid for his lunch and he had a few dollars to buy a little gift! Thank you again. Being a single mom is tough but the little big things like this helps the job become a little more easier. Jayden had a great time on his trip to the Lincoln Park Zoo in Chicago. 
Ps. I love that I can donate later to help grow a tree in Africa. You‚Äôre awesome!
title: You saved my life! ( No seriously)

review: It‚Äôs there when I need it but I think they are in your business a little too much. Ex I paid them on time and waited the allotted time to request money again well when I made the request I was told I was Only able to borrow $25 because the last time I paid them back it but my balance to zero which was not true I opened up a credit card couple days after I paid them back which from my account to zero. Not negative just zero and I feel like that‚Äôs a little bit too much in my business I don‚Äôt feel it should matter what my account is like as long as I paid you back on time
title: Dave is too nosey

review: I‚Äôve tried other site and apps I‚Äôve seen advertised and claimed the same thing this one dose. How ever this one is real. They do tack on a transfer fee for quick access but so dose PayPal when someone sends you money threw them. They only ask for a tip and apparently the tip plans trees and you get to choose how much it is so to barrow 50$ I will pay back 58 and change because of the quick fee and the tip. Not bad at all and the money showed up in less then an hour. They also show you your bank balance and help you budget who doesn‚Äôt like that.
title: So far my experience

review: Still checking it out! My one critique is that is not as helpful for those of us who receive paper checks and are paid biweekly even if that paycheck is deposited in full into the same account every single time because it always doesn‚Äôt register deposits and there‚Äôs no way to confirm the paper payroll check and deposit with the app. Also, the add ons are quite high - $3 to get the money within 8 hours, plus tip. Hopefully this is a service most of us will need often but when you‚Äôre already down $5 to help you get up seems steep.
title: Like it so far!

review: Let‚Äôs start by saying I never leave reviews. Never. But this deserves a well written review. Yes I‚Äôm one of those people who can survive till payday on less than $100. Sometimes you have xyz left in your account then here comes Netflix, Apple Music, pointless subs and only $6 left. Yes this is me. This app have saved me on several occasions when I simply need lunch money or gas or even if I leave my wallet home I use Apple Pay. No confusion, no hidden fees awhile saving trees. Money comes instantly and I like that Dave also helps me budget more and getting better at spending. Everyone wins. Thank you Dave. üêªüíï
title: Sensational

review:
I honestly thought I would have never used this app. Since I‚Äôm so used to waiting until pay day for me to get paid. I‚Äôve had emergencies where I just need just a little to a lot of money. But I had to wait till pay day. I can say without reproach that this app is worth it. 
The only down side is Dave get to decided the amount of money you get. From any where from $10-$75 maximum. But other than that I believe this is a solid app. That even tries to help you get a little side hustle thing. 
Worse thing you can do is try it and not like it. Or try it and fall in love with it. But at least give it a try before negating the app.
title: Dave

review: Honestly, I‚Äôm always super skeptical about apps like these. I see so many of them and I just never thought I‚Äôd actually ever use this app, but desperate times call for desperate measures. The same day I downloaded this application was the same day I got the $75 advance from Dave.  And it helped me out so much. I like how it shows you what expensive you have and what your lowest balance will be until pay day, it helps you budget.  But I especially love the fact that you if you choose to leave a tip, it goes to planting trees ! Super cute ideas. And super helpful app when you need it. I love Dave.
title: Life Saver

review:
I looked into dave after i came up a bit short for a scheduled payment (black fridays, am i right?). It worked just as its advertised, although there is the caveat of a $3.99 fee if you need it that same day. If youre not in a hurry, the 3-5 business day option doesnt have the charge.

Its a great option if you need a quick payday loan and dont have the time to go to an actual store. The $75 limit is enough to get you out of a sticky situation.

I havent spent enough time with the other features like the budgeting, so i cant really review that, but i have no complaints thus far

title: Dave

Decided to cancel Dave after that point because it‚Äôs no use to me. I‚Äôve only done one advance and paid the $1 fee for the month. review:

You know sometimes in life you get unexpected bills, or your paycheck is less than usual so your expenses go over your budget. Dave's got you honestly .

con: The only thing I wish there was a change, is for me not to keep putting in my paycheck amount. The paycheck comes in and you should be able to automatically identify the amount I got paid. (This is not a big deal, but an unnecessary addition).

** I am a real person, no one paid me, I was hesitant in the beginning, but Dave has been my rock for a year now, never disappointed/never disappoints.
title: LIFE SAVER !

title: So for, AMAZING!üôèü§ë

review:
I‚Äôve been a Dave user since January of this year and it‚Äôs been a pretty decent experience until now. You see, I‚Äôm in a pickle here. Even though I‚Äôve successfully received advances from Dave before, when I changed my primary bank, the app assumed that the account was a completely new one. Should I have contacted their team prior to switching? Probably and I recognize my error. 

With that said, I‚Äôve been trying to contact them for three days now. The first couple of days, I sent out tweets and two emails. All I got in response was an automated message telling me that they received my message and that someone should get back to me within 24 hours. Oh I also got a tweet back telling me to DM them, all the while, I‚Äôm still unable to DM them on Twitter. 

Earlier today, I decided to send them a message on Facebook with images of previous transactions and emails I received. I noticed that whoever is managing their FB account saw my messages yet chose to ignore and not respond. 

In short, don‚Äôt rely on this app to rescue your financial hiccups. It just isn‚Äôt reliable.
title: It Works But...

review: As a woman in her mid twenties, sometimes I just need someone to spot me a $20, let‚Äôs be real, we‚Äôve all been there. Weather it‚Äôs for gas or a cup of coffee we‚Äôve all needed a little help, this app was a life saver for me. I downloaded it and instantly received what I asked to be lent to me. This app is great and the fact that they‚Äôll draft your account automatically on pay day is awesome. I‚Äôd rather pay back what I asked to borrow and leave a tip then to overdraft myself, and pay a fee on top of what I spent. Highly recommend for any struggling college student that just needs a small amount to be lent to them.

review:
I‚Äôve been doing business with Dave since they started. You do need a verifiable source of income. The max loan is $75 after you‚Äôve established an account with them, and a few pay cycles have passed. Max loan is around $25 until then.

Dave plans on starting their own debit card, and once that‚Äôs implemented, you may qualify for up to $100. 

They do push tipping them for the privilege of giving you a loan, and it‚Äôs $4.99 to expedite the money same day into your account. That being said, I‚Äôve been happy for the couple of times I needed a loan, so a few extra bucks to Dave is ok in my book. Thanks Dave!
title: Straightforward Place To Obtain A Small Payday Loan

review: Have you ever thought ‚ÄúHmm, I really would like to have a company who stores my information after I cancelled/Closed my account with them over a year ago have a data breach and not inform me that my personal information such as my DOB, Address, Phone number, Email, etc has been apart of that breach ‚Äú this is the right mobile banking app for you ! I would give this negative 5 stars if I could . If you decide to ignore this and obtain a Dave account I highly suggest you also purchase LifeLock, because Dave sure as hell won‚Äôt tell you when you‚Äôre information has been compromised . Or use Earnin ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Oh , they won‚Äôt contact you back once you‚Äôve contacted them asking them about the breach either ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.

review:
If you are responsible, this is one of the best money tools available right now. Flat tire? Get $50 from yourself until payday. Forgot someone‚Äôs birthday gift? $25 or whatever. It‚Äôs just a great thing to have in your back pocket. 

...and keep it there. Do not borrow from yourself every week. $1 a month is a great deal to have this tool, but it‚Äôs also $5 to get your money same day. And be real, that‚Äôs the only way I see people using this app. That‚Äôs $21 a month if you keep borrowing. Don‚Äôt make this basically a credit card against yourself. 

With great power comes great responsibility.

It tracks your balance and your reoccurring payments to let you know what your lowest balance before pay day will be. This app overall is a blessing and they‚Äôre even coming out with a no overdraft checking account option in 2019!! I would 12/10 recommend trying this out :)

review:

$5.00 to be paid back on the 28th.

review: Last night I realized that I overdrew on my bank account. Boy am I glad I did!! Thanks to this app, I was saved from having to pay a $36 overdraft charge for an accidental overdraft. I totally recommend this for anyone and if you‚Äôre ever in a jam!!!

review: Dave has truly been a blessing. I was having issues with my bank account showing my pay deposit. This app was not allowing me to get the advance. I‚Äôm glad that I was told about this app.
title: Blessing

review: Decent app. It‚Äôs great that they lain the money to you and don‚Äôt charge you. That‚Äôs amazing and there aren‚Äôt many places that do that. 3 stars and not more because they say they won‚Äôt take the money out of you account if you don‚Äôt have it, but they do. Even if it means leaving you with $9 to survive with. üôÑ. Which is my fault I guess . My pay check deposits next Friday but for some reason it did my pay back as the Friday before my check. Oh well. Hopefully my 1 year old and I can survive on $9 for a week. Will I still use it again? Probably but I‚Äôll def be trying to figure out why it took the money out a week earlier than I thought it was going to be.

review: I‚Äôve used this app quite a few times here and there as needed. It monitors your purchases and employment deposits. My payback due date has always fallen on pay days which is so convenient. However, something changed this month and I received no notification. They withdrew a week early. On a random day. Putting me in an unexpected bind. When I reached out to customer service they did not explain why dates changed from biweekly to weekly.  They did not refund me for the inconvenience but asked if I needed to extend the remainder balance? Extend for what? Payment shouldn‚Äôt be due for another week .........on payday. They noticed the switch from biweekly to weekly and still no refund.  You only get one chance to screw with my money. Careful allowing access to your account. Ending membership.

review:
I like the fact that when it is setup and I need it, Dave does (usually) help. I don‚Äôt like the fact that if I wait 2 weeks between using the app it (or even opening it) I have to wait to use the service. I don‚Äôt like the fact that if I have an issue it takes the contact us people several days to respond to the emails that I have sent. I don‚Äôt like the fact that if the app messes up with my banking information and I put the same information back into the app that it has to reverify my bank information. 

That being said, as long as I sign into the app at least once every two weeks wether or not I use the app the bank credentials stay active. So I don‚Äôt have to reverify the information. When I do use the app I get the money in a timely manner and the return fee is very reasonable. 

So to condense 

the pros: quick turnaround on the lent money with reasonable fees. 

Cons: have to open the app regularly regardless of actual use. Customer service is lacking. App does not automatically save the information for any length of time.

Trust me when I say, this is a lifesaver and when you struggle paycheck to paycheck this is a God-send! Thanks Dave!!!

review:
Incase you aren‚Äôt aware Dave, not everyone gets paid on a schedule or via direct deposit. Some of us get paid when the jobs done (aka not one the same day every week/month) and some of us still get written old fashion checks. 

How about an option for that so we can get bigger advancements? Not everyone works a 9 to 5

Updating- deleted my account. After talking with customer service, I‚Äôve decided everyone there is too stupid to understand the concept of not having a 9-5/ working as an independent contractor that gets paid difference sized paychecks on different days of the week. Oh, and that checks deposited at the bank (cause again, hand written is how I get paid, no direct deposit offered from my customers) don‚Äôt count as income. Good bye Dave

title: Exceptional customer service.

review: READ READ READ THE AGREEMENT AND FINE PRINT. The Dave app does lend you money at no charge, however it is difficult to get it free. In order to borrow money for free you have to wait 3 days to receive the money or pay a percentage fee to get it instantly or with 8 hours. You are encouraged to tip bc that is an income for them. You can leave a $0 tip, but it is difficult to find that option. You have to click custom tip and take the slider to $0. THERE IS A $1 FEE/Month that somehow I missed in the agreement. So it is not completely free, but $1/month is not bad. So when using the app READ AND TAKE YOUR TIME. Dave can be beneficial or expensive. That choice is yours.
title: Not Bad

review: As we all know , since Covid things haven‚Äôt been so ‚Äú financially stable ‚Äú for many ! This app makes it simple and easy to borrow money until payday ! My only suggestion is that they should increase the amount we are able to borrow but other than that , no complaints! I hope it continues to remain this helpful üòä
title: So helpful if you need a little bit of extra cash !

Although they say they can‚Äôt connect to my bank to SEND me any money, the sure have enough connection to CHARGE my bank account $1 every month. These are not pending charges that fall off either they really have been stealing my money for months. I got no notice that they would start charging for a ‚Äúmembership‚Äù and these has been going on under my nose for months. I just happened to find this out after check my bank transactions. title: It does what it says it does

review:
The App is decent, but it requires a $1/mo subscription, and it‚Äôs same day Cash deposit feature costs $5.  On top of that, they ask that you ‚ÄúTip‚Äù their service, in return by saying that they will plant ‚ÄúX‚Äù amount of trees increasing with the more money you decide to tip. The bad thing is, it‚Äôs default set to tip ELEVEN DOLLARS, the App hopes that you just select ‚ÄúOK‚Äù on their default tip amount. It‚Äôs really bad for people that just tap away without looking at the fine details. 

So $5 same day deposit fee, requires $1 a month to use, and also will try to hopefully get $11 more dollars out of it‚Äôs users that don‚Äôt pay much attention. 

The only reason I use this App is because my preferred money app ‚ÄúEarnin‚Äù limited my borrow limit at the moment (does that depending on your paycheck/spend rate). 

If you need Apps of this nature to get by through the week, give Earnin a chance first and this second. 

This App is decent at best, but I feel like they ask for way too much. 

If Earnin can be highly successful only asking for tips alone and no shady business with the UI layout, then it‚Äôs easy to see the slight greed in the developers.

review:
As much as I appreciate the financial ‚Äúboost‚Äù available from Dave, I have two major issues with the app:

1. If you set the ‚Äútip‚Äù to $0, be careful! The app will open a second screen where you have to ‚Äî once again ‚Äî set the tip to $0, or else it‚Äôll change the tip back to 10%. 

2. My check hits the bank on Thursdays but the app insists on withdrawing repayment on Wednesdays. Not only that, if Dave can‚Äôt withdraw the full amount it‚Äôll keep trying with smaller and smaller amounts until it can withdraw something, anything. So if all I have left in my account is $25, Dave might take $20, leaving me $5 until I get paid the next day. So I often find myself getting gas on Tuesday night, just so I don‚Äôt get stuck.

review: Personally, I would rather not constantly withdraw from my savings if I can help it. The interest I‚Äôm accruing from my savings outweighs the minimal (if any) fees Dave charges. I choose the optional tip but you don‚Äôt have to. Sometimes times get tight and that‚Äôs where Dave comes in. Also, I like how the app has other options if you don‚Äôt want/qualify for an advance but still want to make money. There‚Äôs links for many legitimate side hustles and overall the Dave app is a great option to throw in the finance section of your phone.
title: Comes in handy and is very user friendly.

review:
I used Dave last year and it was alright, definitely helps when you‚Äôre in a tight spot between pay period and don‚Äôt want to keep racking credit card charges. 

I stopped using Dave after 3 months because I had no need for it. Then two weeks ago I found out my identity was stolen - someone had used my social security to claim unemployment. Further investigating on how my number got out, I found out from haveibeenpawned that DAVE HAD A SECURITY BREACH, thousands of Social Security, Email, and Birthdates of Dave users were breached - and I didn‚Äôt get a single email from Dave about it. The fraudulent unemployment was submitted in August, weeks after the incident with Dave.

Now I am a victim of identity theft, I have the police involved and I will be seeking legal action with Dave.
title: Security Breached - no emails

review: Sometimes things sound to good to be true but Dave really helped me out of a bind with an overdraft fee! I needed a quick loan and I selected that and I had the extra cash into my account in 5 minutes. What a lifesaver if you need it! Fast, easy, secure. I would defiantly recommend this app for a quick pay advance.

review:
This is a great app for a quick advance. I‚Äôve used it multiple times!
There is one thing I can‚Äôt seem to find any help on, customer service didn‚Äôt answer my question after sending an inquiry. Anyways, I was late to pay back a loan by 2 days due to my check in the mail around a holiday. After I was approved for another loan it only gave me options up to $20. So I did that, paid it back on time, and it gave me the option for $75 again. However, I paid that $75 back a day EARLY. And for some reason it is back to only $20. 

I would love an explanation so I know how to avoid this please!
title: Good app

review: I was surprised how easy, quick (and cheap) it was to get a cash advance on my paycheck a few days before payday when I was in a bind. The money came right into my bank account within minutes and relieved me of any worry and stress that I would overdraft. Thank you for your help! I will definitely use again in the future and recommend to my friends and family for when they are stuck in a tight spot financially and just need a few extra dollars to get through until payday.
title: Quick and Easy Money for when in a bind
developerResponse: {'id': 5666391, 'body': "We're so happy to hear you love the app! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review :)", 'modified': '2018-10-25T20:10:50Z'}

They monitor your bank account so if they don‚Äôt see any money in it or if you are in jeopardy of going negative they will not take their money. They‚Äôll do small increments at a time until they have it all. The loan options I‚Äôm given are $25, $50 or $75 and I always leave a tip. The highest amount is $75. I love this app!
title: NOT A SCAM!

review: This app has been very helpful in helping really see where all my money is going because it shows all your transaction form your checking account. review:

review: Dave is much more helpful that I even intended! For one, kudos to Dave for having access to my very small local bank that no other app offers access to. I‚Äôve been sick so my last paycheck didn‚Äôt cut it for me, so the quick help was a lifesaver for temporary relief. The payment automatically comes out on payday.. plus a little tip for others who need the help. It also shows me exactly how low my lowest amount will be after bills and it‚Äôs really helpful.
title: Very helpful

review: It‚Äôs so refreshing to find an app that does exactly what it said it would do! I needed money for gas quickly, but forgot my paycheck at work so I couldn‚Äôt get any. With Dave, I was able to get a $20 loan within seconds, and I just have to pay it back next payday! There‚Äôs no extra fees or fine print, just a $1 monthly subscription. review: As a single mother I love this idea. review:
I have had zero issues with this app. Dave loans the money and they take it out of my account on my payday. Zero issues.

I also like that Dave gives you the ability to log on and pay back the money borrowed at anytime. You don‚Äôt have to wait for the money to be taken out, you can use a credit/debit card to repay anytime. 
I definitely recommend to anybody needing a little extra cash until payday. No hidden fees, no bs. Just a little help when you need it.

review: I got this app in November of 2019, I borrowed 20$ from Dave one time and in May of 2020 I still regret it. Two days before every paycheck Dave takes 20$ to 30$ out of my account leaving overdrawn and in a worse place than I was before I got Dave. When ever I get paid it takes up to 40$ to 60$, I think it‚Äôs inappropriate to take so much money from me, a 19 year old girl who‚Äôs working all of the time to pay of debt and get an apartment. I borrowed money from the app to get out of financial financial depression and it was a horrible idea. My bank has made me pay hundreds of dollars so that my account won‚Äôt get cut off. When you have more money in your bank, Dave will take more. Long story short don‚Äôt borrow money from this app unless your are willing to deal with it for months.

review:

**one thing I would like to add that when I first started using Dave I didn‚Äôt have to worry about an extra $4.99 fee to get it instantly but you know it‚Äôs ok I guess because it‚Äôs there within two minutes**
title: Great

review: I‚Äôve heard of other sites and apps that will  loan you cash before you‚Äôre payday. However, let‚Äôs be honest; it seems very suspicious and shady. It makes you hesitate to just give away your personal info and not sure if you‚Äôre really going to receive the cash. But NOT WITH DAVE, they didn‚Äôt ask for too much and when I was done with the process the cash was in my account IMMEDIATELY. I literally had to call my mom and tell her about DAVE. It‚Äôs so helpful and we all have those moments where we just need a little something to hold us until payday.
title: It‚Äôs LEGIT !

review: I NEVER leave reviews but I decided too for this one. The entire Dave app in general is awesome. If your running a little low on cash Dave can spot you. What I like is that it will let you know if your account will likely overdraft before next payday. If your high risk ü§£ü§£ it's not going to give you the full advance, but it will still spot you a lower amount. So the app actually analyze your spending habits and don't just give out money to any and everyone who may not be able to repay Dave back. It's a nice app for budgeting as well. The app was designed very well...
title: Dave Review

review: My first time ever using this app. I borrowed $50 and I pay it back when I get paid. The only 2 things I didn‚Äôt like. One is that I didn‚Äôt like is the payback options. It only gives you your payday. I wanted to split the borrowed amount into 2 payments. Second it charged me $3.99 to get it expressed to my account the same day. The other option to get the money into my account was 3 days. If I wanted to wait three days I wud have waited until I got paid and never used the app. Obviously if people need to use the app they need it right away.
title: Awesome app just a few thing to change in my opinion.

review: I was skeptical when I first heard about Dave. I was pleasantly surprised with how easy it was to sign up and use. It is useful and very handy to be able to access money before your next payday. I would definitely recommend at least trying Fave our if not utilizing it as a regular service. It is very fair, easy to use and user friendly with payback options that won‚Äôt gouge you with interested rates. (There is no interest to lay back). Dave also provides you with a very reasonable time to pay the money back.
title: User friendly and amazing app!!!

review: As I am extremely struggling with money, I decided to try and download this app. After much research, Dave seemed like the only legitimate app. I gave them all of my information, and requested the 75$ and it will not let me get it due to when my paychecks come in. Because they are two weeks apart, they refuse to give me any money which is extremely frustrating considering a lot of my money I receive is in cash and then transferred onto my card and just because the company I work for does biweekly, it does not work. Although it does seem like a trustworthy app, the advertising is misleading because you cannot in fact receive any money unless the seldom that qualify. I‚Äôm extremely disappointed.
title: Misleading Information
developerResponse: {'id': 9178491, 'body': "Hi rcarr231! Thanks for letting us know you're having this issue - let's get you in touch with our customer support team via the contact link at support.dave.com and we'll sort it out!", 'modified': '2019-06-15T01:16:44Z'}

review:

review: First off.... Second... their legal language inside their account agreement states that they can change which bank holds your money for FDIC insurance purposes and that they don‚Äôt have to tell you! Third... their account agreement also states that if they seek out info for ‚Äúdebts‚Äù we owe to other companies, they‚Äôll freeze our account, give our money away, close our account, and refund any difference on their timeline ! I‚Äôll be closing my account down very quickly and destroying my debit card as soon as it arrives. Be careful if you give this company your money! Very scary !!!

review: Totally useless...why have an app for overdrafts when you can‚Äôt use it??!! title: The struggle

review:
This app is reliable and really helpful when I‚Äôm running low on money towards the end of my pay period. 

Rating 3 stars because it is frustratingly difficult to get a response from their support team. It takes up to a week to receive a response on a simple ticket.  I work as support for a software company and we would never leave a customer waiting that long. 

I got an advance recently and the payback day was incorrect.. I needed the cash so I moved forward with the advance end created a ticket regarding the payback date. I never received a response now my account is in the negative.
title: Helpful, but their support team is lacking

review: I was too at first a skeptic, I took a chance on with the app and setup an account. I was able to borrow $75 almost within 20 minutes of downloading the app and setting up my account, it‚Äôs that easy! It has you sign into your bank on the app and verifies your direct deposit for employment and you‚Äôre good to go! I have now been using this service for a month and am as happy as all get out. Don‚Äôt pay for expensive payday loans, if you need cash before your paycheck comes, Dave is the bear that can help! Thank you Dave!
title: Amazing App

review: I love this Dave app! Things have been pretty tough for me financially for the past few months and the Dave App has literally saved me into pay periods when I had no money and no one I could borrow from. It also helps you to keep track of your spending and creating budgets. Now they offer checking accounts with load of benefits that come with it. All around the Dave App is a life saver when you need a quick loan or fee free banking of financial advice, and I refer as many people as I can to try it out also!
title: Dave Never Lets You Down!

review:
For the sake of keeping this short, I‚Äôm only mentioning the one that keeps me from using this app.

Every couple of days, Dave will disconnect from my bank. So I am forced to reconnect every few days. Well today when I tried to reconnect it, it says there‚Äôs a problem and it will be at least a few days and that I should use another institution. Great. So much for having a way to a pay advance until my next paycheck gets here.  Instead I‚Äôm just being charged for a service that I can‚Äôt even use.

Finally got it reconnected. But since it disconnected before I got paid, it‚Äôs now saying I‚Äôm missing a paycheck even though it is showing me the paycheck on the screen. So they can give me an advance up to $20. Wow so much for that $75 I was promised. There isn‚Äôt even a way to get in touch with them through the app. No contact. You can‚Äôt email, you can‚Äôt call.

So I decided I would just borrow $20 for now.  I can‚Äôt even do that. It gives me an error saying that my identity is taking longer to verify than normal then it just kicks me back to the front page. Really? Why am I paying for this?
title: Problems galore - feels like a scam

review: Although you do get cash advances within 3 days or 8 hrs. Dave isn‚Äôt completely free, there‚Äôs a 1$ monthly membership fee which isn‚Äôt bad plus a 4.99$ fee if you want an advance in 8 hrs. Plus the app asks for a tip but it‚Äôs optional for now. All in all it‚Äôs very good and if you‚Äôre in a pinch you can borrow 75$ or a little less , you will have to pay it back on your next pay day but as I said it‚Äôs good if you‚Äôre in a tight spot but don‚Äôt expect Dave to advance you enough to pay your rent or anything like that. üòÅ as for me I‚Äôm satisfied with Dave.
title: Timely

review:
I been using Dave since 2017 there has been times when I was really low on cash but needed money for a car repair or pay a bill that I completely forgotten about. I like that it‚Äôs instant and it‚Äôs based off you having a bank account not your credit unlike some small loan agencies. Just attach it to your bank account and confirm your pay days and once your confirm you get your small loan and you just pay $1 subscription. You can‚Äôt beat that and you choose how much you tip.  
Thanks Dave
title: Very very convenient

review: I was low on cash after paying bills and needed a couple dollars in my account so my apple music bill wouldnt drag my account in the negative. review: Will not register my paychecks which are direct deposit as a form of valid payment which only allows me to get an advance of 20 dollars. And on top of this the advance they ask for a tip even though you‚Äôre asking for an advance because you have no money. The advance is supposed to take 3 business days unless you want to pay extra to have it come sooner. I put in for a 20 dollar advance anyway because it‚Äôs better than nothing, and I put in for it on a Friday. It‚Äôs not expected until Thursday of the following week, and the day before I get paid. Pretty useless in my situation, maybe if i put in for it on a weekday it could help, or if I could actually ask for more than a 20 dollar advance even though I get regular bi-monthly income.
