review:
I used this app one time about six months ago to see if it actually worked, and it is not at all what it says. First of all, you have to be qualified to get the full 100$. When I first signed up, I was eligible for 5-15$. Then, the 15$ took 3 days to get to my account, and they added a five dollar fee to it. Directly after, I deleted my account and ever since they have still been taking money out of my account every month, even when I made sure to permanently delete it. My bank has tried to block them from taking money out, but they use different names. It‚Äôs a scam and a waste of time. 

I received an email from a developer and to update this review, I did PERMANENTLY delete my account six months ago-not just deleted the app.

review:

title: Great!

review: I was approved for a advance on Saturday evening and was told I would receive my advance by a certain time so I waited... nothing. Then I was told to wait up to 8 hours.. Sunday morning... nothing. Monday... Nothing.. was told from their Twitter customer service because there is no live person to speak with.. only a email support that takes days to respond.. still waiting on that. So yea I spoke to their Twitter customer service via DM about noon told them I didn‚Äôt receive my advance and they responded to me about 2 pm saying it was sent. After sending a screenshot of my banks recent transactions, I have yet to get a response. This app needs better customer service. I need a answer I will be very upset if my account get overdrafts for money I never received.

Uninstall them if you want. I‚Äôm going to keep them on here just in case I find myself needing that rescue money again.
title: Get Dave

review: Compared to some other apps, the signup was different. However there is a flat rate fee for sending the money immediately and you have the option to tip. One of their competitors doesn‚Äôt have that fee attached, just the tip option. Other than that, I‚Äôll continue to use Dave for its simplicity. No uploading timesheets or GPS location. Dave seems to go by your bank account and direct deposits. Keep doing what you‚Äôre doing, very helpful when you‚Äôre in a crunch and need money immediately!

review: I have seen commercials time and time again for Dave and I thought why would you need this app. But now I‚Äôm in the process of buying a house and I need to save money and I came across the Dave app and I needed a few extra bucks for gas. review:

review: Despite the occasional tech glitch (which happens of course), Dave has helped get me out of more than a few jams. You pay $1 a month, and you have a buffer just in case you accidentally go to the regular gas station instead of Costco and ruin your wife‚Äôs budget so you need some extra cash in order to get the prime rib you wanted to get for Sunday Dinner..... thanks Dave.

 Need gas, a few groceries, extra for a upcoming bill ... Dave‚Äôs gotchu. It provides that tiny extra cushion to get you to payday.  Definitely a must have.

Honestly, for anyone else having this issue I just want to get this heard and see what can be done about it. Maybe a call on the line with your bank to verify everything?

review: This app has a cool concept and GREAT design. And you really can‚Äôt ask for much from a company that‚Äôs helping you with literal money. BUT it‚Äôs very sneaky. They require so much information from you, and there is no way to delete previously provided info (including your bank) unless you add a NEW account to replace it. I‚Äôm order to cancel your account you have to go into your account info which appears blank, and click into ANOTHER thing to get to the ‚Äúcancel membership‚Äù button. And THEN you have to go through about 20 screens begging you to stay so they can keep secretly charging a tip to you, because again, even if you‚Äôre not using the service, they have access to your bank account unless you fully cancel!

review: After needing a little assistance I found the Dave app and decided to give it a try. The setup was very easy on the iOS platform. review:
I‚Äôve never had to deal with collections...

After three months of struggling, including a loan sitting late/unpaid, I finally paid Dave back. Guess what? Dave was such a nice guy, he borrowed me the money again, the exact same day. ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Payday loans cost hundreds of dollars and with apps like Dave coming out, I truly don‚Äôt know how they‚Äôll stay in business. Thanks Dave

I entered my routing and account number then was prompted to enter my card number. It kept saying declined for trying to withdraw 1¬¢. I knew i had 1¬¢ in my account. I‚Äôm thinking to myself, okay it‚Äôs working. 

I emailed customer service about the status and also mentioned my card issue. I was told by a representative to use my ‚ÄúRegular‚Äù account and routing # (Which i did obviously) So i decided to continue to be patient. The next day i get a text from dave saying ‚Äúwe weren‚Äôt able to verify your account with the info you provided us, please try again‚Äù 

I saw the deposits in my account from dave and the app was about to locate my direct deposits. Waiting 4 business days just to say we can‚Äôt verify exactly what i saw you verify is a little suspicious. This entire experience rewarded me $0 and a headache.

review: While the application/approval process may take a while, as soon as you're approved for the advances it is extremely helpful. It's only $1/month and tips are optional. When you get an advance, you can opt for the free delivery (takes up to 3 business days for the deposit to go through) or you can pay $4.99 for express delivery (instant deposit). If you don't need more than $75, it's so much better than going to the predatory payday loan places. Highly recommend.
title: Extremely helpful!!

review: I was honestly nervous giving my account information and debit card info as well but I requested money because I was running a little low until Friday. I requested $50 and it deposited right into my bank account. You can also give a tip too which donates money to planting trees. The money you borrow just comes out of your next check and there is no interest. It‚Äôs as simple as that. You also can‚Äôt borrow money until you have paid back what you owe.

review: Dave has been a lifesaver for those times when even the best-laid budgets can‚Äôt anticipate every expense. DFW
title: Thank You Dave

review:
Everyone, Don‚Äôt wait to set this up when you‚Äôre in need of funds immediately! Download the app now, verify all of your information and banking data, and keep the app handy for when you may have a tight week with money! This process will take a total of 3-5 days so do it prior to ever needing money. You‚Äôll already be good to go when the time comes.

Dave is a great service. You can choose a free deposit which could take 3 business days, or you can choose $5 for an instant deposit within 8 hours. Getting up to $75 depending on your paycheck and your payback history with Dave is amazing.

There‚Äôs financial tips and tracking too which is great! Soon Dave will even have its own checking account which will make deposits when money is rough even easier.
I hope Dave becomes Paypal sponsored eventually too!
title: DON‚ÄôT WAIT!!

review:
This sounds great, but there are a couple things they don‚Äôt tell you. 

For one, the second you install it they charge you a dollar. So it‚Äôs a free app to download but once you sign up you owe them a buck. Keep that in mind. It‚Äôs not free. 

They also don‚Äôt immediately advance you, so if you‚Äôre looking for something fast, it probably won‚Äôt be it. They want to track your expenses so it‚Äôs probably a lot of data mining and financial profiling that you‚Äôre providing them. 

If you cancel it‚Äôs difficult to find the option and then they try to scare you by saying you won‚Äôt be able to rejoin for 60 days and then you‚Äôll have to talk to customer service in order to come back. 

Likely this keeps some percentage of people from canceling due to fear of needing an advance later and thinking they‚Äôll be screwed if they cancel it. 

I‚Äôm sure some people enjoy it, but just keep these things in mind when you‚Äôre thinking about downloading this and using the service.

title: Dave App

title: This Dave app was a total life saver !

review: Dave app is exactly as it advertises - it will loan you $75 until your next payday. The only thing that is an issue is that it will sometimes think your posted date is your payday. So I get paid twice a month on 15th and last day, but the app thought I got paid earlier since several paychecks came on the 29th since over weekend. But after it looks at your history for a few weeks it should update. Overall great app!
title: Recommend !

review: The Dave App is awesome. I don‚Äôt use it every week, but use it when I want some extra cash and don‚Äôt want to dip into savings or go over my budget. You can choose to cash out either $25, $50 or $75 at a time for now and choose your automatic payback date for it to be deducted right from your account. Great to use if you are paid bi-weekly, if you are in college, or are living off of a Teacher‚Äôs salary and need some extra coverage every now and then.
title: Wonderful!

review: This app has been borrowing me money for almost a year now and i can‚Äôt even explain how clutch it has been. My paycheck sometimes lasts me 3 days until my next one so when i need money for food or whatever this app spots me every time. The best thing about this app vs others is that other apps need you to have direct deposit in order for them to borrow you money but this app will give you 15-20 even if you don‚Äôt have direct deposit. 10/10
title: Dave rocks!

review: The app is very well laid out and allows me to better budget in between paychecks as well as helps me in tough times. I was recently in a bad car accident and unemployed it took me 4 months to get another (two month wait for my surgery)well paying full time job and another 3 weeks for my first paycheck BUT with the help of Dave they were able to advance me funds that I used to help keep food on the table for my wife and family.

review: This app is great. 1$/month to use first month is free and you can tip or not the amount you want for getting up to $75 advance from your paycheck. Has to be within 10 days of your paycheck but again this can be a real life saver for any unexpected smaller bills or for a night out on town before you get paid. Highly recommend this budgeting bear! üêªüíµ
title: A lifesaving App at times

All in all it is a great app, they only take back what they‚Äôve gave you, and whatever tip you decide to leave. I recommend this app.

review: I‚Äôm the type of person that wouldn‚Äôt download an app like this, mostly because I don‚Äôt like borrowing money and especially repaying back later. But I was in desperate need of money and downloaded it so I could get some extra cash and I needed it within a couple of hours and they delivered right away. I was able to use it and the app even helps me with my budget. Definitely recommend!
title: Amazing!

review: I love the Dave app. It‚Äôs great for if you just need a little extra cash right now to pay back on your next pay day. It connects with your bank account to verify you have payroll depositing and then assesses how much it can lend you until payday. There‚Äôs a $4.99 fee for express delivery of your loan request, which is almost instantly in your account, but it‚Äôs free if you don‚Äôt mind waiting a couple business days for it. And as always, tips are optional. I think it‚Äôs a great app.
title: Great app

review: As a parent in this economy you find yourself living paycheck to paycheck sometimes. All the bills may be paid but no money left for anything else. Dave comes in handy when you need a ‚Äúlittle something‚Äù to hold you over til your next check. Easy and inexpensive and you don‚Äôt have to worry about getting further in the hole by paying more back then what you borrowed like most payday loans or worry about the awkwardness of asking a friend or family member.
title: Very Handy

review: I downloaded the app to test out and wow. Very convenient. Dave allows you to borrow money instantly up to $75 and he collects the money right back at payday! Pretty cool! There is no fee to use this app if you can wait up to three business day to receive the borrower money. If you need the money instantly the fee is only about $5.00 much better than getting a cash advance. I‚Äôd recommend this app to anyone afraid of going negative in their bank account before payday.
title: Very efficient app.

review: Enter all your job info etc, and Dave will offer you up to $25-$75 to hold you over if you qualify. Honestly if you have a steady job there‚Äôs no reason to not qualify. No issues or bugs with the process. I Got my money in a few hours with the express option. The app is super cute and descriptive and easy to use, Dave the Bear is so stylish! Will definitely use as needed and recommend to others! Developers Please don‚Äôt change a thing to the app!üòä
title: A great payday loan app thats simple

review: Honestly I was skeptical at first, it wouldn‚Äôt approve me for any loans because it wasn‚Äôt sure how much money I made (I only get a direct deposit from doordash and postmates, not my real job). Not a way to get ahead is it? Need money? Get another job.
title: Not helpful
developerResponse:
{'id': 1996086, 'body': 'Hi evandegrift, 

I'm sorry we don't support your bank right now, but if you tapped "Notify Me" we'll text if our connection provider adds support for it.  

Dave was designed to help you avoid overdrafts, plain and simple. If you make a purchase (or a bill hits unexpectedly) that's going to send you into overdraft, we can spot you the money to keep your account positive so you don't pay a bank fee.

I was able to quickly set up this app, it found my direct deposits from my job and I was approved for an Instant Deposit. It said it could take up to 8hrs, but I received mine in about 30mins. If you‚Äôre in need of some quick cash, then Dave‚Äôs is the way to go.
title: Quick Cash

review: My husband was in between jobs and we were running short on cash a few days before he was going to be getting paid. Within 24 hours I was accepted for an advance which was deposited immediately after I finished the request process. Saved us the headache of borrowing  from family/ friends! Had a great experience and love that $75 is the max, enough to help out but not get yourself caught up in the cycle of borrowing!
title: Great help

review: This app is honestly a godsend it comes in need when you need a few extra dollars and helps you out so much and gives you plenty of time to pay them back and if you can‚Äôt pay them back in full it allows you to make payment arrangements they are just a wonderful site they have wonderful customer service and the amounts go up as you pay back on time in the beginning with the smaller amounts
title: Best app ever

review: Had this app because I had some expenses coming up. Downloaded the app, followed all the necessary prompts, and then waited the three business days for them to connect to my bank. On day 2, the micro deposits were completed but did take about 6 hours to update on the app itself. Then I‚Äôm still checking for the approval notification but I‚Äôm still getting emails to apply for an advance and get a Dave membership account. Mind you, I have already taken these steps and I awaiting approval. Honestly, I just wasted my time with this app. Glad I got out before they started charging me for paying back an advance I‚Äôm almost sure I wouldn‚Äôt get until too late.
title: Just an awful app..

review: Dave is a great app! I like how you can get the cash advance when your in a bind. I also like how Dave will send you texts letting you know about bills that may put you below your set minimum balance. I wish, however, that Dave was able to tell you what bill is about to put you over. That would be helpful. Also, it would be nice to have a higher advance. Some other apps allow you to advance up 500 dollars versus Dave only capping at 75 or 100 dollars if you get the premium version.
title: Great application

review: So many cool options on this app. Download it within hours they front you money for whatever purpose of maybe. You do have to have a form of identity ssn. No credit check just pay a couple dollars to have it express sent and they also have a bank account option so you can create a bank account through it. I just can‚Äôt believe that they gave me $75 in less than a couple hours. So stinking cool!
title: Off the chain!

review: Dave is a wonderful APP to get you by rainy days.  I did two $75 advances and paid it back on time.  I tried to do another advance but they limited me to $20, i still took it.  Now I am getting messages from Dave saying that i need to reconnect my bank account.  I try logging in and noticed that my PIN & PASSWORD has changed.  Did I get hacked?  I tried resetting my password but that was not helpful at all, I called their customer service number but all I get is  voice telling me to use the App.  NOT helpful at all.  I will be calling my bank to block Dave‚Äôs transactions,  I feel unsafe knowing that the APP has my personal and banking info but not letting me log-in to access it.
title: Dave is somewhat ‚Äúhelpful‚Äù

review: It‚Äôs helped me when I needed it the most super convenient and helpful and I love all the donations they do I trust this app had it for about 1 year now and it‚Äôs only a dollar payment for the service which I don‚Äôt mind at all they wait til I get paid to charge me anything which helps cause most apps wanted me to pay some thing on the spot when I‚Äôm trying to borrow money cause I have no money or very low on cash love it and for-sure recommend to others!!!
title: I LOVE THIS APP

review: My daughter showed me the app but I wasn‚Äôt sure about giving personal info out. I took a chance and everything worked great!!! I received the money FAST and requested to pay back on my payday and everything worked as planned so I did it again!!!!!  It‚Äôs nice to know if I‚Äôm running short I can get a little help and pay Dave back when I get paid with no huge fees or interest!!! I‚Äôm 52 and was always told DONT share info but I trust DAVE now!!!!!!!
title: Nervous At First!- nice surprise!

review: Dave has a funny way of not letting you log in constantly without giving proper reason. How am I suppose to pay back my advance when you with let me login, reset my password or anything of the sort? Would give 0 stars if I could. review: It may be a bit different and you may not be able to cash out as much money as Earnin, but Dave doesn‚Äôt attempt to pull money out of your bank account unless your balance is enough. Which means no overdrafting, and nothing bouncing off your account costing an arm and leg in fees. (Which happened to me with earnin.) And I like that I can make payments on what I owe if I don‚Äôt happen to have the whole amount.  Much easier to use as well!
title: Wayyy Better Than Earnin

review: If I need some extra cash I know I can quickly get an advance with an easy transaction from Dave. I have never had any issues with receiving my advance quickly when using the express method and my payback date is clearly stated within the app so that I am sure money from my paycheck will be there for repayment. I tip because of the convenience this app offers and the great cause behind it as well üòÅAmazing experience so far!
title: Dave is always there for me...

review: So I hit a bump financially and used this app one time to help out which it sure did. If it was not for the need of the funds I would not use it only because if you want the money ASAP they charge $5 and it takes hours for it to show up on top of that they ask for a ‚Äútip‚Äù but I just paid $5 to get my money stat so for borrowing only $75 + $5 + tip easily $84-90 dollars they ask for too much. Hopefully I don‚Äôt need to use this again.
title: Use if you REALLY need it
developerResponse: {'id': 12959390, 'body': 'Hey there! Tips are always optional! The express charge is due to bank fees. Sadly, we have no control over those, but we feel the peace of mind that comes with avoiding overdrafts until payday is worth it.', 'modified': '2020-01-16T20:37:23Z'}

review: I found out about Dave through Facebook. Along with everyone else‚Äôs skepticism, I was reluctant to try it. But, I read some reviews and people praised it. So, I downloaded, put my info in, and within 15 minutes I had an extra $75 in my account! Does what it says, and you pay it back on your next payday (sometimes it‚Äôs the day before your payday so be careful). Haven‚Äôt had a problem using the app yet. Keep up the great work.
title: Great for short-term cash advances!

review: I love Dave! The app comes to the rescue when I need it although there are a few things about it I don‚Äôt like. In unfortunate circumstances there is not much you can do if you can‚Äôt pay them back on the date you signed up for. They automatically take it out as soon as you have money in your account even if you miss the pay day, and there is no way to talk to anyone and ask for help with that. But other than that the app is perfect and it does hold borrowers accountable!
title: Pretty cool some bugs but not bad

review: I enjoy using The Dave App first and foremost because it spots me money prior to my paycheck allowing me to use that extra money for gas and other necessities. Secondly it keeps track of regular spending, allowing me to know when I need to hold onto my current money or when I have extra to spend. All in all it has helped me more than expected with my finances, I now know when and where I can use my money and when to hold onto it. Thanks Dave!
title: Why I like this App

review: Dave is a life saver. It‚Äôs helped me twice now when I was a few dollars short and a few days short of payday. I only wish you could pick a custom loan amount. It only gives me an option of 10, 20, or the full 75 when I only need 40 or 50 to hold me over. It also didn‚Äôt recognize my paycheck at first and tried to make my main source of income based on some reoccurring payments from cashapp. Thankfully customer service is great and it got handled quickly. All in all a great app.
title: Fast, Easy, and helpful

review: I have nothing but issues with this service. Because my account became negative $1.05, I was ‚Äútoo risky‚Äù to do an advance on my account which is bogus because I dipped so low due to the Dave app collecting their payment. When I try to link my phone number, it states ‚Äúburned phone numbers cannot be linked‚Äù. This is not a burner. I have been with Sprint for years and never had an issue linking my phone number to any app that I use that requires it. I have tried to email customer service, but that was a dead end with no resolve. I will be telling my friends not to use the service because this is ridiculous.
title: Horrible Experience
developerResponse: {'id': 12601661, 'body': "Hi friend, thank you for using Dave! review: I like the set up of this app. If I need money for gas or anything else I can get it. And the pay back is so simple. The only thing I would change is the budget expense. It hasn‚Äôt happen so far but every time I buy something from the store it tracks it and adds it to the budget expense even though I only bought something once.
title: Great app for quick cash.

review: I was skeptical at first but this app is actually really great! I‚Äôm 24 and have racked myself up some debt so after I pay everything due I‚Äôm pretty much living paycheck to paycheck. If you need immediately you do have to pay a fee of close to $5 but if you can wait 3 days there‚Äôs no additional fee for it. THIS APP IS GREAT FOR A YOUNG PERSON!!!!
title: Dave is the best!!

review: I downloaded Dave and have now used it twice, and it has been great. The money comes in quick if you use the express option($5) fee, but there is an option that's free. review: Gotta say this app really helped me out with $75 when I had to take advantage of an online sale but didn‚Äôt wanna risk waiting til payday when all my sizes might be sold out üò≠ Dave helped me submit that order honey and now my shipment is on the way! title: YES!

review: Dave is awesome! Not only does it help you put when you need it the most, but it also takes a deep look at what you‚Äôre spending money on and when you are most likely to see over draft fees. review:
I signed up for this app to check it out. Provided my info but never borrowed any money. It said the $1 fee was covered for the first month. The terms say if you sign up within the last 10 days of the month you aren‚Äôt charged. Two weeks later they took $1 out of my account. Terms are misleading and confusing. I sent a message to their CS 1/8. 

Today they replied with the following:
Hey friend!
We really can‚Äôt apologize enough about the delay in getting back to you, our team is working around the clock hard to help!

At this time, please let us know if you still need help and one of our amazing agents will get back to you ASAP.

We so appreciate you bear-ing with us.

Of course I still need help - they haven‚Äôt refunded the money or explained why it was taken out. It took 10 messages over several days to get an actual answer that they won‚Äôt refund. Overall awful app. I couldn‚Äôt find the term of service in their app to re-read. Very misleading. Yeah it‚Äôs only $1 but how many people are they misleading?

Dave is super helpful in terms of getting help before payday.  Setup takes a day or so to access funds, but they come pretty quickly.  The budgeting tool is flawed as it counts everything you spend as a budgeting expenditure that you will spend every month.  Also, there is a fee per month to use the service and they require a tip.
All in all, it‚Äôs a pretty good way to get some help in between paychecks without huge fees or hitting your credit.

And came back 4 days later and actually took the funds which caused my account to be overdrawn. Dave says they won‚Äôt take funds if the funds aren‚Äôt there but that is a clear LIE. Dave also doesn‚Äôt disclose that they do pre-with/ holds on your paybacks. So the app that‚Äôs supposed to help you avoid withdrawals actually will most like you overdraw your account. Download at your own risk.

I added my bank info and now I wait... apparently they need to verify my bank by making micro deposits into my account; they will notify when this has happened and then I‚Äôll be able to request money. I saw the deposits come through; one for .10 and another for .5. Still waiting!!! I contacted support center, no response. The fine print for this delay is in their FAQ section. review:
When I first signed up for Dave I wasn‚Äôt approved for an advance at all. Couple weeks later I was able to get an advance of $75 (that was my max). It was taken out of my account 2 weeks later on my next payday. 

I got another advance shortly after payday because I pay all the bills in my home so my bank account doesn‚Äôt keep money in it for long after I get paid. So I was able to get another $75 advance (still my max). It was paid back on time with no issues. 

A couple weeks later I tried getting another advance from Dave, but for some reason my max dropped all the down to $20 from $75. This too got paid back. I just recently got another advance for only $20 because it was my max and I‚Äôm not sure why I started off getting $75 And then the max drops $50.  $20 doesn‚Äôt help much at all but I‚Äôm still grateful for the money. 

I just wish I‚Äôd be able to advance more so it was worth my time and money. 

Thanks Dave.

title: Dave

No one notified me of any issues, but when I went to the live chat it said something was wrong with connecting my account. They tell you if you sign up for direct deposit you can access more funds faster, but it‚Äôs been almost 2 weeks since I started the process. Was told multiple times my chat would be returned in 24hrs no one has reached out yet. I‚Äôm starting to think it‚Äôs a scam. Please proceed with caution

This app is ridiculous.
If you‚Äôre looking for a good advance app, MoneyLion and Brigit are where you need to go.

review: This app is perfect when a little extra cash is needed. If choosing an expedited advance, the money is in your bank within seconds. There is a small fee to expedite but it is worth it. The only things that could be a downside are that it seems like it may be impossible to qualify for the full $100 advance, and on occasion, there can be a limitation on how soon after your paycheck before you can get another advance. Overall though, I‚Äôm satisfied.
title: Great app!

review: Couldn‚Äôt have been better timing!! Was really in a bad spot with my closest friends funeral a day away and I was t going to make it there until Dave‚Äôs app popped up on my TV commercial and I downloaded and was able to get 75 dollars instantly in my bank account with a small fee and I was able to pay my respects and leave a small donation to the family in loss I couldn‚Äôt have been more pleased with Dave‚Äôs app :)
title: Awesome app

review: Dave pretty much does what it‚Äôs said to do. If you dont have a direct deposit or they can‚Äôt detect one they‚Äôll still let you advance but not $75. Sometimes they don‚Äôt pick up your direct deposit until weeks later which could be an issue if you‚Äôre in a tight situation. Customer service takes FOREVER to get back to you, which is very frustrating because if I‚Äôm contacting CS 9/10 I‚Äôm in need of immediate help. title: Great app!

review: Dave accepted my secondary bank that I used to get paid before Friday because my primary bank account only allows me to get paid on Friday. I really wish they would increase the amount you can withdraw from your check. If you do not have an actual bank with Dave, you can only withdraw up to $75. If you do have an actual bank with Dave (They are still working on the bank part, so there is only a waitlist), you can withdraw up to $100.
title: Dave really comes in handy

review: I absolutely love Dave. The only thing that bothers me is that I work for a small business owner who runs a personal care home. My paychecks come from a small business checking account and isn‚Äôt a regular payroll paycheck, and my hours vary, so my income amount varies every other week. So Dave won‚Äôt recognize it as my income/paycheck that is consistent and deposited every other Thursday. So because I can‚Äôt do direct deposit, and because Dave does not recognize it, my loan limit won‚Äôt go beyond $20.
title: Review

No hidden agendas or fees that I have come across- the deposits are quick (even when you do not pay the extra 4$ fee) and it doesn‚Äôt set you up for failure. In a pinch, and need a small quick amount to get you through - highly recommend. ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ
title: Reliable, Legit and Fast!

review: At first I was kind of skeptical but I downloaded the app and put in all my information. It takes about 1-2 days to verify your bank account. After that I requested $50 just to see and in less than 5 minutes it was in my account. It‚Äôs free to get in in 3 days and if you want it immediately it costs 3.99 and they won‚Äôt charge you until your next payday. Thanks Dave. I really love this!
title: Really Works

review: Here we are. A husband, wife, daughter and roommate. Hungry. We go to make dinner when it hits us like a pack of frozen porkchops. Which is exactly what it was, since we forgot to set them out to thaw. With no money for a few days we turned to Dave. Dave saved us. Dave was our food guru. Thanks Dave for nourishing my famished family in our time of need. Tomorrow is porkchops, then god be with us we remember to set out the frozen hamburger for the next days to come.
title: +1 For Dave

review:
When I downloaded the app, I was very skeptical. So after a few weeks, I decided to try it out since I needed some money fast. I paid the $3.99 for express delivery and tipped $1.99 for 3 trees to be planted. They promised 8 hours for the money to be in my account. It‚Äôs been 48 hours and I still don‚Äôt have it in my account. I already sent Dave several messages and all have been responded by saying: Your money will be in your account soon. 

What is your definition of soon? Because still no money. If I could give 0 stars, I would. This is ridiculous. If I get charged for money I still don‚Äôt have...I‚Äôm going to be angry. Thanks for nothing.
title: Express Delivery Fail
